143a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi gter mtha' yas pa 'di'ang thob par 'gyur
143a2(dkon brtsegs): la/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'dzin par 'gyur/ myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'ang thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang / nyan thos phun
143a3(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bkod pa mtha' yas chos thams cad spros pa med pa la gnas pa'i
143a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ gzungs kyi sgo rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i chos 'di mngon du 'gyur zhing / yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzhan yang yongs su
143a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bkod pa mtha' yas 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos rim par phye ba gsum pa yin no// bkod pa mtha' yas de lta bas
143a6(dkon brtsegs): na nga'i rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i dus na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / mi dge ba'i grogs po yongs su spang ba dang / chos 'di dag kun
143a7(dkon brtsegs): bsrung bar gnas pa dang / lus dang srog kyang yongs su btang ste/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di yang dag par gzung bar bya'o// bkod pa mtha' yas dper na ston zla 'bring po'i zla banyam
143b1(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor skar ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba ni shin tu lham me/ lhang nger 'dug go// de bzhin du gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa rim par phye bas yang dag par bsdus pa 'di'ang / mdo/
143b2(dkon brtsegs): sde thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs shing / snying por gyur la mdzes shing brjid pa yin no// 'di dag thams cad ni gus pa chen pos spobs pa mtha' yas pa la nges par 'byung ba yin pas//
143b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di la bag yod pa'i sa 'dod par bya'o// bag yod pa'i sa ji lta bu zhe na/ chos 'di dag la sems kyi las tshul bzhin du yongs su rtog pa'i yid la byed pas nges par sems pa dang /
143b4(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa la rlom sems med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa'i sa la slob par 'dod pa chos la mkhas par mngon par
143b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson pas/ chos 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par bya ste/ glegs bam bris nas/ byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa don
143b6(dkon brtsegs): du gnyer zhing / 'dun pa rnams la rab tu bstan par bya/ kun tu bgo bar bya zhing lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / don nges par bstan pa'i bar
143b7(dkon brtsegs): du'ang chos yang dag par bgro ba la bcab pa med par/ chos kyi sgo ji ltar kun tu bzung ba bzhin mi mkhyud par bya'o// khyed sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa
144a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag thob par 'dod na/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang mi 'bral bar bya'o// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/
144a2(dkon brtsegs): chos gang sgrub par mi 'gyur ba dang / don gang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de cung zad kyang med de/ chos kyi sgo gang 'dir ma brjod pa de ni 'ga' yang med kyis/ bkod pa mtha'
144a3(dkon brtsegs): yas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo rnam par sbyong ba'i chos rim par phye ba 'di zung zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
144a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di zung zhig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus 'di
144a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis bzung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sgo 'di dang ldan pa ni chos kyi sgo tshad med pa mngon du 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
144a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos kyi sgo 'di la dad pa dang / chos kyi sgo 'di kun 'dzin pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams la chos kyi sgo mang po mngon du
144a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de'i phyir/ khyod kyis chos kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mang po'i mdzod 'di kun tu zung zhig/ kun dga' bo chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa
144b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag chos kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'gyur te/ chos kyi snang ba des sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyi chos bstan pa'ang
144b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon du 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang yang nye bar 'gyur/ smon lam gyi rgyun ji lta bu 'dod pa'ang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
144b3(dkon brtsegs): pas chos kyi rnams kyi rang bzhin zab mo mtshan ma med pa dang / ming dang mtshan mar brjod pas ston par mdzad pa la ltos/ chos kyi rang bzhin brjod cing lta ba rnam par dag pa
144b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong bar mdzad kyang / 'di la cung zad kyang ston pa med de/ ston par byed pa'ang 'ga' yang med do// kun dga' bo chos kyi sgo 'di ni ye shes tshad med pa yang dag par rtsom
144b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang mi skye ba'i chos rab tu rtogs pa'i bzod pa skyes la/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag
144b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ / kun dga' bo chos kyi sgo 'di la gang sems dang po bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par
144b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni/ bskal pa grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / spobs pa mtha'
145a1(dkon brtsegs): yas pa nyid la'ang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di byin gyis brlab
145a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir 'od zer dag bkye ste/ 'od zer des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na gnas pa'i sems can de
145a3(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyis gzungs kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i chos kyi le'u 'di thos par gyur to/ / thos nas kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
145a4(dkon brtsegs): tshad med grangs med pa dag gi sems can rnams kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang bde ba dang yang dag par ldan
145a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ / lha'i me tog gi char yang bab par gyur to// 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang / 'di skad du sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
145a6(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur cig ces tshig tu smras so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mtha' yas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
145a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma ci legs/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas gzungs kyi rgyal po bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ spabs bcad
145b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya spong ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ sde snod gsum yang dag par sdud pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ spob pa mtha' yas
145b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni don thams cad yang dag par sdud pa la mkhas pa'i chos kyi sgo yin te/ des na chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sgo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi the tshom thams
145b3(dkon brtsegs): cad gcod par 'gyur ba yin/ 'di ni nga'i rjes su ston pa yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog kha dog lnga pas mngon par gtor to//
145b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang
145b5(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong
145b6(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgya pa las/ sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ sh+lo ka stong nyis brgya ste bam po bzhi pa'o// 'dus pa gnyis pa rdzogs so//
145b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga tA a tsin t+ya gu h+ya nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi
146a1(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
146a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong bzhi khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
146a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ phal cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong dang thabs cig tu
146a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang bzod pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/
146a5(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtsen pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa
146a6(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa dang / spyod pa'i sgrub pa shes pa/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas
146a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par rab tu zhugs pa/ thabs la mkhas pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te bkur la
146b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bsngags pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dadag tu med par byang chub kyi lam mtha' yas pa mthar gtugs pa/ sems sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang mtshungs pa/
146b2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' ltar mtha' yas pa'i byams pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa/ chags pa'i gnas sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa
146b3(dkon brtsegs): mthu bo che'i lus thob pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa la 'jigs pa med par mkhas pa/
146b4(dkon brtsegs): zla ba dang nyi ma mog mog por byed pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa ye shes kyis ston pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel
146b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba la zhugs pas rtag pa dang chad par lta ba'i mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
146b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gzhag pa dang / ldang ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ phyogs bcur sgra grags pa/ dam pa'i chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs
146b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'chad par byed pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bla ma zhes bya ba dang / zla ba'i tog dang /
147a1(dkon brtsegs): ri bong can gyi tog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / dpal brtsegs dang / dpal sbas dang / mthu bo che dang / klu dga' dang / klu'i bla
147a2(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / klus byin dang / gzungs 'dzin dang / mya ngam gyi lha dang / yon tan sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / lag na sgron ma dang / rtag tu lag bteg dang / rtag tu lag brkyang
147a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / lag na rin po che dang / kun tu snang dang / skar ma'i rgyal po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / rdo rje blo gros chen po dang /
147a4(dkon brtsegs): rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gom par 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pa dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang /
147a5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros rgya mtsho dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / nor gyi blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / rtag tu mos dang / rtag tu dgod
147a6(dkon brtsegs): cing rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po dang / ngan song spong dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'chang ba dang / brtson 'grus 'bar ba
147a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab brtsegs dang / rtag par lha dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / mi 'dzums pa dang /
147b1(dkon brtsegs): brjod med dang / rin chen dam pa dang / rin chen sems pa dang / legs par rnam par sems pa dang / don legs par rnam par bsams pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i blo gros
147b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / sa 'dzin dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / zhing yang dag par brgyan pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / phug sbas dang / dbang
147b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i lha dang / chu lha dang / tshangs pa dra ba can dang / byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba dang / lha'i cod pan dang / lag bzang dang / mig bzangs dang / spos kyi
147b4(dkon brtsegs): glang po dang / ba glang spos kyi glang po che dang / seng ge'i tog dang / don grub blo gros dang / kha lo sgyur dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon
147b5(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na brgya byin dang
147b6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong dang / de ma yin pa lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ dri za'i dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am
147b7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa
148a1(dkon brtsegs): la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / chu lha dang / gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / gser mdog dang / kha
148a2(dkon brtsegs): dog mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po mtshams bzangs dang / de dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa brgya stong phrag mang po/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba
148a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / thag zangs ris dang / lag bzangs
148a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / sa la dang / ta la dang / bde mchog dang / rab sim dang / che rab dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gzhan dang / de dag dang gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'khor dang
148a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa brgya stong mang po/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to//
148a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ rang gi gnyen dang 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya
148a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// de ma yin pa gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen
148b1(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to//
148b2(dkon brtsegs): sa bla na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba
148b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun
148b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis bltas te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
148b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
148b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
148b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni cang shes kyi sems su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spong
149a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi
149a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
149a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems las su rung bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tshom dang bral bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams
149a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshogs ni zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems su 'gyur ro// dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga'
149a5(dkon brtsegs): la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro/ / btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjes su 'chags pa dang khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar
149a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshogs
149a7(dkon brtsegs): ni byas pa'i las chud mi za bar 'gyur ro/ / dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo gros rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// rtogs pa'i tshogs ni don rtogs pa'i
149b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshogs ni lus dang / tsher ba dang / sems dang / chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba'i tshogs ni mi dge
149b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga'i tshogs ni dbang po mchog
149b3(dkon brtsegs): dang mchog ma yin pa shes par 'gyur ro/ / stobs lnga'i tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par
149b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / lam gyi tshogs ni lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// bden pa'i tshogs ni mi 'khrugs pa'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshig ni sam
149b5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod par 'gyur ro/ / ston pa'i tshogs ni gzhan dag la rag ma las pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni yon tan thams cad skye ba'i sgor 'gyur ro//
149b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa'i tshogs ni 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu bar 'gyur ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i tshogs ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyor ba'i tshogs ni rtsom pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par
149b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / nang du yang dag 'jog gi tshogs ni ji skad thos pa'i chos chud mi gson par 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos
150a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshogs ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par 'gyur ro/ / bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//
150a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
150a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams la tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par bshad do/ / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan
150a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi g.yas phyogs na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rdo rje thogs nas 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//
150a5(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo bsdu ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par gsungs pa ni/ bcom
150a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so/ / yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
150a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi nang du 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
150b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni rnam par bsgrub pa thams cad rnam par bsgrub bo/ / ye shes kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad la legs par bshad
150b2(dkon brtsegs): pas tshim par bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs la brtson par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
150b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di gnyis
150b4(dkon brtsegs): ni lam thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa ni bdud sdig can gyis thul bar dka' 'o// bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
150b5(dkon brtsegs): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba
150b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ston te mi 'chab bo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod ning
150b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring ba nye ba na 'dug pa yin na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa'ang ma yin na/ de ma yin
151a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can tham lta smras kyang kyi dgas pa la rnams te/ khyed stobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rnga rdzas cang ma
151a2(dkon brtsegs): bas khas blangs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
151a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang dag thos pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub pa
151a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyid par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di la 'chad par gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje smra
151a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad du gsol/ da skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub
151a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di nyan par 'dod de khyod la ngas bskul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la rtsoms te/ 'khor 'dir spobs par
151a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
151b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi ba tsam zhig bstan pa bdag gis bstan par
151b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyin mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na mar me'i mthus/ gzugs su gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad gda' ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan
151b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi brtsam
151b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bgyi'o/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir
151b5(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams thos nas mi dngang / mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur bar 'khor legs par khod cigade nas byang chub
151b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi gsungs te/ bzhi
151b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / klu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bsam gtan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// yang
152a1(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag gang gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa 'di bzhi rnam par bkod pa
152a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu gsungs so/ / grogs po dag de la khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
152a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas mi sdang / mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// thos nas lhag par dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher
152a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba nyan pa la mos par gyur cing /
152a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur pa de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// de nas gsang ba pa'i
152a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / byang
152a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i gsang ba pa'i gnas rnams bshad par bya'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros gang tshun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems
152b1(dkon brtsegs): dpar gyur pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de tshun chad kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs 'bring na 'dug 'dug na/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'gyur
152b2(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ lus tshul 'chos pa kho bos nam yang ma mthong ngo // ngag 'gyur ba 'am/ ngag gi kha gsag kyang ma thos so// sems 'gyur ba 'am/ sems g.yo ba'ang ma mthong ngo //
152b3(dkon brtsegs): de lus dang lus kyi spyad lam gyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ tshig tu ni mi spro// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i lus kyi spyod lam mthara' las ma
152b4(dkon brtsegs): med par snang ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa med par
152b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bsam gtan gyi spyod lam ston to// rlud kyi sgra dang klu'i dbyangs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgya
152b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgra dang glu'i dbyangs kyi spyod lam dang / khye'us 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khye'u'i spyod lam dang / bu mos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bu mo'i spyod lam dang / bud med kyis 'dul
152b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can rnams la bud med kyi spyod lam dang / skyes pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la skyes pa'i spyod las dang / gzhon nus 'dul po'i sems can rnams la gzhon nu'i sku
153a1(dkon brtsegs): lam dang / bar mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bar ma'i spyod lam dang / rgan pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgan po'i spyod lam dang / yan lag
153a2(dkon brtsegs): ma tshang bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la yan lag ma tshang ba'i spod lam dang / gdol pa rkang lag chad pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gdol pa rkang lag chad pa'i spyod lam dang /
153a3(dkon brtsegs): lkugs pa dang 'phye bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la lkugs pa dong 'phye bo'i spyod lam dang / long ba dang 'on pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la long ba dang 'on pa'i spyod lam dang / sems
153a4(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyi spyod lam dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mis
153a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i spyod lam dang / lhas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la lha'i spyod lam dang / klu dang /
153a6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
153a7(dkon brtsegs): driza dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i spyod lam dang / brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi spyod lam dang
153b1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang / 'jig rten skyong bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten skyong ba'i spyod lam dang / 'khor los sgyur bas
153b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'khor los sgyur ba'i spyod lam dang / dge slong gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge slong gi spyod lam dang / dge slong mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
153b3(dkon brtsegs): la dge slong ma'i spyod lam dang / dge bsnyen gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge snyan gyi spyod lam dang / dge bsnyen mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dge bsnyen ma'i spyod lam dang
153b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi spyod lam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang / byang chub sems dpas
153b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam ston te/ gzugs med pa ni
153b6(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sems can thams cad kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam yang
153b7(dkon brtsegs): de skad du lhun gyis grub cing yongs su mi rtog par kun tu gnas so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa de lus kyis lus kyi spyod lam ston mod kyi lus kyi chos
154a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/ / lus kyis lus kyi las byed mod kyi/ lus kyi dben pa'ang mi 'dor ro// de lus yongs su dag pas lus kyi 'od kyis sems can dmyal/
154a2(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar byed do// lus la mi lta bas sha za ba'i sems can ji snyed yod pa sha'i longs spyod gang dang gang 'dod pa de lta bu'i sha rnams bdag gi lus las de dag la
154a3(dkon brtsegs): bstabs nas/ bdag srog dang phral te sems can de dag la sbyin par byed do// khrag 'thung ba rnams la khrag sbyin par byed do// rkang za ba rnams la rkang sbyin par byed do// gzi byin za ba
154a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la gzi byin sbyin par byed do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sha'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gi lus las bstabs te/ srog dang phral nas sems can de dag la sbyin par byed do//
154a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus tshad med pa ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su 'gro bas mi zad do// de'i lus mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pas rab tu rig par
154a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de lus kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ gang dag 'dod chags la spyod pa sdug pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i sems can de dag gi mdun du bud med gzug
154a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa ston te/ de la sems can de dag chags pa skyes nas byugs shing kun tu byugs te/ de dag pang du 'jog go// de dag skyes bu de dag gi pang du son pa dang rnyis
154b1(dkon brtsegs): shing bskams nas 'chi ba'i dus byed do/ / mi gtsang zhing dri mi zhim par gyur pas skyes bu de dag des yid byung nas bor te song ba dang / shi ba'i ro de dag nyid las skyes bu de dag bla na med pa yang
154b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta bu 'byung ngo / / yang zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
154b3(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di lus kyis khyab par byas te/ sor mo'i rtse mos yungs 'bru la bya ba de bzhin du rin po che'i gdugs kyis khebs par byed do// sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me la lag pa'i sor mo'i g.yogs kyang /
154b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de lus kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod cing rim gro byed de/ me tog gi gdugs ri rab tsam dag kyang 'bul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
154b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi skon bu dag kyang 'thor ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di spos kyi 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod
154b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu mos te/ ri rab tsam gyi snying po 'bar bar byas pa'i mar me 'bar bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mar me 'bar bar byed do// de bzhin
154b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang gi lus kyang ras bcos bus dkris nas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis bskus te mar mer 'bud do// de 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung
155a1(dkon brtsegs): gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ sems can dag gis kyang mthong zhing shes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa de mthong nas kyang // sems
155a2(dkon brtsegs): can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do/ / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa'i sems can rnams la'ang bdag gi
155a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs chen po che chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su ston te/ der sems can de dag sprul pas 'jigs skrags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par
155a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ / de la chos kyang nyan par 'dod do// gang yang grong khyer chen po dag gi dur khrod chen po srog chags brgya stong du mas gang bar gyur pa der yang / byang chub sems dpa'
155a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po des bdag gi lus chen po shi zhing dus las 'das par ston to/ / der yang sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag gis ji tsam du 'dod par sha la zos nas tshe'i mthar
155a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin te 'chi ba'i dus su gyur cing / shi nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o// de yang de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du rgyur 'gyur ro// de ni byang chub sems
155a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ shi ba'i lus la sems can gang dag gis zos pa de dag la de nyid mtho ris su skye ba nas
155b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur gyur cig ces yun ring po nas smon lam btab ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa de bsam pa 'grub/ 'dod pa 'grub/ smon pa grub bo//
155b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus tshad med cing mtha' yas par khyod kyis rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i
155b3(dkon brtsegs): gling du gtogs pa nam mkhas bskor ba 'di nyid du grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong pa phrag bzhi byung ste/ de na grong dang / tshong dus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang po srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya
155b4(dkon brtsegs): stestong mang po gnas pa yod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na nad chen po'i bskal pa bar ma byung ste/ der sems can dag nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur nas/ phal cher lus shu ba
155b5(dkon brtsegs): can dang / lus rnags pa dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / me dpal dang / thor bu dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyi nad rnams kyis rgyas par gyur to//
155b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe sman pa stong phrag du ma sems can de dag gi nad de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur kyang / sems can de dag gi nad de bsal bar ma nus so// der sems can de dag gis gso ba'i dpyad ma
155b7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed de skyabs med rten med nas 'di skad du/ nad 'di las ni thar byed pa// lha 'am klu 'am dri za 'am// gnod sbyin dang ni mi yang rung // mi ma yin pa su zhig yod// sdug bsngal 'di las
156a1(dkon brtsegs): thar byed pa/ / de la nor rnams thams cad btang // rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bya// byas pa dag kyang gzo bar bya// zhes ku co cher 'don to//
156a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig bzangs zhes bya bar gyur te/ des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can
156a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag nad sna tshogs mang pos btab pa'ang mthong / lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas ku co chen po 'don pa'i sgra'ang thos so// des de dag mthong zhing thos nas kyang snying rje chen po skyed de/
156a4(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du bdag ci nas sems can gnas med pa 'di dag gi gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o// skyabs med pa dang rten med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang rten du 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ des
156a5(dkon brtsegs): de ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling gi dbus na grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba zhig yod pa dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu srog chags nges pa zhes bya bar rdzus te skyes nas steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/
156a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la tshigs su bcad pas bskul ba/ ku ru'i grong khyer nye ba na// srog chags nges pa zhes bya yod// de yi sha la sus zos pa// de ni nang las thar bar 'gyur//
156a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs par ma byed skrag par ma byed par// ji ltar 'dod pa de yi sha long zhig/ de la khro med gshe med gnod sems med// 'dzam bu gling 'dir de ni sman yin no// ni ba'i
156b1(dkon brtsegs): na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / tshong dus dang / ri khrod de dag na sems can nad pa ji skad yod pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas/ grong khyer chen po ku ru ga la ba dang / srog/
156b2(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi rnam pa nges pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ srog chags nges pa'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang / de'i lus la sha zad par ma gyur nas/ nges pas tshigs su
156b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di smras so/ / bde ba gang gis byang chub 'thob 'gyur zhing // bdag gi ye shes zad par mi 'gyur ba// bden pa des ni bdag gi lus las sha/ 'dir ni nams kyang zad par ma gyur cig/
156b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar phyogs bzhi'i sems can nad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang / de'i lus la bri ba 'am/ gang bar yang
156b5(dkon brtsegs): mi mngon te/ yang bcad yang bcad kyang phyir skye bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sems can ji snyed kyis srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa'i sha zos pa de dag zos ma thag tu nad thams cad zhi ba
156b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ nad med cing bde ba dang nyams pa med par gyur to// de nas mthar gyis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can gyi nang thams rang bsal bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas 'dzam bu gling gi skyes
156b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag 'di snyam du sems te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa des bdag cag nang las yongs sa thar cing nang med par byas te/ bde
157a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med par byas kyis/ bdag cag gis de la mchod pa'i gnas cig bya'o snyam nas/ de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa ga la
157a2(dkon brtsegs): der song nas thal mo sbyar te/ srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni bdag cag gnas dang skyabs// khyod ni bdag cag sman pa sman// khyod la mchod
157a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang bgyi ba/ / khyod kyis bdag cag bka' stsol cig/ de nas srog chags kyi rnam pa nges pas lus de mi snang bar byas te/ bdag gi brgya byin gyi lus su 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po
157a4(dkon brtsegs): de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ nga la nor dang zas skom dang // gser dang 'bru rnams dgos pa med// thams cad lhan cig mthun par ni// dge ba bcu yi las lam srungs// sems
157a5(dkon brtsegs): can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ / byang chub smon lam brtan pa thob// phan pa'i dngos po nyid kyi sems// gcig la gcig kyang byams pa skyed// brgya byin las ni tshig 'di thos// sems
157a6(dkon brtsegs): can de dag rab dga' ste/ / shin tu yongs su dag pa yi// dge ba bcu yi las lam blangs// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de tshun chad 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du skyes pa dang / bud med dang /
157a7(dkon brtsegs): khye'u dang / bu mo de snyed las tha na sems can gcig kyang log par ltung bar song ba mi dran no// de tshun chad de dag thams cad de dag shi 'phos te/ shi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gro mtha
157b1(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi 'jig rten du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ de dag yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin des chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/ yang dag
157b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod nas/ de la kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// kha cig ni chos rnams la chos kyi
157b3(dkon brtsegs): mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa ste/ de ltar lus gcig/
157b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su btang bas na sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag yongs su smin par byas so// gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di
157b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mi shigs pa/ sra ba/ brtan pa/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ rdzus te skye ba ste/ lus de ni 'jig pas 'dul ba'i
157b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'jig go/ / lus mi 'jig pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'jig ste/ mes mi tshig
157b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshon gyis mi tshugs shing / dngos rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan te mi shigs pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni lus kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang / byang
158a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' mi sem mi rtog ste/ lus la lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes so// lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan
158a2(dkon brtsegs): nyid shes so/ / lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gnyis su mi 'byed de/ lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni
158a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ / de ltar na dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rjes su 'jug go// de rang gi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi
158a4(dkon brtsegs): dben pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam par byed do/ / de rang gi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i
158a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid du shes so/ / chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rjes su 'thob bo// de rang gi
158a6(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes so/ / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes so// de rang gi lus
158a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes so/ / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes so// de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis
158b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid shes te/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do// 'das pa dang
158b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin
158b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do// kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
158b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid do// mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon
158b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'du byed pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de nyid yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid dang / de lta bu nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba nyid dang
158b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'byung ba nyid dang / rtsod pa med pa nyid dang / gzugs med pa nyid do// de bzhin nyid la gzugs gang yang med de/ gzugs med pa ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin nyid gzugs
158b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang gzugs med pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la gzugs de ston kyang de bzhin nyid gzugs su mi byed do// de gzugs med cing rtsod pa
159a1(dkon brtsegs): med kyang lus dang gzugs thams cad kyang ton te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rtog go// de bzhin
159a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag gi lus mnyam pa nyid la rtog go/ / lus ni shin tu ma skyes pa nyid yin pas na/ lus thams cad ni lus med par yang dag par mthong ngo // lus thams
159a3(dkon brtsegs): cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rab tu shes so/ / shes nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par sgrub bo// de chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs pas chos kyi sku nyid du 'gyur te/ phung po dang / khams
159a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye mched kyi lus ni ma yin no// de chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas na/ mthong bas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// thos pa dang reg pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// zhi ba'i blo gros
159a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rtsos thams cad bsdus te/ rtsi'i shing mang po las bu mo'i gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa legs par byas te/ legs par zin cing
159a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par byi dor byas pa de 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med de// der nad pa gang btsun pa rgyal po 'am/ rgyal
159a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i blon po chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gam/ blon po 'am/ rgyal phran gang dag 'ong ba de dag sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis sman gyi bu mo deng sprad nas/
159b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag phrad ma thag tu nad thams cad byang ste/ nad med cing bde la nyams pa med par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gang sman pa gzhan la med pa sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis 'jig rten gyi nang
159b2(dkon brtsegs): gso shes pa la ltos/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'ang sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'dod chags
159b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gdungs pa ji snyed pa dag gi lus la reg na/ reg ma thag tu de dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// lus yongs
159b4(dkon brtsegs): su gdung ba dang bral bar yang shes so/ / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyis sngon gyi smon lam shin tu dag pa'i phyir ro// zhi ba'i blo gros chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'di'ang bya
159b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus ni zas skom gyis bskyed pa ma yin/ kham gyis za ba'i zas kyis kyang lus
159b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba ma yin te/ de zas thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o// de zas za'ang med pa ma yin/ za'ang khong du 'jug par mi byed do//
159b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sku'i stobs kyis mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa la skye ba dang / shi 'pho dang / 'byung ba med kyang
160a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye ba dang / shi 'pho dang / 'byung ba'ang ston to// de 'chi 'pho'ang chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho med cing mngon par
160a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pa med par rab tu shes so/ / 'byung yang chos thams cad la 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so// skye'ang chos thams cad la skye ba med par rab tu shes so// de chos kyi sku dang ldan
160a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi zas dang ldan/ chos kyi stobs dang ldan zhing / chos la ston pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha'i sku/
160a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'i ska/ dpe med pa/ 'dra ba med pa/
160a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i sku/ sems dang
160a6(dkon brtsegs): yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang ma 'brel ba'i sku/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon po med pa la nges par
160a7(dkon brtsegs): brtags pa'i sku/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa nam mkha' khyab pa'i sku/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sku/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i sku/ 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i/
160b1(dkon brtsegs): sku/ migayo zhing rlom sems med pa'i sgra/ gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / mi gso ba thob pa'i sku/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sgra/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes pa
160b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku ste/ sa'i khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ chu'i khams kyis ma yin/ me'i khams kyis ma yin/ rlung gi khams
160b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ ma byung ba kun nas ma byung ba'o// 'byung ba chen po rnams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa'o// 'byung ba ma yin/ 'byung ba'i chos ma yin pa'o// 'jig rten thams
160b4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang mi mthun pa'o/ / mig las ma byung ba'o// rna ba la mi gnas pa'o// snas shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o// lces rab tu ma phye 'o// lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa'o// yid kyis nye
160b5(dkon brtsegs): bar spyad pa ma yin pa'o/ / sems dang mi 'jug pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mi 'jug/ mi ldog/ rjes su mi 'jug pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni
160b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yongs su dag pa la spyod cing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
160b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams na gling bzhi pa'ang rung / 'dzam bu'i gling yang rung grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor ji snyed yod pa thams cad du byang
161a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' mthong bar yang byed la/ bdud thams cad kyis mi mthong bar yang snang bar 'gyur ro// de mthong bar yang byed la/ mthong bar snang ba'ang med do//
161a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar mi byed pas kyang mthong bar snang ngo // mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba'ang ma yin no// sems can yongs su smin par bya bas
161a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu phye ba yin yang lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las kyang mi nyams yongs su mi nyams so/ / de lus mi rtag pa dang / lus sdug bsngal ba dang / lus bdag med par yang
161a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la ston la/ lus kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de lus rab tu dbye ba'ang sems can rnams la ston la/ rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dag gis lus
161a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag kyang byed pa po med pa dang / tshor ba po med pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // lus rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam
161a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mig yor lta bur yang rab tu shes shing / de lus kyi las yongs su dag par sems can rnams la ston to// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad byang chub sems
161a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang / lus kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// de bas lhag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bskal pa brgya stong ngam
161b1(dkon brtsegs): de bas kyang lhag par ston to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bstan kyang zad par mi 'gyur te
161b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba bstan pa ni de tsam du tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / nges pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // bam po gnyis pa/
161b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang / ngag gi las
161b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyang de snyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs ji snyed par
161b5(dkon brtsegs): sgra la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do/ / sems can de dag gi sgra brjod pa dang / tshig gi lam brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dang / smra ba dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / mtshan
161b6(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / spyod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal brjod pa ji snyed pa'i sgra la 'jug pa de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug ste/ tha na
161b7(dkon brtsegs): srin bu dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang ma dang / phye ma leb kyi sgra dag la'ang ye shes mthong ba 'jug go// sgra'i rnam par rig pa bsgrags pa ji lta bus sems can de dag gi
162a1(dkon brtsegs): lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra'i rnam par rig pa bsgrags pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i kha'i sgo nas 'byung ngo //
162a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ji ltar sems can mtha' ma gang yang med// de ltar skyes pa'i rabs de dpag tu med// bskal pa brgya snyed bshad kyang
162a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ma med/ / bsam yas de dag ji ltar bshad par bya// skyon rnams med pa bdag nyid che ba'i tshig/ sems dang bsam pa rgya chen rab ston pa// nam mkha' lta bur gang med bri med pa// 'on
162a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang dpe don ldan pa bshad par bya/ / zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / brgya byin gyi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi sgra skad
162a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'byin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang /
162a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi ma smang
162a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig/ gang ba med cing bri med nam mkha' bzhin// sems dang bsam pa rgya chen bstan pa dag/ de dag brjod pa rnams la nan tan nyon// byams la sbyor dang snying rjer 'jug pa dang // dga' ba
162b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni btang snyoms rab bshad de/ / tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i sgra phyung bas// legs bshad de ni tshangs pa tshim par byed// gang dag brgya byin rol mo yid 'ong sgra// de dag de yi sgra
162b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod zil gyis gnon/ / rol mo sgra dbyangs byung ba de las ni// chos rnams rab tu dbye ba dpag med 'byung // mi 'am ci yi sgra dag gang yod pa// de bas de yi sgra mchog phun sum tshogs/
162b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'dod chags 'bar bar mi byed de// de yi tshig gis mi ci dga' bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i khams na yid 'ong sgra yod pa// rol mo'i sgra dang lha yi sgra mang po// chos kyi don 'byor dge bar ldan pa yi//
162b4(dkon brtsegs): de yi tshig gis kun tu tshim par byed// mi yi 'dren pa'i tshig gi mchog thos nas// 'dod chags zhi zhing zhe sdang rab tu zhi// gti mug g.yo dang nga rgyal dregs pa zhi// don rnams gtan la
162b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs shing the tshom med/ / gzugs kyi khams na lha rnam gang gnas pa// de dag yid ni de yis tshim par byed// mi yi gtso bo'i tshig rnams thos nas ni// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur ces byang
162b6(dkon brtsegs): chub tshol/ / klu dbang dri ba lto 'phye che rnams kyi// rol mo sna tshogs sgra yod de dag pas// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i sgra bsgrags pa// thams cad rab tu dga' ba rgya chen byed// 'dzam gling
162b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni tha dad phyogs rnams su/ / kun na sgra skad mtha' yas gyur mod kyi// de yi skad kyi rnam pa bsgrags gyur na// de thos mi rnams thar pa rjes su 'thob// sa p+pa'i lha dang de bzhin par snang lnga/
163a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag sgra skad 'jug pa ci 'dra ba// de ltar de la de yi sgra yang 'jug/ rnam par nges bden gtam yang de 'dra'o// ngang pa khrung khrung ka la bing ka dang // rma bya na ce
163a2(dkon brtsegs): khu byug shang shang te'u/ / ri skegs dang ni ngur pa kun la kun// ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed// stag dang seng ge de bzhin dom dang spre'u// gzig dang byi la ri dgas glang chen pas//
163a3(dkon brtsegs): rta dang khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa kun// ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed// gang dag rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang // rkang madra dang ni de bzhin rkang med rnams// bskul dang chad pas
163a4(dkon brtsegs): bcud dang phan gdags phyir/ / kun la de yi sgra skad shes pa 'jug/ sems can gang dag stong gsum 'jig rten na// rab bam 'bring ngam 'on te tha ma 'am// dmyal ba dud 'gro gshin
163a5(dkon brtsegs): rje'i 'jig rten dang / / lha mi rnams dang de ni skad kyang mthun// ji ltar rigs par byed pa ston kyang ni// mi sems 'du shes med cing rtog pa med// mtshan ma med cing 'dzin med
163a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba med/ / mnyam par gzhag pas sems can 'khrug pa med// dag pa'i sems can gal te 'dod na'ang // de la 'bad dang sems 'dzin med par ni// bye ba'i zhing dang de yi gong
163a7(dkon brtsegs): du yang / / gang+gA'i bye snyed dbyangs kyis go bar byed// stong gsum 'jig rten bdud gang ci yod pa// de dag de yi 'jig rten sgra thos nas// chung mar bcas te 'jigs skrag la gor du//
163b1(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud par byed// sems can gang dag rab tu smra 'dod dang // nga rgyal zil non su la'ang mi 'dud pa// de dag de yi gsal ba'i tshig thos nas// thal mo sbyar te/
163b2(dkon brtsegs): gus par 'dud par byed// 'on pa glen pa dag dang lce med dang // rig pa rnams dang gang dag skad 'dzer ba// de dag de yi legs smras snyan thos nas// sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin par
163b3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ / nyon mongs gdungs shing nyon mongs gzir ba dang // nyes pa'i 'gyod pa brgya yis dkris pa rnams// de dag de yi dge tshig dag thos nas// 'gyod pa btul bar gyur cing bsil bar
163b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ / sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun sgra// mi rtag sgra thos nas ni sems can rnams// sbyin dang thos dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan blo gros brtson
163b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ / sangs rgyas dbyangs dang bar med gang gnas pa// mtha' yas dbyangs ldan mtha' yas ye shes can// de dag rnams kyi yon tan thams cad ni// bskal pa bye mang brjod kyang
163b6(dkon brtsegs): zad mi nus/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni chags pa 'am/ sdang ba 'am/ rmongs pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa 'am/ thogs pa 'am/ nye bar thog
163b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ dman pa 'am/ rab tu dman pa 'am/ brlang ba 'am/ zher 'debs pa 'am/ mi rdzogs pa 'am/ rtsub pa 'am/ rjes su chags pa 'am/ khong khro ba 'am/
164a1(dkon brtsegs): byung rgyal lam/ bag la nyal ba 'am/ 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i tshig gam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs bag la nyal ba 'am/ mi brtan pa 'am/ gtsam pa

164a5(dkon brtsegs): gshe bar byed pa 'am/ gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ba 'am/ bdag dang pha rol gdung bar byed pa 'am/ tshig blang bar 'os pa ma yin pa 'am/ tshig gzung bar 'os pa ma yin pa 'am/

164a7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ chos dang mi ldan pa 'am/ 'gal ba 'am/ gnod pa 'am/ dus las yol ba 'am/ tshod las 'da' ba 'am/ lung bstan pa la thogs pa 'am/ tshul 'chos pa dang
164b1(dkon brtsegs): kha gsag dang ldan pa 'am/ rnyed pas rnyed pa 'dod pa'i tshig gam/ 'byung ba ma yin pa ston pa 'am/ mig 'khrul par 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ som nyi'i
164b2(dkon brtsegs): tshig gam/ sdug par byed pa'i tshig gam/ mi sdug cing gnang du 'bebs pa'i tshig gam/ khyad du gsod pa'i tshig gam/ rang gi phyogs bsten pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi
164b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs tshar bcad pa'i tshig gam/ bdag bstod pa la rjes su chags pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi bstod pa la bar du gcod par smra ba 'am/ 'thing slad dang / gzhogs 'drid kyi tshig
164b4(dkon brtsegs): gam/ gzhan la rab tu rlom pa'i tshig gam/ bya ba ma yin pa'i tshig gam/ bya ba dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam/ gsang rdol ba'i tshig gam/ ngag bsrungs pa ma yin pa'i tshig

164b6(dkon brtsegs): dus ma yin par gleng ba'i tshig gam/ zug rngus gnang du 'debs pa'i tshig gam/ gzhan gyi nyes pa kun brjod pa'i tshig gam/ kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par mi byed pa'i tshig gam
164b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis brda sprod pa'i tshig gam/ las dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa'i tshig mi 'byin to// zhi ba'i blo gros yang byang chub sems
165a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i ngag ni sgra'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang / bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu grub pas bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa yin te/
165a2(dkon brtsegs): de gang smra ba de de lta bu nyid yin no// gal te de shing drung na 'dug gam/ 'chag gam/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rung / la la zhig 'ongs nas/ kye skyes bu shing ljon pa 'di la
165a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dab ma ji snyed cig yod ces zer na/ de shing ljon pa de la'ang mi lta/ 'dab ma la'ang mi bgrang bar/ shing ljon pa de 'dab ma ji snyed yod pa bzhin du mi nyung mi mang bar 'di snyed cig/

165b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa nyid mngon sum du gyur pa ma gtogs par lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri ba 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ rlung lha 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/
