165b4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i dus na bram ze sngo bsangs zhes bya ba zhig kyang byung ngo // yang de'i dus na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang
165b5(dkon brtsegs): bo zhes bya ba yal ka dang 'dab ma mang pos yog pa/ khor yug tshad rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig byung ste/ der drang srong snang ba de gnas so// de na gnas pa'i tshe nges mngon par
165b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i stobs kyis shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang po de'i yal ga grangs la du yod pa lo bcu gnyis dang zhag bdun gyi bar du bgrangs te rtogs par byas pa shes par byas so/ / de nas dus
165b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan zhig na bram ze sngo bsangs zhes bya ba grong khyer nas kha zas blangs te/ nyin mo gnas pa'i phyir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas/ des zas kyi bya ba byas te/
166a1(dkon brtsegs): drang srong snang ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der song nas/ mngon sum du yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba'i gtam mang po byas te/
166a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas drang srong snang ba zhes bya bas/ bram ze sngo bsangs zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye bram ze ma'i 'jig rten sems can gyi ris na/ gang
166a3(dkon brtsegs): shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po 'di'i 'dab ma'i grangs du yod pa rtsi ba 'am/ rtogs par byed pa 'am/ shes par byed nus pa'i sems can 'ga' yod dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa mchis
166a4(dkon brtsegs): so/ / drang srong gis smras pa/ bram ze de gang yin/ bram zes smras pa/ btsun pa bdag gis bgrang bar bgyi'o// drang srong gis smras pa/ kye bram ze de'i phyir grangs shig
166a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bram ze sngo bsangs de shing ljon pa de la'ang mi lta/ 'dab ma rnams la'ang mi bgrang bar skad cig la 'dab ma rtog pa la zhugs nas/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa
166a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag smras so/ / mi 'khrugs drug cu pang stong phrag/ bcu drug dang ni khyad phyin phrag/ bcu gsum dag dang dkrig pa phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa drug khrag khrig phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa ba
166a7(dkon brtsegs): gang snang ngo / / sum cu rtsa dgu khrag khrig phrag/ sum cu dang ni ther 'bum phrag/ brgyad stong dang yang bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'dab 'di mchis// bram ze dam pa bdag
166b1(dkon brtsegs): gis 'tshal/ / de skad thos nas sngo bsangs la// snang bas smras pa bram ze'i mchog/ khyod ni bden pa'i tshig smra ba// legs so legs so 'di bden no// lo ni khyud kor bcu
166b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang / / nyi ma mdun du mngon shes kyis// 'dab ma rnams ni bdag gis bgrangs// gtso bo khyod kyis skad cig mkhyen// khyod ni gzigs pa mi mdzad cing // bgrang ba mi mdzad
166b3(dkon brtsegs): skad cig tu/ / 'dab ma rtogs pa'i rjes su zhugs// mkhyen 'di nyid kyi'am lha yis bstan// bram ze bdag la don 'di gsungs// sngo bsangs kyis smras pa/ kye btsun pa gson
166b4(dkon brtsegs): cig/ 'di ni lha yis smras min mi yis te// bdag tshig bden pa'i rjes 'brang don bzhin 'jug/ nam mkha' zad par grub par 'gyur srid kyi// kho bo brdzun du smra ba mi byed do// snang
166b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa bdag nyid chen po shA ri'i bu/ / bram ze sngo bsangs gyur pa shAkya seng ge ste// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams kyi ngag 'di 'dra// bden la gnas shing don dang chos dang ldan pa yin/
166b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag yongs su dag pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang / ngag yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan
166b7(dkon brtsegs): par zad kyi/ de bas gong du bstan na byang chub sems dpa'i ngag yongs su dag pa tshad zin pa 'am/ mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya
167a1(dkon brtsegs): ste gnyis pa'o/ / / gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so//
167a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyis byas
167a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams mi byed do// mngon par shes pa las kyang ma nyams la/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams kyang byed do// mngon par shes pas
167a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang rnam par rtsen la/ bya ba thams cad kyang ston to// mngon par shes pa la'ang gnas la/ 'jug pa chen po la'ang gnas so// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/
167a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ chos thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar bya'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni mi zad
167a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam pa ste/ thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni gzugs thams cad gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir/ gzugs thams cad mthong ba'o// de dag gi mngon par
167a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i sgra mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ sgra thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba dang /
167b1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog cing lta ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni bskal pa mtha' yas pa rjes su dran pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chad pa'o//
167b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon du gyur cing / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni zag pa zad pa'i
167b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mthun pa dang / dus la lta zhing dus las mi yol ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa 'phags pa la mngon par phyogs pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun
167b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni don zab cing bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o// de
167b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gi mngon par shes pa de ni byang chub kyi snying po sgrub cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mchog yin no/ / de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos kyi 'khor lo
167b6(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba dang mthun pa'o/ / de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni sems can thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'o// de dag gi mngon par shes pa de ni chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang
167b7(dkon brtsegs): bskur ba thob pa'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// sems yongs su dag pa de nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su byang ba dang /
168a1(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rab tu dul ba dang / legs par sbyangs pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting
168a2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par 'jog kyang shin tu zad pa dang / mi skye ba nyid du ltung ba'ang ma yin/ bsams bzhin du'ang 'dir skye la/ 'dod pa'i khams
168a3(dkon brtsegs): na 'khrugs pa'ang med/ bcings bzhin du skye ba'ang ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'chi 'pho ba'ang ma yin/ bcings bzhin du 'byung ba'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
168a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa las grol ba'o/ / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba'o// phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa las grol ba'o// des na de grol bzhin du
168a5(dkon brtsegs): skye'o/ / grol bzhin du 'chi 'pho'o// grol bzhin du 'byung ngo // de skye'ang theg pa chen po las nyams pa med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis kyang phun sum tshogs so//
168a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yongs su tshol yang mi rnyed mi dmigs so// de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos su rtogs so// de ltar na
168a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos dang chos thams cad kyang chos ma yin la/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin par khas len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni kun tu btsal na'ang mi rnyed do//
168b1(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs so// chos gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsal na mi rnyed cing mi dmigs pa de la ni bgrang ba gang yang med de/ chos thams cad ni bgrang ba'i lam las yang dag par
168b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'o/ / gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni chos sam/ chos ma yin pa la mngon par zhen pa med do// mngon par zhen pa med pa ni chos rnams kyi don te/
168b3(dkon brtsegs): la rlom sems su byed pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i gnod pa chen por 'gyur ro// gang yang rlom sems med pa de la ni don nam/ don ma yin pa de'i mdun na mi 'dug go/ don du mi lta ba
168b4(dkon brtsegs): blo ni gang du'ang thogs pa med do/ / de ni blo thogs pa med pa'o// gang blo thogs pa med pa de ni chags pa med pa'o// gang chags pa med pa de ni rgyun chad pa med pa'o// gang rgyun chang pa
168b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa de ni nyams pa med pa'o/ / gang nyams pa med pa de'i brtsal ba don med par mi 'gyur ro// gang gi brtsal ba don med par mi 'gyur ba de la skyon med do// gang la skyon med pa de la
168b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi ba med do/ / gang la bdag gi ba med pa de la yongs su 'dzin pa med do// gang la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la rtsod pa med do// gang la rtsod pa med pa de la 'gyod pa med do//
168b7(dkon brtsegs): gang la 'gyed pa med pa de ni mi rtsod pa ste/ dge sbyong gi chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gang dge sbyong gi chos dang ldan pa de nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'o// gang nam mkha'
169a1(dkon brtsegs): dang lag mthil du mnyam pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi gtogs so/ / gzugs kyi khams su mi gtogs/ gzugs med pa'i khams su mi gtan
169a2(dkon brtsegs): gang thams cad du gtogs pa ma yin pa de la ni kha dog med/ rtags med/ dbyibs med do// gang la kha dog med/ rtags med/ dbyibs med pa de 'dra ba nyid rjes su rtog
169a3(dkon brtsegs): de ci 'dra ba rjes su rtogs pa de 'dra ba nyid rab tu rtogs so/ / ci'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa dang rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la rjes su rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rab tu rtogs par bya
169a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas/ de'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba'o//
169a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba ni gang byams pa'ang yin la/ bdag med pa nyid kyang yin/ snying rje'ang yin la/ sems can
169a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid kyang yin/ dga' ba'ang yin la/ srog med pa nyid kyang yin/ btang snyoms kyang yin la/ gang zag med pa nyid kyang yin/ sbyin pa'ang yin la/ sems dul
169a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang yin/ tshul khrims kyang yin la/ sems zhi ba nyid kyang yin/ bzod pa'ang yin la/ sems mi zad pa nyid kyang yin/ brtson 'grus kyang yin la/ sems dben pa nyid
169b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang yin/ bsam gtan yang yin la/ sems nges par sems pa nyid kyang yin/ shes rab kyang yin la/ rgyu ba med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
169b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang yin la/ dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang yin la/ yang dag par sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
169b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang yin la/ spros pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dad pa'ang yin la/ chags pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ brtson 'grus kyang yin la/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sems
169b4(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang yin/ dran pa'ang yin la/ rang byung gi sems nyid kyang yin/ ting nge 'dzin kyang yin la/ mnyam pa nyid shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ shes rab kyi dbang po'ang yin la
169b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dbang po rnams kyang yin la/ chos thams cad la dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ stobs rnams kyang yin la/ mi brdzi ba'i sems
169b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang yin la/ blos rab tu 'byed pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ lam bsgom pa nyid kyang yin la/ sgom pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/
169b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyang yin la/ sems nye bar zhi ba nyid kyang yin/ lhag mthong yang yin la/ rjes su mi mthong ba'i sems nyid kyang yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa sgom pa'ang yin la/ shin tu
170a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'ang yin la/ yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ chos yid la byed pa'ang
170a2(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dge 'dun yid la byed pa'ang yin la/ mi gnas pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sems can yongs su smin par yang
170a3(dkon brtsegs): byed la/ gzod ma nas dag pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'ang yin la/ chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ sangs rgyas kyi
170a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su dag pa'ang yin la/ sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang yin la/ mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ phyir mi
170a5(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa'i sa'ang yin la/ ldog pa dang 'jug pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ mtshan rab tu thob pa'ang yin la/ mtshan med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ byang chub kyi snying po'i
170a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyan nyid kyang yin la/ khams gsum gyi snying po'o sems nyid kyang yin/ bdud tshar gcod pa'ang yin la/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/
170a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang yin la/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med par khong du chud pa'i sems nyid kyang yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang yin la/ mi 'jug mi ldog pa'i sems nyid
170b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang ston la/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems
170b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang / sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o// sems dag pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par rtogs te/ sems can thams cad
170b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems la byang chub kyi sems de rjes su zhugs pa yin no/ / byang chub kyi sems de la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang snang bar gyur pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na
170b4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /
170b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi gsang ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/
170b6(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags las stong phrag bdun khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye
170b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par
171a1(dkon brtsegs): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams
171a2(dkon brtsegs): cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / steng gi bar snang las me tog gi char mngon par bab bo// ma skyod par sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra stong snyed rab tu grags par gyur te/ sil snyan dang
171a3(dkon brtsegs): rol ma'i sgra de dag las kyang gang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin cing mos par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
171a4(dkon brtsegs): chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag ni byang chub kyi sems la rmongs pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu
171a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yin no/ / de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par rig par byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa'o// sems can de
171a6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni sems can thams cad la phan thogs par gyur pa yin te/ sems can de dag ni lung bstan pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i /
171a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal
171b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra las 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba khyod kyis thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags te/ 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba de su'i
171b2(dkon brtsegs): mthu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams sprin ldan zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po sprin dbyangs
171b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zhes bya ba'i drung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen
171b4(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / lag na rdo rjes bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang mnyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa
171b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag la'ang blta ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba de lus mi snang bar steng gi bar snang la
171b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas/ nga dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs shing / sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra'ang rab tu phyung nas/ sil snyan dang
171b7(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i sgra de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung de skad bka' stsal nas ring por ma lon par/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs
172a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bar snang de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas/ bcom
172a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan
172a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// yang bcom ldan 'das ngo 'di
172a4(dkon brtsegs): skad du 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bstan pa chen po 'di bstan to zhes gsung ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di 'dra ba'i spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad
172a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa thob par rngo thogs lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod
172a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par 'ongs so/ / khyod 'dir 'ongs pa legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u gsang ba pa'i bdag po las thos par 'gyur ro//
172a7(dkon brtsegs): sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ gsang ba pa'i
172b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag po 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la 'dis bsnyen bkur byas/ 'dis smon lam ci 'dra ba zhig btab na gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i
172b2(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang ldan par gyur snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems
172b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rga chen po tshad med pa/ bsam
172b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa/ dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
172b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/
172b6(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten gyi khams
172b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par brgyan pa de'ang 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/ lha dang mi mang pos gang ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ gseg ma dang
173a1(dkon brtsegs): gyo mo med pa/ rtswa dag der skyes pa'ang 'jam pa/ gos ka tsa lene di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar sngo zhing g.yung drung 'khyil par g.yas su
173a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khyil ba/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ gom pa bor na sor bzhi thur du dma' ba/ rkang pa bteg na sor bzhi gyen du mtho ba/ ha cang yang mi grang /
173a3(dkon brtsegs): ha cang mi tsha ba'i rlung chung ngu bsil ba 'dod pa dang mthun par ldang ba'o// sa chen po de'ang bai DUR+Ya sngon pos brgyan pa'o// sems can de rnams kyang rnam pa bzang zhing mkhas pa dang ldan par
173a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug chung ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad chung ba/ legs par bshad pa'i don kun shes par byed nus pa'i mthu dang ldan pa sha stag
173a5(dkon brtsegs): go/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun ni khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod do// byang
173a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do/ / de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug thub bo// mi rnams kyang dus ma yin par glo bar du 'chi ba med do//
173a7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rnam par brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten par ma rab tu 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/
173b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu lo legs pa/ yangs shing thag gru che ba byung ste/ gling bzhi pa re re'ang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong par gyur to// der grong khyer chen po'ang bar bar na dpag tshad gcig yod
173b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ grong dang / tshong dus dang / ri khrod stong gis bskor ba byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros gling bzhi pa'i mdzes par snang ba de'i dbus ra pho brang grong khyer rnam par dag pa can zhes
173b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ byang dang lhor ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi shar dang nub tu ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa/ skyed mos tshal khris rab tu brgyan pa/ grong dang /
173b4(dkon brtsegs): tshong dus dang / ri khrod khris kun nas bskor ba yod do// zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po'i pho brang rnam par dag pa can zhes bya ba der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba
173b5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/ gling bzhi la dbang ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan pa
173b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig byung ngo / / zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi grong khyer gyi dbus ra/ khang pa rgya re zhing yangs pa chu zheng du
173b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad bcu drug yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rab rim pa bdun dang / rta babs dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rim bdun gyis kun nas bskur ba brtsigs so// ra ba'i nang na
174a1(dkon brtsegs): skyed mos tshal chen po bzhi byas te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal chen po dang / yon tan gyis mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba dang
174a2(dkon brtsegs): rma bya'i mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dus kyi bde ba zhes bya'o// rdzing khyon dpag tshad phyed pa rin po che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi glegs ma'i babs stegs
174a3(dkon brtsegs): can gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ rin po che'i pad+mas kun nas khebs pa/ ngang pa dang / chu skyar dang / bya gar dang / ngur pa dag sgra
174a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa bzhi byas te/ 'di lta ste/ dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / spos mchog ces bya ba dang / rku rgyur rjes su 'bab pa zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po
174a5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor bdun 'bum yod de/ thams cad kyang mtshan dang ldan pa'i na chung bud med rin po che'i longs spyod dang 'dra ba sha stag go// de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa
174a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rab tu zhugs par gyur pa dag go/ / de la bu stong du tshang ba yod de/ dpa' brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha
174a7(dkon brtsegs): rol gyi snga rab tu 'joms pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa sha stag go/
174b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
174b2(dkon brtsegs): du rten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal dang / yul gyi mos bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
174b3(dkon brtsegs): byas/ mchod par byas so// zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de la
174b4(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu lo bye ba tshang bar yid du 'ong ba'i bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / na bza' dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa'i longs spyod kyis bsnyen
174b5(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas te/ dge slong re re la'ang rim gro bya ba dang spyad pa'i phyir g.yog gsum gsum phul lo// zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la
174b6(dkon brtsegs): bsti stang dang mchod pa bya bar mos pa dang / chos mnyan pa don du gnyer bas bag yod par gyur te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan don du mi gnyer ro// de dag bag yod cing dam pa'i chos nyan
174b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems kyis nges par sems pas/ ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to// de dag bskyed nas steng gi bar snang la ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du skyed mos
175a1(dkon brtsegs): tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer dang / tshong dus nas tshong dus dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mthar gyis rgyu zhing
175a2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra'o/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba brgya lam rnyed par 'gyur// mir skye ba yang shin tu dka' bas rnyed// grogs po dga' dang dad dang chos mnyan pa// 'di 'dra bskal pa
175a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyar yang rnyed pa dka'/ / mi dbang rgyal po de ni dbyung ste// rab tu zhi bar 'gro ba'i chos ston gyis// bde bar gshegs pa de yi drung du dang // chos thos nas ni bde 'gror 'gro bar gyis//
175a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thos pas ni ngan 'gro rnam par spong // chos thos pas ni bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// chos thos pas ni nyon mongs rnams kyang zhi// bsil ba'i dngos po dam pa thob par 'gyur// de dag
175a5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs bcad 'di dag rab brjod pas/ / sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// lha rnams a la la zhes lan brgya smras// lha yi me tog yid 'ong char du bab// ston pa blta phyir gang dag
175a6(dkon brtsegs): bskul ba rnams/ / rkang gnyis mchog gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// de dag thal sbyar gus bcas 'khod gyur pa// de dag bgrang bas dpag par mi nus so// rgyal bas de dag rnams kyi
175a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam mkhyen nas/ / de dang mthun pa'i chos ni rab tu bshad// bde bar gshegs los chos thos bye ba phrag/ sum cu rtsa drug byang chub mchog la zhugs// bye ba brgya phrag gsum tshang mi
175b1(dkon brtsegs): nyung ba/ / de dag chos mchog mig ni rnam par dag/ srid par kun tu yid byung sems gyur nas// de dag der ni bstan 'dir rab byung // gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig de nyid du/
175b2(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa bzung zhing de bzhin gso sbyong blangs// ston la mchod pa byas shing chos mnyan nas// de dag slar yang rang gi gnas su dang / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar rgyal du
175b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu de dag gis pa yul 'khor srung la mchod pa'i wa gyi phyir/ lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya che zhing yangs pa/ bkod pas legs par brgyan pa/ ba gaH
175b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang / rta babs dang / kha khyer gyis bskor ba zhig byas te/ 'dzam bu gling ril gyis kyang tsan ngan sbrul gyi snying po srang phyed kyi rin du mi chog pa de lta bu'i
175b5(dkon brtsegs): tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya che zhing yangs pa/ chu zheng du dpag tshad bcu yod pa/ rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ ka ba bzhi thug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin
175b6(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par phye ba zhig byas par gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung de nam bcom ldan 'das nyid la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang

180b1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po la 'dug nas/ nang du yang dag bzhag cing 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/
180b2(dkon brtsegs): pa sha stag na/ gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad kyi nang na gang thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bdag gis brtag go snyam mo//
180b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis de'i mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa byed du bcug ste/ byi dor legs par byas shing / legs par zin par byas nas/ gzhon nu de dag thams
180b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi ming bris te/ bum pa de'i nang du bcug nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma sna tshogs blta na sdug pa byas nas/ pad+ma de'i steng du bum pa de bzhag ste/ zhag bdun du lha'i mchod pa

180b6(dkon brtsegs): ming de dag mchod pa'o tshe na/ lha'i bu khri mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson par gyur to// zhag bdun du mchod pa byas nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang / de'i bu stong dang / gzhon nu g
180b7(dkon brtsegs): nyis kyi mdun du ril gyis gser las byas pa'i khri'u bzang po'i steng du bum pa de bzhag nas/ nang gi rmi bum pa de'i nang nas ming de rnams phyung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe thams
181a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi thog mar rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba de'i ming byung bar gyur to/ / ming de byung ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug
181a2(dkon brtsegs): tu g.yos so/ / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad pang na sil snyan yod pa de dag kyang ma dkrol bar bye bo phrag du ma'i sgra byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/ zhi ba'i blo gros
181a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na thams cad kyi thog mar ming byung ba rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
181a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'khor ba 'jig de de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/
181a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gser thub de de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po zhi ba zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ bcom
181a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'od srung de de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po zhi ba zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ngo // de ni nga yin
181a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ / de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu ska rags can zhes bya ba'i ming byung bar gyur te/ de ni byams pa zhes bya
181b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu mchog gi blo gros zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ de ni seng ge zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i
181b2(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu glog gi lha zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste/ de ni tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bzang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung
181b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de ni me tog dam pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni me tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
181b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni skar ma rgyal zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu
181b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni spyan legs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rdul med ces bya ba'i ming byung ste/
181b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni lag bzangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu blo gros rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni 'od ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par
181b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dge ba bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu
182a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu phyogs 'byor pa gre bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni mngon 'phags gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu
182a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni yon tan gyi mchog mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dpal sbas
182a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni nor dpal zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu lus shin tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni ye
182a4(dkon brtsegs): shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni rin po che 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
182a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rin chen grags pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste/ de ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rgya cher
182a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar bu stong yod pa de'i nang nas gcig bzhag ste/ rgyal bu gzhon nu cod pan brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi bar du byung ngo // de ni yon tan mtha' yas grags
182a7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chung blo mtha' yas zhes bya ba de'i ming byung bar gyur pa dang / snag gi
182b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyen mtshams thams cad dang / spun rnams na re/ gang gi tshe bdag cag thams cad kyis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byas shing / sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad
182b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de'i 'og tu khyod kyis ci zhig byar yod ces smras pa dang / blo gros mtha' yas kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams 'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra// bdag gi yid la
182b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can zad pa med snyam bgyid/ / tshul khrims kyis ni bdag gi smon lam 'di dag gyur// bdag gi smon lam ci 'dra thams cad 'dir gson cig/ khyed kyi tshe tshad ji tsam pa dag bsdoms pa
182b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshogs kyi rgyal po ji snyed de dag kun bsdoms pa// thams cad bsdoms pa de snyed bdag gi tsher gyur te// bdag gi dge slong tshogs kyang de kun ma lus snyed// de yis tshigs su bcad
182b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni smras ma thag/ de yi tshe na legs zhes lha yis sgra phyung ste// sems can dag pa khyod kyi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/ khyod kyis ji ltar bsam bzhin sems can don mdzod cig/ zhi ba'i
182b6(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chung ngu gyur pa blo mtha' yas zhes bya ba de ni bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma pa mos pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros bskal pa
182b7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi tshe'i tshang ji tsam pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snang bar 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa de'i tshe tshad kyang de srid du 'gyur/ nyan rdzas kyi
183a1(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun yang de srid du 'gyur ro/ / bdag de ltar mos pas na de'i phyir mos pa zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar sangs rgyas stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dag sangs rgyas kyi
183a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa ji snyed mdzad pa de snyed de bzhin gshegs pa mos pas byed par 'gyur bas/ thabs mkhas pa'i tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i khyad par
183a3(dkon brtsegs): la ltos zhi ba'i blo gros de nas gzhon nu stong po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu chos sems dang / chos kyi blo gros dang / de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
183a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu khyod gnyis kyis smon lam ji lta bu zhig btab/ chos sems pas smras pa/ grogs po dag bdag ni khyed thams cad kyi lag na rdo rjer gyur te/ nang na spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba
183a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad las phyi rol du ma gyur la/ phyi nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan pa dang / mos pa dang / rtogs pa de ltar bdag smon lam 'debs so// chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/
183a6(dkon brtsegs): snag gi gnyen 'tshams dag/ bgres rabs dag/ bdag ni khyed rnams thams cad kyis byang chub thob pa na/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul te/ bdag gis bskul bas khyed thams cad kyis
183a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'di ltar 'debs so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de gnyis kyang smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das des lung bstan par gyur to//
183b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur pa de khyod kyis gzhan yin pa de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad

183b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'dzeg nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa zhes bya ba'i bar dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nur gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros btsun mo ma smad pa zhes
183b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i pang pa nas rdzus te byung ba khye'u chos kyi sems pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos kyi sems pa zhes bya bar gyur to//

183b6(dkon brtsegs): gros zhes bya bar gyur to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khor 'dir 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin no// rgyal
183b7(dkon brtsegs): b u gzhon nu de rnams kyis sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni bskal
184a1(dkon brtsegs): pa bzang po 'di nyid la mthar gyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de dag gi bsam pa thams cad 'byor pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu
184a2(dkon brtsegs): las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa chung mi za ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mi 'gal ba la ltos/ yul 'khor srung gi sngon gyi tshul gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / zhi ba'i blo gros
184a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyang sems can chen po de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o/ / tshig
184a4(dkon brtsegs): lhur blang bar mi bya'i byang chub kyi lam la mngon par brtson pas bsgrubs pa snying por bya'o/ / de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems skyed pas
184a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgrub pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
184a6(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la mngon par brtson pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba yongs su skang ba dang / thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi tshogs sogs pa ste/
184a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang byang chub kyi lam ni/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /
184b1(dkon brtsegs): drang ba nyid dang / g.yo med pa nyid dang / yangs pa nyid dang / sgrib pa med pa nyid dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / sems snyoms pa nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa nyid dang / sdig

184b4(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas legs par rtogs pa'o/ / lam de ni byams pa chen pos 'byung ba shes pa'i rjes su song ba'o// lam de ni snying rje chen pos phyir mi ldog pa'o// lam de ni dga'

184b6(dkon brtsegs): par rtog pa dang bral bas sdong du ma dang tsher ma med pa'o/ / lam de ni zhes 'gras pa'i sems med pas bde bar 'gro ba'o// lam de ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang

185a1(dkon brtsegs): cad dang bral bas bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o/ / lam de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang bral bas sems rlabs po cher 'gro ba'o// lam de ni
185a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhugs pa'o/ / lam de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che dang mthun pas rin po che chen

185a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chags pa dang khong khro ba med pas mtho dman med pa'o/ / lam de ni gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba med pas rdul dang bral ba'o// lam de ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bas bde

185a6(dkon brtsegs): lam ma yin pa de 'dra ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/ lam de la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub

185b1(dkon brtsegs): po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ci 'dra/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i phyogs tsam zhig la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na

185b5(dkon brtsegs): ston te/ rigs kyi bu de la lha dang mi kha cig 'dug pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig 'chag pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin

186a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par mthong ngo / / lha dang mi kha cig langs pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhengs par mthong ngo // lha dang mi kha cig mig mi 'dzums par lta ba gtso bor byed pa de
186a3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs par mthong ngo / / lha dang mi kha cig 'dzum pa byed pa gtso bor 'dzin pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad par mthong
186a4(dkon brtsegs): / / lha dang mi kha cig mdog gisar gyi kha dog lta bu gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mthong ngo // de bzhin du la las ni dngul gyi mdog tu
186a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo / / de bzhin du shel gyi mdog dang / bai DUR+Ya'i mdog dang / rdo'i snying po'i mdog dang / spug gi mdog dang / mu tig dmar po'i mdog dang / mu tig dkar po'i mdog dang /

186a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyi mdog dang / brgya byin gyi mdog dang / tshangs pa'i mdog dang / ba mo'i mdog dang ldong ros kyi mdog dang / mtshal gyi mdog tu mthong ngo // la las ni chu'i mdog dang
186b1(dkon brtsegs): la las ni mya ngan 'tshang gi me tog gi mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / sna ma'i me tog gi mdog dang / bar shi ka'i mdog dang / pad+ma'i mdog dang / ku mu ta'i mdog dang

186b3(dkon brtsegs): mdog dang / rin po che byu ru'i mdog dang / nor bu rin po che'i mdog dang / an da rnyil gyi mdog dang / nam mkha' dag pa'i gzi brjid kyi mdog dang / lha dang mi kha cig
186b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas par mos pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan par mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar yongs

186b6(dkon brtsegs): ngag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de'i nang nas sems can gcig gis sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / mdog dang /
186b7(dkon brtsegs): rtags dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam du sems shing mos te mngon par sgrub la/ sems can gcig gis ji lta ba bzhin du sems can de dag thams cad re res kyang de snyed la
187a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam du sems shing mos te mngon par sgrub la/ sems
187a2(dkon brtsegs): can gcig gi sems kyi mos pa gang yin pa de sems can gnyis pa'i ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems
187a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mos pa tshim par mdzad de/ ji ltar mos pa bzhin du sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mdog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang /
187a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam du shes mod kyi/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'am/ thugs kyi mdzad pa ni ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyis
187a5(dkon brtsegs): lhun gyis grub pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par mdzad pa'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / spong lam gyis
187a6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bzhugs so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa la/ gzugs su snang ba ci 'dra ba nye bar gzhag pa de 'dra ba nyid kyi gzugs
187a7(dkon brtsegs): brnyan de na lhag chad med par mtshungs par snang yang / me long gi dkyil 'khor ni mi sems mi rtog go// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mi dgongs mi rtog par
187b1(dkon brtsegs): lhun gyis grub par sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa tshim par mdzad do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o//
187b2(dkon brtsegs): bo'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/ las las byung ba
187b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ nyon mongs pa las byung ba ma yin/ pha ma las byung ba ma yin/ 'byung ba chen po'i nur nur po las byung ba ma yin/ sha dang khrag gis g.yogs pa ma yin/
187b4(dkon brtsegs): rus pa dang chu ba'i bog res sbrel ba ma yin/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang srog dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku med pa ste/ chos kyi sku dang
187b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs dang / mtshan med pa'i sku dang / spros pa med cing rgyu ba med pa'i sku yin yang / de gzugs dang mtshan gtso bor byed pa'i sems can sku bstan pas 'dul ba rnams kyi mig
187b6(dkon brtsegs): la snang bar 'gyur ro/ / gzugs las dben pa chos kyi sku dang / gnyid gtso bor byed pa'i sems can rnams la ni/ lha'i mig gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du bltar snang bar ma
187b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de la 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa'i sems can gyi nang nas kyang / kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong / kha cig gis ni mi mthong / kha cig/
188a1(dkon brtsegs): gis ni rgyang ring po na 'dug kyang mthong / kha cig gis ni nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong / kha cig gis ni thag ring po na 'dug la mthong / kha cig gis ni nye ba na
188a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug la mi mthong / la las ni dran pa'i rnam pas mthong la/ g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo // la las ni g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mthong la/ dran pa'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo //
188a3(dkon brtsegs): la las ni gzhan gyis nye bar bstan pas mthong zhing / bdag gis bltas pas mi mthong ngo // la las ni bdag gis bltas pas mthong la/ gzhan gyis bltas pas mi mthong ngo //
188a4(dkon brtsegs): la las ni rmi lam na mthong la/ sad pa na mi mthong ngo // la las ni sad pa na mthong la/ rmi lam na mi mthong ngo // la las ni mnyam par gzhag na mthong la/ langs na mi
188a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo / / la las ni langs na mthong la/ mnyam par gzhag na mi mthong ngo // la las ni sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la/ mi sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no// la las ni ma
188a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la/ sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no// la las ni ma brtsal bas mi mthong la/ brtsal bas mthong ngo // la las ni ma brtsal bas mthong la/ brtsal
188a7(dkon brtsegs): bas mi mthong ngo / / la las ni bsgrims na mthong la/ ma bsgrims na ma yin no// la las ni ma bsgribs na mthong la/ bsgribs na ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de
188b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'di dag dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa'i rnam par ston pa mdzad do// gang yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu lus dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam
188b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi ba/ mnyam par gzhag pa/ lus zhi ba/ dul ba de dag gi mig kyang 'khrul par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpag par bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma
188b3(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni kha dog tha dad pas tshad med pa'o// chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshung
188b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros nam mkhas ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab po// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song
188b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang thams cad kyis rjes su song ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni spros pa med pa'o//
188b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang spros pa mi mnga' 'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o// zhi ba'i
188b7(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med
189a1(dkon brtsegs): do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang 'gyur ba mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' 'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam
189a2(dkon brtsegs): mkha' ni gzugs su snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang sems can du snang ba thams cad du zhugs so// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di
189a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i nang du ni gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'dus so// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du'ang sems can du snang ba thams cad du 'dus so//
189a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la ni rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad rnam par 'phel lo// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin
189a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku las kyang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par 'phel lo/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni rtag pa'ang ma yin/ mi rtag pa'ang
189a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ cir yang brjod pa ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang rtag pa'ang ma yin/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin te/ cir yang brjod pa ma yin
189a7(dkon brtsegs): no/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ste/ zhi ba'i bla gros gang de bzhin gshegs
189b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar nus pa de ni kha bas lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
189b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos 'di ltar mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das
189b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ grong khyer wA rA NA si na drang srong ltung ba ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig na
189b4(dkon brtsegs): shar phyogs logs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dgra 'dul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang zhes bya ba de/ bcom
189b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
189b6(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'
189b7(dkon brtsegs): shugs 'chang 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyi gtsug po ltar mi mthong la/ sku tshad med cing mtha' yas kyang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
190a1(dkon brtsegs): sku'i tshad dang mtha' yongs su btsal bar bya'o snyam mo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'changagis rang gi lus dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du
190a2(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bltas nas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad par mthong nas/ des 'di snyam du
190a3(dkon brtsegs): bsamra te/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba yin gyis/ bdag gis de bas kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad btsal
190a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o snyam nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas/ steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag brgya'i be
190a5(dkon brtsegs): snyed 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes
190a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang ston pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang phyin nas/ de 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar ma nus shing
190a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad dam/ mtha' yang mi dmigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i
190b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas
190b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag thag ji srid cig nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das nges
190b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa nas/ khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// byang chub sems dpa' shugs
190b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag thag ring mo zhig nas mchis kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i dbu'i gtsug mthong bar yang rngo ma thog la/
190b5(dkon brtsegs): sku'i tshad dam/ mtha' rtogs par yang rngo ma thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod gal te shugs 'di nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed
190b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di nyid kyis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par steng gi phyogs legs su song du zin kyang / bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gang yang dpe bzhag
190b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dper bya ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang
191a1(dkon brtsegs): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / gzugs dang / mtshan gyi dper bya ba'i dpe dgod pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs
191a2(dkon brtsegs): bapa'o/ / dpe gcig ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ltar dpe nam mkha' 'o// nam mkha' ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyang de tsam mo// ting nge 'dzin kyang de tsam mo//
191a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyang de tsam mo// rnam par grol ba'ang de tsam mo// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'ang de tsam mo// sku'ang de tsam mo// gsung yang de tsam mo// thugs kyang de
191a4(dkon brtsegs): tsam mo/ / gzugs kyang de tsam mo// mtshan kyang de tsam mo// de bas na nam mkha' tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med par khong du chud par bya'o zhes bstan to//
191a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis/ bcom ldan 'das de las bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur to// tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu
191a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid nas mi
191a7(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir bcom ldan 'das
191b1(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
191b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra ba yi// sangs rgyas chos la mi gang zhig/ pha rol tu ni mchi 'tshal ba//
191b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni nyam thag 'gyur ba lags// sangs rgyas sku ni blta slad du// gang+gA'i bye ba phrag brgya yi// bye ma ji snyed de snyed kyi// zhing rnams su ni bdag mchis so// de snyeng zhing du mchis
191b4(dkon brtsegs): nas ni/ / pad+ma can gyi zhing du mchi/ 'on kyang khyod kyi dbu gtsug dang // sku yi tshad kyang ma mthong lags// zhing den ni 'dren bzhugs pa// mtshan ni dpal gyi snying po lags/
191b5(dkon brtsegs): de yis bdag gi bsam mkhyen nas// 'di skad du ni bka' stsal to// la las sangs rgyas chos rnams la// dpe dgod ji snyed byed pa ni// de dag sangs rgyas mi 'tsham ste// de dag
191b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal la skur pa 'debs/ / 'di la dpe gcig yang dag ste// nam mkha'i khams su bstan pa lags// de ni sangs rgyas chos dang mthun// gang na'ang de yi tshad ma mchis// nam mkha'
191b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ji tsam par/ / sangs rgyas kyi ni tshul khrims dang // ting nge 'dzin dang rnam grol dang // rnam grol ye shes mthong de tsam// nam mkha'i tshad ni ji tsam pa// sangs rgyas
192a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang de tsam ste/ / 'jig rten mgon po'i dbu gtsug kyang / nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa lags// nam mkha' ji snyed khyab gyur pa/
192a2(dkon brtsegs): skus kyang de snyed khyab pa lags// sku yis ji skad khyad gyur ba// 'od kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab// 'od kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa// gsung gis kyang ni de snyed khyab// gsung
192a3(dkon brtsegs): gis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ / thugs kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab// thugs kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa// byams pas kyang ni de snyed khyab// byams pas ji snyed khyab gyur la//
192a4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis ni de snyed khyab// ye shes ji snyed khyab gyur la// sku yis kyang ni de snyed khyab// gang gis byang chub blo bskyed pa// de snyed bsod nams khyab par bgyid// byang
192a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems kyi bsod nams gang / / de la gal te gzugs mchis ni// nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste// de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur// sems can kun gyi bsod nams
192a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ / phung po ji snyed yongs bzung ba// de snyed byang chub sems dpa' yi// byang chub sems las rab tu 'byung // byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi// phung po ji/
192a7(dkon brtsegs): snyed brjod pa bas// dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin na// de bas bsod nams ches mang ngo // dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi nan tan du//
192b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye bar brjod mdzad kyang // mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur ma lags// dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa dang // byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de// stong pa nyid la
192b2(dkon brtsegs): mos pa yi/ / bcu drug cha yang mi ri lags// stong pa nyid la 'dir mos nas// byang chub sems kyang mi gtong dang // dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin bgyid pa// 'di ni
192b3(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams sdud pa lags/ / byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// chos kyi rtog pa 'di thob nas// de yis byang chub spyad spyod cing // sangs rgyas yon tan thob
192b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ / tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa na// zhing rnams bye ba rab tu g.yos// lha ni bye ba phrag stong gis// rol mo sil snyan bye ba blangs// sangs rgyas kyi ni che
192b5(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid/ / shugs 'chang gis ni bshang thos nas// srog chags bye ba phrag stong dag/ byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de// sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa po// rang byung
192b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas/ / gnas 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dpag yas bla na ma mchis lags// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gas
192b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / // bam po bzhi pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de na sems can du ma 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa dag las/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin
193a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo / / kha cig gis ni ma mthong ngo // de la gang dag gis mthong ba de dag ni dga' ba skyes nas lta'o// gang dag gis ma
193a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de dag ni cang mi smra bar gyur cing sdod do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhal zas mi gsol mod kyi/ sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zhal
193a3(dkon brtsegs): zas gsol bar mthong ngo / / zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub kyi rim gro ba'i lha gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba dag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring du 'brang zhing / de dag de
193a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du bzed na/ sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas kham tshad du blangs te gsol bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pas kham tshang du
193a5(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa de'ang snod de nyid na 'dug ste/ de lha dag gis khyer nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis skye gnas
193a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag de dag tu 'phangs pa/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / zas mi rnyed pa bkres pas nyam chung bar gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos kyi pham babs
193a7(dkon brtsegs): de byin nas/ sems can de dag gis kyang zas de zos pa dang bkres skom dang bral te/ bde zhing lus tshim nas bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
193b1(dkon brtsegs): sems skyed do/ / gang dag log par ltung ba yi dgas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa byang chub tu sems skyed par mi nus pa de dag la'ang de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i
193b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs des na yang khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas mi gsol zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zhal zas can du de ltar
193b3(dkon brtsegs): rig par bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sred med kyi bu ltar mkhregs pa/ sra ba/ snying po can/ mi shigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// zhi ba'i blo gros de
193b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni pho ba dang long ka med do/ / rnag gam/ khrag gam/ mchil ma 'am/ ngar snabs sam/ ngan skyugs sam/ mi gtsang ba med kyi
193b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi gar lta bu ste/ khong stong ma yin pa/ bu ga med pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ltar lci
193b6(dkon brtsegs): khyad rdo rje dang 'dra'ang / 'jam khyad ka tsi lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i che ba nyid la ltos zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi tshe gzi brjid che ba/ gaH
193b7(dkon brtsegs): brjid che ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba na/ sngon ma reg pa'i reg pa reg nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
194a1(dkon brtsegs): sems skyed de/ de dag nyon mongs pa skyed par mi 'gyur ba'i dus de dang chod de yod do// zhi ba'i blo gros sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa gang dag gis ni de bzhin
194a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar shes so/ / zhe sdang la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag byams
194a3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'thob bo/ / gti mug la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag ye shes kyi snang ba 'thob bo// cha mnyam pa la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag nyon mongs pa dang bral bar
194a4(dkon brtsegs): shes so/ / ser sna can gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag gtong ba la mos par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag tshul khrims la mos par 'gyur ro//
194a5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems can gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag bzod pa 'thob bo// le lo can gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag brtson 'grus la mos par 'gyur ro// sems g.yengs pa gang dag
194a6(dkon brtsegs): gis mthong na/ de dag ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// shes rab 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag shes rab la mos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mdor na sems can dkar po'i
194a7(dkon brtsegs): chos gang dang bral ba de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad rgyan chad nas/ dge ba'i sems
194b1(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o//
194b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul pa de'ang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/ de bzhin
194b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas sprul pa dag sprul to/ / sprul lo// sprul par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed par 'jig rten gyi khams
194b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di'ang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong de dang de dag tu sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de snyed du bzhud de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang
194b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du sku las 'od kha dog du ma pa/ kha dog tha dad
194b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ kha dog brgya stong pa dag phyung ste/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byed pa de'ang lhan gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' ba dang / mngon par 'du
194b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dang / sku'i 'phrin las te/ skra'i 'phrin las yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig
195a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan du zad kyi bskal pa 'am/ de bas lhag par brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'phrin las yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa mthar phyin par
195a2(dkon brtsegs): mi nus so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
195a3(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gsang ba pa'i
195a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje la lha'i dang mi'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
195a5(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje'i spyi bo la gzhag nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs
195a6(dkon brtsegs): pas kyang gnang zhing rjes su dgyes so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // gsang ba ba'i bdag po
195a7(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang /
195b1(dkon brtsegs): gsung gi 'phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
195b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge'i 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so// gsung
195b3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dbugs 'byung ba 'am/ rngub pa mi mnga' la// /
195b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par mi dpyod do// rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa med na gag mi 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang rnam par mi rtog/ rnam
195b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi dpyod/ rtog par mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog par mi mdzad/ mi gsung / mi brjod/ gsung bar mi mdzad kyang / sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/
195b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung ngo snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rig par mi mdzad
195b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / sems can yi ge lhur len pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag la chos ston to// bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa kun
196a1(dkon brtsegs): shes so snyam mo/ / de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms su mdzad do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems dang
196a2(dkon brtsegs): sgros dang / zhal gyi dkan dang / ljags dang / zhal gyi sgo nas sgra 'byung ba'ang med la 'byung bar yang grag go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgra 'byung ba de ni nam mkha'
196a3(dkon brtsegs): las byung na/ sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ngo snyam mo// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni
196a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan par 'byung ste/ rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mnyen pa'i gsung 'byung ba dang / 'jam pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid
196a5(dkon brtsegs): du 'thad pa dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od gsal ba dang / snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / snyan pa dang / dul ba
196a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi rtsub pa dang / ma brlang pa dang / rab tu 'dul ba dang / rnar snyan pa dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / sems tshim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar
196a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / dga' bde skyed pa dang / yongs su gdung ba meng pa dang / kun tu shes par bya ba dang / rnam par rig par bya ba dang / rnam par gsal ba dang / dga'
196b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa dang / mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang / kun shes par byed pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / rigs pa dang / 'brel pa dang / zlos pa'i skyon med pa dang
196b2(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i sgra'i shugs can dang / glang po che'i sgra skad dang / 'brag gi sgra dbyangs dang / klu'i dbang po'i sgra dang / dri za'i glu dbyangs dang / bya ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs dang
196b3(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs sgrags pa dang / shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grag pa dang / lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar snyan pa dang / rnga'i sgra dang / ma khengs pa dang / mi dma'
196b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / tshig zur chag pa med pa dang / ma tshang ba med pa dang / ma zhum pa dang / mi gzhan pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang
196b5(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa dang / chub pa dang / rgyun chags pa dang / 'brel ba dang / sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang / dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / ma smad pa
196b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / ma rtabs pa dang / 'khor kun tu grags pa dang / 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa dang / zhe sdang 'dul ba dang / gti mug sel ba dang /
196b7(dkon brtsegs): bdud tshar gcod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'byung ba ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni yan lag drug cu rtsa bzhi pa de dag dang ldan par
197a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo / / zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing sems
197a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du nga mdo'i sde 'am/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad ba'i sde 'am/ lung du
197a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i sde 'am/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde 'am/ ched du brjod pa'i sde 'am/ gleng gzhi'i sde 'am/ de lta bu byung ba'i sde 'am/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde 'am/ shin
197a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyas pa'i sde 'am/ rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde 'am/ gtan la bab par bstan pa'i snga 'am/ dpe 'am/ sngon gyi tshul lam/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde 'am
197a5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu bsnyad pa 'di ston to zhe 'am/ rab tu gsal bar mdzad do zhe 'am/ rab tu shes par mdzad do zhe 'am/ rab tu 'jog go zhe 'am/ rnam par 'byed do zhe 'am/ rnam par
197a6(dkon brtsegs): 'grel to zhe 'am/ brjod do zhe 'am/ yang dag par bsgrags par mdzad do snyam du mi dgongs so// de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa ci 'dra ba dge slong gi 'khor
197a7(dkon brtsegs): ram/ dge slong ma'i 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ram/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam
197b1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor yang rung ste/ der de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa dang / de dag ci 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos par dgengs par
197b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes kyang / chos bstan pa de ni phan tshun gyis nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa la gnod
197b3(dkon brtsegs): pa med par thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun tu shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan
197b4(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa dag gi spyod pa tshad med pa gsungs na/ sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes 'byung ba ni sems can dbang po mthu chung ba rnams
197b5(dkon brtsegs): gzud pa'i phyir bstan pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bstan gyi/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gyi spyod pa ni tshad med/ sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams kyi sbed pa gang yin pa
197b6(dkon brtsegs): de bskal pa tsam du bshad kyang / de bas lhag par 'gyur ro// zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / gti mug la spong ba rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / sems can
197b7(dkon brtsegs): cha mnyam pa la spod ba rnams kyi spong ba gang yin pa de dag bskal pa tsam du bstan kyang / de dag re re'ang de bas lhag par 'gyuraro// zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs
198a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku'i tshe tshad bskal pa brgyad stong du bzhugs pas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan pa gzhan gyi skabs mi dbye bar sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang
198a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug par 'gyur gyi/ sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar thug pa gang yang med do// sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems can gyi spyod
198a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de tsam du tshad med pa de'ang / de bzhin gshegs pas tshad dang ldan par ston to// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji ltar spyod pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba
198a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la 'byung ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de
198a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar mi shes kyi/ nam mkha' las 'byung bar
198a6(dkon brtsegs): shes so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes so snyam du khyed sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi
198a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gtsug tor nas byung bar shes pa dang / spyi gtsug nas byung bar shes pa dang / dbu skra rnams las byung bar shes pa
198b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / phrag pa nas byung bar shes pa dang / dpral ba dang / smin mtshams dang / mdzod spu dang / spyan dang / snyan dang / shangs dang / 'gram pa dang // zhal
198b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mgur nas byung bar shes pa dang / de bzhin du dpung pa dang / phyag dang / sor mo dang / rtsibs logs dang / brang dang / rgyab dang / lte ba dang
198b3(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba'i gnas dang / brla dang / pus mo'i lha nga dang / byin pa dang / long bu dang / zhabs kyi mthil dang / mtshan rnams dang / dpe byad bzang po rnams dang
198b4(dkon brtsegs): spu'i khung thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes pa'i sems can kha cig yod do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o//
198b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros mos pa ji lta ba dang / yongs su smin pa ji lta ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes kyang / zhi ba'i zla
198b6(dkon brtsegs): gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste btang snyoms pa'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo'i sil snyan gyi 'khrul 'khor de tsam du legs par sbyar
198b7(dkon brtsegs): ba byas pa gang dag la lag gis ma reg par rlung gis bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dag kyang yod de/ 'on kyang de la sgra 'byin par spro ba ni gang yang meng med kyi/ yongs su sbyang ba
199a1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'i khyad par gyis sgra snyan pa'ang 'byung ngo / / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa'i shes pas bskyod na
199a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ste/ 'on kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa gsung 'byin par spro ba'ang mi mnga' mod kyi/ sngon yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa'i khyad par gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can
199a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su 'jug par yang 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na brag cha'i sgra ni gzhan rnam par rig par byed par yang 'byung la/ de ni nang na'ang ma yin
199a4(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol na'ang ma yin/ gnyis ka med pa las kyang mi dmigs so// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par rig par byed
199a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang 'byung la/ de ni nang na'ang ma yin/ phyi rol na'ang ma yin la/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na
199a6(dkon brtsegs): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ sems can gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra
199a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra de las 'byung yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rin po che lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'ang snying rje chen
199b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ sems can gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar des shes kyang / de la de bzhin gshegs
199b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas bcom ldan
199b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams ni gsung dbyangs tshad med pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi tshad dam/ mtha' gzung bar nus pa de ni kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud
199b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo //
199b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor
199b6(dkon brtsegs): cing bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la brten nas dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher rab tu ston pa de
199b7(dkon brtsegs): mjug tu phyin pa'i dus kyi tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor ji srid cig tu ring du 'gro ba zhig/
200a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor dpag par bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rang gi stan gyi steng nas mi/
200a2(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur te/ ri rab kyi rtse mor phyin nas/ de de na 'dug na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de 'dra ba kho nar thos so// rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi
200a3(dkon brtsegs): khams mi mjed 'di'i nub phyog kyi ri rab las 'das shing / gling bzhi pa las kyang 'das/ khor yug las kyang 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi khor yug gi zom la 'dug
200a4(dkon brtsegs): na'ang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung lhag chad med cing mnyam par de 'dra ba kho nar thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma mo'u 'gal
200a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu 'di nga'i sgra skad dpog par 'dod kyis/ ngas 'di la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstang ngo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstangs pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi
