200a6(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
200a7(dkon brtsegs): khams 'od zer rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ chos kyang ston pa der gnas brtan mo'u
200b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gal gyi bu chen pos phyin te/ de na 'dug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra skad de 'dra ba kho nar thos te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dom gang tsam gyi phyogs na 'dug pa'i mis mi cig
200b2(dkon brtsegs): shos kyi sgra thos pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung sgra thos so// bcom ldan 'das
200b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku'i khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus kyi khrun ni dpag tshad phyed do// de nas byang chub sems
200b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag gi sprad par bya ba'i lhung bzed kyi rton ma gdu bu de la gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'chag cing 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' nas/
200b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong gi kha dog 'dra ba'i srog chags lhung bzed kyi rten ma'i gdu bu la 'chag cing mchis pa 'di ga las mchis pa zhig/
200b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed 'di la brnyas pa'i sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po zhes bya ste/
200b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog go// nyan thos chen po rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal
201a1(dkon brtsegs): pos/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag khyad du gsod kyis khyod
201a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul ston cig/ de
201a3(dkon brtsegs): nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces
201a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gling 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig/
201a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bus steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam gyi gong du mngon par 'phags te/ rin po che'i gling de skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par byas so//
201a6(dkon brtsegs): skyil mo krung de las kyang mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par 'phyang ngo // mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng gi 'bru thams cad las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ngo // 'od zer de dag thams
201a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rtse mo dag las kyang pad+ma rnams byung ngo / / pad+ma thams cad kyi snying po rnams la'ang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bzhugs par snang ngo //
201b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te/
201b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa gsung ngo // de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi
201b3(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du sbar te de ltar stong dang stong gnyis pa khyab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten/
201b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das nges bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig/ de nas
201b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar
201b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ci zhig gi slad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis/ bcom
201b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so//
202a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das des gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
202a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs tshad med pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod pas 'arig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyis/ khyod kyis lan gnyis su de lta bu'i sems ma skyed cig/ gal te mo'u 'gal gyi bu
202a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod shugs 'di nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di nyid kyis nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song yang / khyod kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i
202a4(dkon brtsegs): gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad med pa dang ldan no// de nas gnas brtan mo'u
202a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa bshags pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad ma
202a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal bas/ bdag ni nongs pa can te/ nongs pa 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid cig nas mchis/ bcom
202a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol
202b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ring mo zhig nas mchis pas lus dub ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi ba'i rngo mi thog go// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa
202b2(dkon brtsegs): moru 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin snyam du sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen
202b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byin gyis/ khyod bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag tshol cig dang / de nyid kyis khyod slar 'khring
202b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni bskal pa srid kyis kyang phyin par mi nus te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
202b5(dkon brtsegs): der ma byin par bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ shar ram/ lho 'am/ nub bam/ byang ngam/ phyogs gang zhig tu
202b6(dkon brtsegs): byin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag phyogs bslang de gang nas 'dir mchis pa ma 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das nges bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis rnam
202b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni bskal pas kyang phyin par mi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom
203a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhugs/ bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
203a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni shar phyogs logs na bzhugs so/ / de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe na yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ shar phyogs logs su phyag 'tshal nas/
203a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// mthu chen mnga' ba lha dang mis mchod pa// ye shes mtha' yas mtha' yas gsung ldan pa// rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa dgongs su
203a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ / slar yang zhing der rab tu mchi bar bgyi// zhi ba'i zla gros de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la gnas
203a5(dkon brtsegs): pa des/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol ba btab pa'i sgra de thos so// thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
203a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni mo'u 'gal gyi bu ste/ sangs
203a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das par song ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar
203b1(dkon brtsegs): / bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'dod nas gsol ba 'debs pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo // kun dga' bas
203b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'dir slar 'ongs pa dang
203b3(dkon brtsegs): de nyid du thos par 'gyur ro/ / de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig
203b4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po blta
203b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'tshal lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer ngas
203b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed po de lag las thal te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de na thams cad
203b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan
204a1(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong / de nas bcom ldan gyis
204a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'do rjes su 'brongs te shod cig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom
204a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te/ sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas/ nges
204a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ spyan sngar yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa bshags pa
204a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal nas/ de srid du ring du mchis pas bdag nongs pa can te/
204a6(dkon brtsegs): nongs pa 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das de srid du ring du mchis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'di na ci tsam pa de tsam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
204a7(dkon brtsegs): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshang gang yang med de/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tshad dam/ mtha
204b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol bar sems pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad dam/ mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkhas ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs
204b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsung gis khyab bo/ / gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
204b3(dkon brtsegs): do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba
204b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci mang ba yin nam/ zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can gcig gi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa
204b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa rnams kyis bskal par yang bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ brtsi ba 'am
204b6(dkon brtsegs): brtag par mi nus na/ sems can thams cad kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khyod du chud par bya'o// sems
204b7(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed par 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i gsung gi yan
205a1(dkon brtsegs): lag gi rnam pa'ang de snyed du 'byung ste/ de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong
205a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum sems can gang yin pa/ / de dag rang rgyal 'dren gyur pas// bskal par sems can gcig cig gis// sems kyi khams kyang mi shes so// sems can gcig yid rdzi
205a3(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni rab mkhyen kyang // nga yis yid 'di shes so zhes// de ni rtog par mi 'gyur ro// dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sems pa dag ni ji snyed pa/
205a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po chos ston tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag de snyed do// chos kyi bdag po gsung ba na// dbyangs kyi yan lag ji snyed pa// chos kyi ming gis bshad pa yi// chos
205a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yang de tsam mo/ / sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni// ming dang sems pa ji snyed pa// sems can snying po'i spu gcig nas// 'od zer byung ba de snyed do// 'jig rten
205a6(dkon brtsegs): mgon po'i spu kun gyi/ / 'od zer dag ni ji snyed pa// mi yi dbang po chos ston tshe// gsung gi yan lag de bas mang // dpe bkod nas ni sangs rgyas kyis// bskal par rab tu
205a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan mdzad kyang / / sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung dbyangs kyi// mtha' ma rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs gzugs can ma yin rnams// gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis brjod//
205b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis ni// nyon mongs gzugs med zhi bar byed// ji ltar tshig ni gzugs med pa// thams cad du ni mi dmigs te// de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med
205b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ / shin tu dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar tshig ni yod min te// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa// de ltar nyon mongs rnam med cing // nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so// ji ltar
205b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsung / / gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba// de ltar nyon mongs mi dmigs kyang // de ni tshig gis brjod pa yin// sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/ rab
205b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bring tha ma gang yin pa/ / de dag lus dang sems mi gnas// gnas pa med pa'ang ma yin no// ji ltar sil snyan 'khrul 'khor byas// rlung gis bskyod nas sgra 'byung ba// sgra 'byin
205b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gang yang med/ / 'on kyang sgra rnams de dag 'byung // de ltar sngon chad rnam dag phyir// sems can kun gyi bsam pa spyod// sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang // 'di la de ni
205b6(dkon brtsegs): rtog mi mnga'/ / ji ltar brag cha rnams kyi sgra// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa// de ltar mi yi dbang po'i gsung // nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so// ji ltar rin chen mi rtog par// snang
205b7(dkon brtsegs): bas sems can tshim par byed/ / de ltar rgyal ba'i mi rtog gsung // sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed/ zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba ni
206a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par khong du chud par bya'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na
206a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i gnas tha dad pa dag yod pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa rnams ming tha dad pa dag gis rnam par gzhag go/ / zhi ba'i
206a3(dkon brtsegs): blo gros 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ sa bla ba'i lha rnams
206a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ za ba dang / za ba'i rtsa ba dang / za ba sel dang / za ba 'gog ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal
206a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ bar snang gi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jug pa dang / kun tu 'jug byed dang / kun
206a6(dkon brtsegs): tu 'jug bral dang / kun tu 'jug sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
206a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'byung ba dang / dpog pa dang / sreg pa dang / 'jig byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang /
206b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gogapar 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
206b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'khor ba dang / kun snyen dang / zad pa dang / zad pa ldog byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog
206b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa dang / gnod pa snyen dang / gnod pa zad par/
206b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa zad par sgom pa zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de//
206b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ shin tu mi bsrun dang / mi bsrun rtsa ba dang / ldog pa dang / yang dag par ldog byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal
206b6(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal pa dang /
206b7(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyal byed dang / rgyal zad dang / rgyal ba sgo zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
207a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces byaste/ !ho dang / haha thob byed dang / haha bral dang /
207a2(dkon brtsegs): bral byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/
207a3(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ me mur dang / me mur gnod dang / me mur 'dor 'dod dang / me mur sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung
207a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs pa'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ sdug pa dang / sdug
207a5(dkon brtsegs): byed dang / sdug pa nyal dang / sdug par 'khor zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog
207a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'dzag pa dang / kun tu 'dzag byed dang / rgyun gcod dang / shin tu 'byung zhes
207a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs pa'i
207b1(dkon brtsegs): mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ rma dang / rma'i mtshams sbyor ba dang / rma ru ba dang / rma nye bar zhi byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal
207b2(dkon brtsegs): kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal byed
207b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par rgyal byed dang / rkyal ba mthar byed dang / byed pa thob byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /
207b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ ha hi dang / he hi dang / hu hu dang / ha ra nu san d+hi zhes bya'o// 'dir
207b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ dge chung gi lha rnams kyis 'di skad
207b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ oM hi ta dang / ni ba hi ta dang / ni ga k+Shi ta dang / ni ga ma ni zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang
207b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ sten pa dang / yang dag par sten pa dang / zad pa sten pa dang /
208a1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu ston pa zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ dge
208a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ yongs gcod dang / yongs gcod 'byung dang / khyim mtha' dang / rtag tu rnam dag ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug
208a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ rjes su
208a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro dang / mi 'ong ba ma yin dang / rjes kyi mtshams dang / rjes kyi mtshams zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /
208a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag pa dang / dag pa can dang / dag pa yongs su dag dang /
208a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'gro zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/
208a7(dkon brtsegs): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma me ma ma dang / ma ma me me dang / ma na nun pa dang / ma na nu ga ma zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug
208b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ shin tu mthong gi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste
208b2(dkon brtsegs): grol ba dang / grol ba can dang / grol ba'i rtsa ba dang / grol ba bye brag phyed pa mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang
208b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi bya ba dang // mi byed
208b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byed bral dang / byed pa mthar thug ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro
208b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ gnas gtsang ma'i ri kyi 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ mthar thug dang / shin tu mthar thug dang / mi rtog pa dang / nyid
208b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshams sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar ji ltar lha rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du klu rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// dri za rnams kyi'ang gzhan no//
208b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// nam mkha' lding rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// mi 'am ci rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// gnod sbyin lag na
209a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhong thogs rnams kyi'ang gzhan no/ / 'phreng thogs rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa'ang gzhan no// zhi ba'i blo gros gang yul chen po
209a2(dkon brtsegs): bcu drug tu bsdu bas bsdus pa'i yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yongs su gang ste/ gang na mi rnams kyi tshig kyang gzhan/ nges pa'i tshig kyang gzhan brda'ang tha dad pa der
209a3(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag rnam par bkod de/ 'di lta ste/ yul ka sha dang / pa hu pa dang / tho gar
209a4(dkon brtsegs): yul dang / ya ba na dang / kam po dza dang / kha sha dang / hu na dang / rgya yul dang / da ra ta dang / u ra sha dang / bi lin dang / so ma dang / bram ze dang /
209a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / da tsi ba dang / ki ra ta dang / pu lin ta dang / pun tra dang / ku ru na dang / lnga len dang / shar
209a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs dang / phu ru ra ba dang / lho phyogs dang / ka ling ka dang / gcer bu dang / ba na sa ka dang / pa na ta dang / sA la ta dang / khyi gdong dang / wa gdong dang /
209a7(dkon brtsegs): kri ba sha'i gdong dang / spyi'u tshugs pa dang / gnam gdong po dang / phyi phyogs gdong dang / byang mtshams gdong dang / rjes su rgyug dang / rgya mtsho'i khol ba dang /
209b1(dkon brtsegs): sul mthas gtugs pa dang / ang ku ra dang / ma kur dang / sna med dang / glo bkra dang / phyogs kyi gcer bu dang / gshog thogs gcer bu dang / skus te 'gro dang /
209b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs byed rnam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bar na gnas pa'i yul la sogs pa yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang na mi rnams kyi tshig dang / nges
209b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshig dang / brda tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag bstan kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems kyi
209b4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang ba ma yin zhing / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa 'byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bden pa ming tha dad pas bstan pa bye ba khrag
209b5(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yod de/ bden pa bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ don dam pa'i bden pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi
209b6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i bden par don gcig tu yang dag par 'dus te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// /
209b7(dkon brtsegs): bam po lnga pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi rigs pa gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mam nyi sel ba'o//
210a1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye
210a2(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang ga/ sa'i khams ni de ltar ma yin no zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros yongs su brgyag pa nye bar bzung nas/ sems can de dag
210a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par
210a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ shA ri'i bu lta bu sems can de dag thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes de sems can gcig dang ldan par gyur cing / rnam grang
210a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dis sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par the tshom gyi dri
210a6(dkon brtsegs): ba bsams shing gzhal te yongs su btsal la/ sems can gcig gi the tshom gyi dri ba gang yin pa de nyis pa'i ma yin zhing / zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad kyis
210a7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom gyi dri ba tha dad pa bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du dong nas se gol gtogs pa srid la the tshom gyi dri ba de dag gsol kyang / des sems can gcig gi rjes su zhugs
210b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dran pas thams cad bzung nas/ gsung brjod pa gcig gis de dag gi the tshom gyi dri ba thams cad gcod de/ de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi the tshom gyi dri ba chad par shes
210b2(dkon brtsegs): shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas thams cad kyang sems rangs par 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi
210b3(dkon brtsegs): dogs pa gcod cing / sems can thams cad kyi som nyi sel kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la thugs kyis mdzad pa 'am/ gsung du brjod pa'ang mi mnga' la/ mdzad pa
210b4(dkon brtsegs): de'ang mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// 'di ni gsung rmad du byung ba'o// 'di ni gsung yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin
210b5(dkon brtsegs): bshegs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang / gsung gi gsang ba 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bshad pa'i tshe/ srog chags sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
210b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na tshangs par spyad par spong
210b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ me tog rnams kyis kyang gtor/ rin po che'i gdugs rnams kyang btang ngo //
211a1(dkon brtsegs): de nas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la'ang phog/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lus la'ang phog cing / 'khor thams cad la'ang 'thor ro// rin
211a2(dkon brtsegs): po che'i gdugs de dag kyang bar snang la gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na 'dug go// rin po che'i gdugs de dag las kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom
211a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyi ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rmad du byung ba 'di bstan pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ bskal pa
211a4(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis btang ba lags so zhes sgra byung ngo / / de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la
211a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag go gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos pa ni bdag
211a6(dkon brtsegs): cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ / gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mos shing som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yod pa'i mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dag ni de
211a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
211b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag
211b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs
211b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i nang du bstan to/ / bsnyad do// yang dag par bshad do// gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ring por mi thogs par chos nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
211b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'chang ba dang / mi sdang / mi skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / don rtogs pa'i rjes su rtogs pa dang / de bzhin nyid du
211b5(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ phyogs
211b6(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// me tog gi char chen po'ang bab bo// sil snyan dang rol
211b7(dkon brtsegs): mo'i sgra'ang byung ngo / / sems can grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// /
212a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni skye ba gcig gis thogs/
212a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byas so// de nas 'khor gyi khyams de'i dbus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam
212a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad pa brtol te mngon du byung bar snang ngo / / de dag steng gi bar snang nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ stong
212a4(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spos chus chag chag btab par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal
212a5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis chu'i rgyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags te/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan
212a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros chu'i rgyun 'di dag sems med kyang / ji ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po brtol te mngon par 'phags pa de bzhin du/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
212a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'chang ba dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ de dag ni ma rig pa dang lta bar gyur pa'i sgo glegs bcag nas/ chos kyi
212b1(dkon brtsegs): snang ba mi bzad pa dang / shes rab dang spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur
212b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
212b3(dkon brtsegs): / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin
212b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris su sems can
212b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gcig gis bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe'i mthar ma thug gi bar du de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par
212b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa gzhan gyi rjes su mi 'brang ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
212b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'ang mi gnas pa ste/ gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo
213a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
213a2(dkon brtsegs): ldog pa mi mnga'/ thugs rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par dpyod pa mi mnga'/ thugs 'gyur ba mi mnga'/ thugs kyi tshad mi mnga'/ thugs 'khrul pa mi mnga'/ thug
213a3(dkon brtsegs): sel ba mi mnga'/ thugs g.yeng ba mi mnga'/ thugs khengs pa mi mnga'/ thugs dma' ba mi mnga'/ thugs kun tu srung ba mi mnga'/ thugs rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs shin
213a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rangs pa mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par 'khrug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la khon du 'dzin pa mi mnga'/ thugs g.yo ba mi mnga'/ thugs nges par sems pa mi mnga'/ thugs dgyes
213a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mi mnga'/ thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/ thugs 'jug pa mi mnga'/ thugs rab tu rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs la rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'/
213a6(dkon brtsegs): thugs la yongs su rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la zhi gnas mi mnga'/ thugs la lhag mthong mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba mi mnga'/ rang gi thugs la
213a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa mi mnga'/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba mi mnga'/ thugs mig la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas pa rtsa
213b1(dkon brtsegs): mnga'/ thugs gzugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs chos la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs dmigs
213b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs nang na gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs phyi rol la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs de chos rnams la mi 'jug go/
213b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs de ye shes la mi 'jug go/ thugs de 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba la mi rtog go// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar thugs yongs su dag/
213b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ thugs kyi chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la/ chos thams cad la'ang de'i ye shes ma chags ma thogs par 'jug go// rang gi thugs yongs su dag pas sems can gang gi
213b5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang yongs su ma dag par mi gzigs te/ de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par mi rtog go// gzigs kyang spros par mi mdzad do// gzigs pas kun gzigs
213b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa mi gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sha'i mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ shes
213b7(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ chos kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i rna ba'i thos pa dang ldan
214a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ma yin/
214a2(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ de chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ chos thams cad la chags pa med par ldan pa'ang yin no// de'i de bzhin gshegs
214a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ye shes kyi rgyun rnams ni sgrim pa mi mnga' zhing lhun gyis grub la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar gnas so// sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la'ang gzigs so//
214a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mkhyen
214a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa ni
214a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang yang bral la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi 'dor ro// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad la/ de'i chos thams cad
214a7(dkon brtsegs): la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyang gang du'ang mi chags so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa gang yang sprul pa de
214b1(dkon brtsegs): la ni sems kyang mi mnga'/ yid kyang mi mnga'/ rnam par shes pa'ang mi mnga'/ skra'i 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/ gsung gi 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/ thugs kyi 'du byed kyang mi
214b2(dkon brtsegs): mnga' mod kyi/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sprul pa dang mtshungs pas
214b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam mo/ / sprul pa'i chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog go// de la sku'i rtsom pa dang / gsung gi rtsom pa dang / thugs kyi rtsom pa'ang mi snang la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams
214b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang mdzad de/ de'ang lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas
214b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can la thugs brtse bas de bzhin du
214b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po la gnas pa ma yin/ khams
214b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma yin/ skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ byi la gnas pa ma yin/ dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/
215a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas
215a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin/ da ltar
215a3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
215a4(dkon brtsegs): shes gnas pa mi mnga' 'o/ / de chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la sems can la thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa rnams
215a5(dkon brtsegs): la'ang de'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa mi mnga' zhing thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'jug ste/ de'ang lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go/
215a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba ste/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi mdor la/ sems can thams cad la sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad
215a7(dkon brtsegs): pas thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan
215b1(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thang nang
215b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi slad na'ang gsang ba pa'i bdag po mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
215b3(dkon brtsegs): bu bya ba 'di bsam gyis mi khyab kyis zhig cig/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spong ba 'di la mgo mongs par 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu gang dag dang
215b4(dkon brtsegs): cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag gnas 'di la skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa
215b5(dkon brtsegs): la yid ches par mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/
215b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das da ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mthong lags te/ 'di bdag gis sngon ni nam yang ma mthong ngo // bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
215b7(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rje 'di ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyab rgya ba na'ang gnas te/ sngon gyi sman lam gyi stobs dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du'ang
216a1(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su kun tu ston to/ / shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad
216a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyab rgyab tu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan kyang / des ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i
216a3(dkon brtsegs): bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje 'dug pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da gdod mthong lags te/ sngon ni ma mthong ngo //
216a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu gnas na/ khyod kyis de ma mthong ba ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig
216a5(dkon brtsegs): rten skyong ba gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par mthong ngo / / shA ri'i bu
216a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul kyang / de dag thams cad kyi rgyab na'ang
216a7(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs de dag thams cad ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de
216b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gi sab na'ang 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te/ shA ri'i bu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni de ltar ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i byin gyi
216b2(dkon brtsegs): rlabs kyi stobs dang ldan no/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
216b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spong pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por
216b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bkod pa bstan pa la brtsams te/ de na rmad du byung ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba gang du khyod la mngon sum du
216b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la khyod stobs par gyis shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bkod pa byung ba ni tshad med de/ de dag ni tshe'i tshad bskal
216b6(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pas kyang rgyas par rnam par phye ste bstan par sla ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i bka' ba spyod pa
216b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam pa gcig ma yin te/ mu stegs can gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas spyad do// dka' thub dang lus la yongs su gdung ba ji skad dang / lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed
217a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis pha rol mu stegs can dag mngon par snyems pa de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang / ches mchog tu gyur pa'i bya dka' ba dang / brtul zhugs dang dka'
217a2(dkon brtsegs): thub gang dag de dag gis bya bas kun tu bstan par mi nus pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas kun tu bstan te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de la kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya
217a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig btsugs te 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni lag pa bteg ste 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni nyi ma la lta zhing 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar
217a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong / kha cig gis ni tsog tsog por 'dug cing spong ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa btsugs te mi 'gul bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du sgreng ste/
217a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni kha bub tu 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni tsher ma'i steng na nyal bar mthong / kha cig gis ni ba glang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal bar mthong / kha cig
217a6(dkon brtsegs): gis ni rdo leb la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni rtsig pa la skyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb la skyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni gtun shing la skyes pa
217a7(dkon brtsegs): dang kha cig gis ni phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang / kha cig gis ni nyi ma yongs su bsgyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa mun dza'i gos gyon pa dang
217b1(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni rtsa bal ba dza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtsa ku sha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni ri dgas kyi pags pa gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa tsar gyon pa
217b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / kha cig gis ni sgren mor 'dug pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtsa dar d+ha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing shun gyi gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sred za ba dang
217b3(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni nas za bar mthong ngo / / kha cig gis ni rtsa ba dang lo ma za ba dang / me tog za ba dang / 'bras bu za ba dang / sdong bu za ba dang / gzegs ma za ba dang / pad+ma'i
217b4(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba za ba dang / zhag drug smyung ba dang / sha mi za ba dang / rgya shugs za ba dang / nas shin te ma za ba dang / ci tsi za ba dang / mon sran sde'u za ba dang / mon sran gre'u
217b5(dkon brtsegs): za ba dang / pra yos za ba dang / til za ba dang / 'bras skam za ba dang / chu 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / mar gyi thigs pa tsam gyis 'tshe ba dang / sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis
217b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba dang / 'o ma'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / kha cig gis ni zas mi za ba dang / kha cig gis ni gnyid dang bral bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni 'dug pa 'ba' zhig tu mthong ngo //
217b7(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni 'greng ba 'ga' zhig tu mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang / dka' ba spyad pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ston te/ lo drug tshang
218a1(dkon brtsegs): bar spyod lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad rdzogs par bstan par gyur to/ / brtul zhugs shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dang / brtson 'grus shin tu
218a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs pa dang / dka' thub shin tu brtan pos lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad ston kyang / sems can gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag gis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub
218a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang gzhan du mi mthong ste/ gzhan du na ci 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ci 'dra ba dag gis sems can dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub mthong ba ni
218a4(dkon brtsegs): ma gtogs so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa'i btang snyoms can yang yin la/ bya ba de dag kyang kun tu ston te/ dka' ba spyod pa
218a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dis lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros lha dang mi gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa yongs su spang ba byas pa de dog
218a6(dkon brtsegs): gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug cing mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi g.yo ba dang / bde ba myong ba dang / lo drug lon
218a7(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo / / zhi ba'i blo gros de la lha dang mi chos can chos 'dod pa/ chos bstan pas yongs su smin par bya ba gang
218b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan mi byed par rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par mthong ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen
218b2(dkon brtsegs): po la sbyor ba ye shes chen po yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ / chos kyi tshub la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// bya dka' ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa
218b3(dkon brtsegs): bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar lo drug tshang nas byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smos pas brtul zhugs dang dka' thub de dag las
218b4(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ klung nai rany+dza na'i 'gram du song nas 'jig rten dang mthun par khrus byas te/ lus gtsang mar byas nas klung nai rany+dza na nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to// de nas grong mi'i
218b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo legs skyes ma zhes bya ba des/ ba stong gi 'o ma bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i 'o thug khyer te byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ngo // gzhan lha dang / klu dang /
218b6(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug cu'ang rang rang gi zas thogs te 'khod nas/ sa sa
218b7(dkon brtsegs): nas tshig 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig/ kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig ces zer ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa'
219a1(dkon brtsegs): grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma la sogs pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyi khams de dag blangs nas
219a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad thos kyang phan tshun ma mthong ngo / / lha'i bu re res kyang byang chub sems dpes bdag gi bshos gsol te/ byang chub sems dpas bdag gi ba shas gsol nas/ blan med
219a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar shes so/ / de dag tham cad kyang byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
219a4(dkon brtsegs): tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zas len par sbyor ba dka' ba spyod pa yang dag par 'phags zhes bya'o// zas len pas sems
219a5(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin par byed pa dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te/ lus stobs
219a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur nas zas zos te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ngo // de song ba dang sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu sa bzangs zhes bya bas/ sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la
219a7(dkon brtsegs): bos te smras pa/ sa 'dzin gang zhig migs mi bskyed pa// sred pa bsal cing khang khro rab spangs po// byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing drung byon// sa gzhi dag ni legs par
219b1(dkon brtsegs): btsun par bya/ / legs so zhes te sa la spyod nams dga'// snang gsum thams cad yongs su phyag bdar byed// me tog sil ma bkas zhing spos mchog bdugs//
219b2(dkon brtsegs): dag gis sa gzhi chag chag btag/ khag na gzhong thogs de bzhin 'phreng ba thogs// gzhal med khang nas de bzhin par snang ba// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'/
219b3(dkon brtsegs): de tshe me tog sna tshogs char du phag/ gling bzhi pa dag rnams na skyong ba bzhi// ji snyed pa dag thams cad 'khor bcas te// rnam par 'dren la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// gser
219b4(dkon brtsegs): dra bas stong gsum thams cad bkab/ / stong gsum 'jig rten brgya byin rdzu 'phrul che// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang mdzes
219b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ / de ltar stong gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan// 'thab bral lha rnams thams cad rab dga' ste// skyes bu mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir// mi mjed 'jig rten
219b6(dkon brtsegs): khams kyi stong gsum kun/ / nam mkha' bai DUR+Ya yi dra bas bkab// dga' ldan rab dang dga' ldan lha rnams kyang // de dag mu tig dra bas brgyan pa byas// rgyan 'phreng de bzhin
219b7(dkon brtsegs): zla ga ma rnams kyang thogs/ / mu tig sil ma'o char yang rab tu 'babs// lha yi rgyal po rab tu 'phrul gyi bar// rab tu dga' nas 'jam bu chu gser gyi// dril bu'i dra ba gas
220a1(dkon brtsegs): drar bcas dang / / sgra snyan bcas pas stong gsum thams cad bkab// thams cad don la mi 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir// dbang sgyur dag gis lha yi rin po
220a2(dkon brtsegs): chetshe/ / rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa// 'od gsal dri med dra ba gcig kyang sprul// klu dang dri za lto 'phye chen po dang // lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci kun gyis// rang
220a3(dkon brtsegs): rang gnas dang bkod pa rnams kyis ni/ / 'dod khams legs par brgyan nas mdzes par byas// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas stong gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur zhes
220a4(dkon brtsegs): bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems
220a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po mnabs pa/ dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/ go cha sra ba mnabs pa/ thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad
220a6(dkon brtsegs): las nges par byung ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad
220a7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu rnam par dag pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams
220b1(dkon brtsegs): cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad
220b2(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ de dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi sman
220b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs brnyed pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po
220b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ pad+ma chen po lta bu// chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma bsnyel ba/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/
220b5(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba
220b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu gdul ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
220b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /
221a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems/
221a2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas bcom
221a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams la bstan par bzhed pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la grog po dag khyed byang
221a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po ma mjed kyi bdag po de'i yid rab tu dga' nas/ tshangs ris
221a5(dkon brtsegs): lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang dka' thub bsags pa/ skyes bu chen po dam pa de byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der bzhud kyi
221a6(dkon brtsegs): del khyed kyis bkad pa chen po rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad brgyan par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
221a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag smras so/ / sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la phan bzhed pa// lha dang mi yis mchod pa lha yi lha// thub pa chen po byang
221b1(dkon brtsegs): chub snying por gshegs/ / sde dang bcas pa'i bdud ni 'dul ba dang / thams cad mkhyen gyi ye shes 'tshang rgya dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bskang dang // da
221b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / / mkhas pa seng ge'i sgra chen bsgrags pa dang // sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang // dam pa'i chos mig yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir/
221b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs// phas kyi rgol ba rnams ni tshar bcad dang // sngon gyi dam bcas yongs su bskang ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mdzod pa bstan pa'i
221b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ / 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs// legs par thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni// sa gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan par bya// stong gsum brgyan par gyur la
221b5(dkon brtsegs): ltos shig kye/ / 'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par gyur la ltos// 'dod pa'i khams ni ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin// de ltar gzugs kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya// tshangs pa
221b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni sems dang legs so zhes/ / rab tu dga' nas stong gsum brgyan par gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams na bkod snang ba// de bas lhag pa'i mchod pa de dag ston//
221b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog rnams kyis bkang zhing spos kyis bkang // rin chen rnams kyis mchod cing sil snyan bsgrags// tshangs pa la sogs 'og min lha yi rnams// rab tu dga' nas
222a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum thams cad kyang / / dga' bar gyur dang phyag bya'i 'os su byas// rang rang gnas kyi gzhi yang bkod pa byas// lha rnams kyis ni gong nas gong
222a2(dkon brtsegs): du yang / / lhag pa lhag pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu bstan// lha yi bu mo bye ba drug cu brgyas// byang chub rdo rje gdan ni rgyan par byed// spos chu yis ni kun tu chag chag 'debs/
222a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs dag kyang 'thor bar byed// sa gzhi dag la rin chen rnams kyang bkram// byang chub snying por rgyan rnams rab tu bstan// thams cad tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa/
222a4(dkon brtsegs): snyed tshad kyi bkod pa 'dir byas gyur/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na stong gi dbang po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ tshangs
222a5(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang dka' thub rnams kyi spyad pa spyad pa sems can gyi mchog skyes pa chen po 'di
222a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la khyed kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa chen po rnams kyis brgyan par gyis shig/ de nas
222a7(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa// phan bzhed 'jig rten ngon mdzad
222b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid che/ / de ni blo ngan sder bcas bdud 'dul du// shing gi dbang po byang chub drung du bzhud// thams cad 'dus te lhan cig 'dong bar bya// steng gsum mi mjed 'ang ni brgyan
222b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ / 'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang // yang dag mchod na bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur// tshangs pa de dag tshig mchog de thos nas// stong gsum thams cad ma
222b3(dkon brtsegs): lus brgyan byed cing / / legs par phyags te me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan// 'jig rten khams ni rin chen rang bzhin sprul// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi bkod pa dang // bye ba'i gdugs
222b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam+ba nam mkhar de dag sprul/ / sA la'i shing rnams me tog mchog spras pa// dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis sprul// lam gang nas ni drang srong che gshegs pa// de ni shing
222b5(dkon brtsegs): bdun bsnams tshad du sprul/ / rin chen bzhi la gsar gyi pad+ma bkram// kha khyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor// brgya byin gyis der bkod pa gang byas pa// de dag
222b6(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams sngon ma mthong / / sum cu gsum dbang rnam rgyal khang 'dra bar// de ltar gling bzhi dag ni mdzes par brgyan// 'thab bral lnga dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang /
222b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'og min lha yi rnams// stobs dang shugs 'chang thams cad btsun par ni// byang chub snying pa dam brgyan par byed// byang chub stong par gshegs pa
223a1(dkon brtsegs): bar der ni/ / 'dod pa'i khams 'dir bkad mchog gang yod pa// lha las klu 'am mi 'am ci rnams kyi// de dag thams cad skad cig de la bstan/
223a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bzhi dag nas lha mo bye ba blugs// ma tag rnams dang spyas dang byug pa yis// byang chub shi ni mngon du rgyun par byed// sbrus r+b+ba sIs ni kun tu chag chag 'dabs/
223a3(dkon brtsegs): chub shing ni legs par brgyan byas te// sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi yongs 'du 'dra// lha rnams bye ba dag gis mdzes sprul pa// bkod pa de dag tshig gis brjod mi nus/
223a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ rkang pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des sems can
223a5(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'o skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams rgyun gcod do// klu'i rgyal ba nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba
223a6(dkon brtsegs): chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / de nas klu'i bdag po nag pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'od mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid
223a7(dkon brtsegs): za bskyas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i rang gi 'khang la tshigs su bcad pas spras pa/ gser gyi kha dag 'dra ba'i 'od// gnas 'dir lgang nger gyur pas na// kha bar lus ni rab
223b1(dkon brtsegs): tshim/ / sems kyang rab tu dga' bar gyur// kha zas sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi// ltas bzang mthong ba ltar na ni// gdon mi za bar dpa' chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung ba
223b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ / legs par phye ma 'phreng ba dang // spos dang me tog byug pa dang // gser dang nor bu mu tig dang // dung dang rgyan 'phreng mchog rnams dang // rol mo sil snyan rnams thogs la/
223b3(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// ba dan dag kyang bsgreng byas te// ston pa la ni mchod pa bya// klu yi rgyal po'i gnas 'di na// bzang po'i rgyan rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rab tu
223b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba yis/ / sangs rgyas la ni rim gro bya/ de nas klu'i rgyal po nag bcu ma'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang / spras dang / 'phreng
223b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams
223b6(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig gcig tu rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ spos chus gang ba'i sprin mngon par sprul nas/ spos chu'i char pa 'bebs/ klu'i mu tig dang klu'i me tog gi char ni 'bebs shing
223b7(dkon brtsegs): klu'i mthu chen po dang / klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas te/ rkang pa
224a1(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal nas/ rol mo dang sil snyan len pa dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mngon par bstod do//
224a2(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ skyes bu mchog gis 'od ni rab bkye bas// sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad snang bar gyur// skad cig de la ngan song gsum yang zhi// nag po'i gnas
224a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'od kyis khyab par gyur/ / klu yi rgyal po de yis 'od mthong nas// rab tu dga' ste de tshe tshig smras pa// gser gyi mchog gi 'od 'di byung bas na// de ring sangs rgyas 'byung du
224a4(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za/ / klu mo khrag khrig dag gis mdun bdar te// gdugs dang me tog gos mchog thogs nas su// byang chub sems dpa' de ni ga lar song // phyag byas mchod pa byas
224a5(dkon brtsegs): nas gus bcas 'dug/ sa kun rin chen rnams kyis gang zhing de tshe mdzes par brgyan// shing mchog kun dang sman dang rtswa rnam de dag byang chub shing la 'dud// 'di na yod pa'i chu klung tham cad mi 'bab mkha' la rlung
224a6(dkon brtsegs): mi ldang / / de ring bdud btul nas ni 'jig rten tham cad zil gyis gnon par gyur// srid pa gsum na brgya byin tshangs pa nyi ma zla bar 'od mi snang // mtshungs med khyod kyi 'od kyis reg nas de ring ngan song
224a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum po zhi/ / bdag gi gnas su 'od byung nas ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston par bgyid// de ring rgyal bar byon par 'gyur gyis dgyes mdzod rangs shing tshim pa skyed//
224b1(dkon brtsegs): bum pa gang ba 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyod la skor ba dang // rtsa sha'i tshogs rnams 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyod la skor ba dang // lhar bcas mir bcas 'jig rten dag
224b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mchod par brtson par gnas pa las/ / de ring 'gro ba'i sbyin gnas 'gyur zhing shes rab 'dod pa'i lam du 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis rnyed pa legs rnyed
224b3(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid che ldan pa/ / mi mchog 'khor ba 'jig dang de bzhin gser thub ces ni bya ba mchod// mi mchog 'od srungs dang ni shAkya thub mchog de ring bdag gis mchod//
224b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni sangs rgyas dpa' mthong ma bral byang chub dam pa don du gnyer// sa ni grum zhing ri rnams g.yos la 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid// su zhig byang chub tu ni sems nges
224b5(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pas 'phags gyur pa/ / de ni de ring stobs bcu ldan par mi 'gyur gnas ni ma mchis lags// seng ge'i sgra bsgrags tshangs pa'i dbyangs can bcom ldan 'dren pa gsung
224b6(dkon brtsegs): phyung zhig/ zhi ba'i blo gros de nas klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba de/ klu'i bu mo rab tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ gdugs sna
224b7(dkon brtsegs): tshitshogs thogs pa dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs thogs pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs thogs pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha'i dang mi'i
225a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ba brgyus pa thogs pa dang / bog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs len pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i me tog
225a2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'ong ba la 'thor zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / 'khrul pa mi mnga' mi sdang mi bsnyengs bag mi tsha// mi zhum mi
225a3(dkon brtsegs): dman rab dgyes mi 'khrul chags mi mnga'/ / sdang dang rmongs dang brkam pa mi mnga' chags bral ba// rnam grol drang srong chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ngogs bral zug rngu bral
225a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing dul la ma rig sel/ / 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las rab tu 'grel// gnas dang skyabs dang gling ma mchis par mkhyen nas ni// gnas khyod skyabs khyod 'jig rten
225a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag tu byung / / ji ltar lha yi tshogs rnams dad cing rab dga' ste// mkha' las me tog char chen rab tu 'bebs pa dang // ji ltar gos chen dag kyang 'dor bar bgyid las
225a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ / drang srong chen po mgon po rgyal bar dang 'gyur snyam// dgyes skyed shing dbang drung gshegs mi bsnyengs bzhugs mdzod la// bdud sde pham par mdzad de nyon mongs dra ba drol//
225a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa// de ltar byang chub rab mchog zhi ba 'tshang rgyar mdzod// gang gi ched du khyod kyis bskal pa bye mang du// 'gro ba dag ni grol phyir
225b1(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba rnams kyang spyad/ / khyod kyi dgongs pa de rdzogs shing dbang drung gshegs te// byang chub mchog la reg par mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags//
225b2(dkon brtsegs): bam po drug pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas nas byung nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste/ 'gro ba na lam
225b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtswa rnga zhing 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs pa mthong ste/ lha rnams kyis bskul nas
225b4(dkon brtsegs): rtswa 'dzam pa shin tu gzhon pa/ nyams dga' ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ dga' ba 'khyil pa/ g.yas su 'khyil pa/ kha dog dang ldan
225b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ ka tsa lin ni ka ltar reg na bde ba spar gang blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rtswa spar gang byang chub sems dpa'
225b6(dkon brtsegs): la byin te bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros khyod rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa mi snga mi 'phyi bar bya
225b7(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed cing rtswa'ang byin no snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rtsa 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yin te/ ji ltar kho bo bskal pa
226a1(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por khri gshom pa bzhin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te/ 'das
226a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di snga rol bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
226a3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs
226a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la dge slong stong tham pa tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ bcom ldan 'das nges khyed cag bskal pa bzang ba la bla na med pa yang dag par
226a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de dag lung bstan to/ / de'i tshe na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa
226a6(dkon brtsegs): des/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag lung bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems
226a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na seng ge'i khri byi dor bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan
226b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na
226b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'di kyang rtsas 'tsho ba bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam 'di 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sems can rnams kyi ma
226b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba dang / dbang po yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de kha cig la ni rtswa spar gang 'bul bar 'gyur/ kha cig la ni rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri 'bul bar 'gyur ro//
226b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du song ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i lha rnams lha'i bu mo me tog gi skon bu thogs pa dang / sbas
226b5(dkon brtsegs): dang phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa khri dang lhan cig tu byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog
226b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bdag nyid
226b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi bsnyengs dpa' zhing dul zhi ba/ / dgyes shing tshim pa brtan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba nyams dgyes kha na ma tho mi mnga' ba// skyon las grol ba'i sngon la byas
227a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo/ / sdug bsngal chen por bying ba mgon med 'gro 'di la// khyod ni bde ba rab tu stsol ba'i mgon po gcig/ 'gro ba'i nyon mongs nad rnams
227a2(dkon brtsegs): spang ba'i phyir byung ba/ / sman pa'i rgyal chen grags ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar lha tshogs dad cing rab tu dga' ba yis// lha yi me tog char pa rab tu 'bebs pa
227a3(dkon brtsegs): las/ / 'dod dgra sde dang bcas pa byams pas bcom nas ni// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa de ring brnyes su nges// shing dbang drung du gshegs te khri der bzhugs nas su//
227a4(dkon brtsegs): bdud btul nas ni mun pa thams cad gzhom par mdzod// ji ltar sngon gyi thub dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa// de ltar byang chub zhi ba mchog rab 'tshang rgyar mdzod// ji ltar
227a5(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don du ni/ / bskal pa bye bar dka' mdzad rnam par dag gyur pa// drang srong chen po khyod kyi dgongs mchog deng rdzogs kyis// shing dbang drung
227a6(dkon brtsegs): du bzhugs te byang chub 'tshang rgyar mdzod/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpas rtswa spar gang khyer nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa
227a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub kyi shing drung du bdag nyid kyis rtsa gding ba bting nas/ byang chub kyi shing la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems
227b1(dkon brtsegs): dpas rtsa gding ba bting ma thag tu/ de nas lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong gis seng ge'i khri sna tshogs pa blta na sdug pa/ mthong ba/ yangs pa/ ring po che thams cad kyis
227b2(dkon brtsegs): spras pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer can/ rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ki'i dra bas sbrel pa/ mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rab tu sbyangs pa
227b3(dkon brtsegs): ras btsas bu brgya stong du ma bting ba brgyad khri bzhi stong byang chub sems dpa'i ched du bshams so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpas seng ge'i khri brgyad khri bzhi snang
227b4(dkon brtsegs): po de dag thams cad la bdag nyid 'dug par kun tu bstan par gyur to/ / lha'i bu de dag gis kyang gzhan dang gzhan du mi mthong mo shes te/ lha'i bu re res kyang 'di ltar byang chub se
227b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ / bdag gi seng ge'i khril bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur
227b6(dkon brtsegs): par shes te/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te// byang chub kyi snang par bzung
227b7(dkon brtsegs): le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / ni ba mi zla gras byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri la 'dug me rab tu/ de na mi smin mtshams kyi mdzangad gA'i bar nas bdud du
228a1(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'khod pa'i bdud bye ba phrag bzhi brgya la reg go// 'od des de dag la
228a2(dkon brtsegs): reg ma thag tu rang rang gi gnas na 'khod bzhin du spu zing zhes byed de/ rang gi bdud kyi gnas tshig cing mog mog por gyur par shes nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir
228a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'di dag mog mog por gyur par snang ba 'di la rgyun ci zhig yod/ rkyen ni ci zhig yod/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ gcig byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas/ bla na med pa
228a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur grang snyam ste/ rnam par bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par mthong
228a5(dkon brtsegs): ngo/ / de nas bdud sdig can de dag rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ bdud re re'ang gnod sbyin kha dog rnam pa mang po dang / cha byad rnam pa mang po dang / dbyibs rnam pa
228a6(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang / chu zheng rnam pa mang po dang / g.yo ba rnam pa mang po dang / mgo rnam pa mang po dang / mtshon cha rnam pa mang po dang / rgyal mtshan rnam pa mang po thogs pa bye ba
228a7(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis bskor te/ smra ba rnam pa mang po smra zhing bdud kyi mthu chen po dang / bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos bdud re res kyang bdud kyi 'khor gyis brgyar dpag tshad
228b1(dkon brtsegs): nyi khri ste khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong bkang nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros 'khor chen po de dag dong ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe yid du mi 'ong ba
228b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyan par mi 'os pa/ mi snyan pa/ u dug ces bya ba dang / bi cig ces bya ba dang / hu lu hu la zhes bya ba dang / rgyob cig/ zung zhig/ sod cig/ chings shig/
228b3(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba'i sgra chen po de lta bu phyung bar gyur to// gal te 'dod chag dang ma bral ba'i sems can rnams kyis sgra de thos la/ zhi ba'i blo gros gal te byang chub sems dpas sgra de mi grag
228b4(dkon brtsegs): bar ma byas na ni/ de dag kho nas khrag dron po skyug cing 'chi ba 'am/ shi la thug pa'i sdug bsngal rnyed par 'gyur ro// de na ni byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen pos non pas/
228b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can la rnam par 'tshe bar gyur du 'ong zhes sgra de mi grag par byas par gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i yul yin no// zhi ba'i blo
228b6(dkon brtsegs): gros sgra de lta bu de zos kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na spu g.yos par yang ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra 'di dag thams cad brag ma dang mtshungs par legs par rtogs
228b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis bdud lpags par rig nas/ bdud sdig can de dag la zlog pa rnam pa bcu drug pa
229a1(dkon brtsegs): zlog par byed de/ sdig can dag 'phongs par 'gyur ba gdon par dka' ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis ci zhig byas zang zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdig
229a2(dkon brtsegs): can khyed ni gyang stobs chung ngu la gyad stobs chen po bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas brdabs par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni dpa' bo chen pos pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar
229a3(dkon brtsegs): do mod byang chub sems dpas pham par byas par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyed ni srin bu me khyer la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas zil gyis gnon par
229a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyed ni phub ma spar gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar/ da mad byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni shing sA la chen po rtsa nas chang pa ltar/

229a6(dkon brtsegs): can khyed ni brjes kyi chu la nyi tshan bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar/
