229b1(dkon brtsegs): sdig can khyed ni tshong pa lam brgyags mang po mes tshig pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa
229b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa ltar/ de med byang chub sems dpas sems khengs su
229b3(dkon brtsegs): bcug par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyed ni 'brog mgon par lam brgyad chad pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas 'phongs par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni rgya mtsho chen po
229b4(dkon brtsegs): dbus su gru zhig pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyed ni sreg pa'i bskal pas rtswa dang nags tshal ltar/ do mod byang chub sems
229b5(dkon brtsegs): dpas rnyis par byas par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyed ni rdo leb la rdo rje chen po bab pa ltar/ ngo mod byang chub sems dpas rnam par gtar bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub
229b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis zlog pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can rnams zlog par byed kyang / bdud sdig can de dag phyir ma log go/ de nas byang chub sems
229b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
230a1(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang / shes rab dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par
230a2(dkon brtsegs): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang
230a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba yongs su spang ba byas pas lag pa g.yas pa 'jam zhing gzhon la/ shin tu gzhon pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa brkyang ste/ snying rje chen pos bskod pa dang
230a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad rab tu thar pa bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas spyi bo nas bzung ste lus thams cad la byugs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
230a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams mngon du byas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du sa chen po la brdabs so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpas sa chen po la brdabs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshes
230a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ / rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg /

230b3(dkon brtsegs): bco brgyad du sa g.yos pa chen po 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/ / bdud sdig can rnams kyis kyang 'ur sgra dang / tug chom gyi sgra chen po dang / zung zhig pa dang

231a1(dkon brtsegs): dpas lus las 'od byung ba dang / 'od des de dag 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub
231a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas bdud 'dul ba'i rnam par sprul pa 'di bstan pa na/ bdud kyi 'khor de las gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
231a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha'i ba
231a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon sbyang ba byas pa brgyad khri bzhi stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar
231a5(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi kha cig gis ni de ltar bdud 'dul ba tshad med pa dang ldan par shes so/ / kha cig gis ni bdud yongs thams cad du ma 'ongs par shes so// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems
231a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rtswa bting ba la 'dug par shes so/ / kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'
231a7(dkon brtsegs): sa la 'dug par mthong ngo / / kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'anam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing
231b1(dkon brtsegs): gi rgyal po a shwad thar mthong ngo / / kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol du mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can du mthong
231b2(dkon brtsegs): ngo/ / lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing ta la'i srid tsam du mthong zhing / seng ge'i khri shing ta la'i phyed tsam du mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi shing shing ta la bdun

231b4(dkon brtsegs): ge'i khri dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong par mthong ngo / / lha dang mi kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni bdud gcig mthong ngo // kha cig gis
231b5(dkon brtsegs): ni budad rgya chen por mthong ngo / / kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms pa la rtse bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing
231b6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug cing / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar
231b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yul mtha' med pa yin te/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa na 'khod pa de dag gi yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par ni tshad med par snang ngo // ni
232a1(dkon brtsegs): blo gros byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug pa dang / sngon mthun par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
232a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas lhags te/ mi 'jigs pa'i sgra rjod cing shis pa'i sgra dang / bde ba'i sgra dang / kun dga' ba'i sgra dang

232a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes kyi sgra dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgra rjod de/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la

232b6(dkon brtsegs): tam zhes spyan gsol lo/ / mnyel ba mi mnga' bar byang chub bam/ rang byung du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bam/ sgrib pa mi mnga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub

233a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan nam/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos sam/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs bsabs sam/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ram zhes
233a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dri'o/ / de la sems can gang dag dbang po yongs su smin pa de dag gis ni bya ba de shes so// sems can gang dag dbang po yongs su ma smin pa de dag gis ni bya
233a3(dkon brtsegs): ba de mi shes so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhag bdun gyi bar du spyan mi 'dzum par chos kyi dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su bstar te/ sman mi 'dzums
233a4(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub kyi shing la'ang gzigs so/ / lha'i bu stong yang de la mchod do// bstod do// phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag kyang de la mchod pa byed do// bstod do//
233a5(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyang bskyed do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin
233a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi lhung bzed rnams thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong bar gyur to// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor srung dang /
233a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag go// gling bzhi pa 'di nas ji ltar dong ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa bye
233b1(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag brgya nas rgyal po chen po bye ba phrag bzhi brgya lhung bzed rnams thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas lhung bzed bye ba
233b2(dkon brtsegs): phrag bzhi brgya rnams bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs nas/ rgyal po chen po re re'ang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed
233b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhes so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lhung bzed du gsol la snyam du sems te/ de dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang reg par rdzogs
233b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub bsnyes nas/ tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po dang / gzhan
233b5(dkon brtsegs): yang lha'i bu drug khri de bzhin gshegs pa'i thog ma'i zhal zas thogs nas dong bar gyur te/ de dag ni sngan 'di skad du bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas dbul
233b6(dkon brtsegs): lo zhes smon lam btab par gyur pa dag go/ / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas phul nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang
233b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa
234a1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa las byang chub brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba'i bar du sems can gyi don mdzad pa de ni rab tu mang gi/ sems
234a2(dkon brtsegs): dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying por song ba'i bar du ni de lta ma yin no// zhi ba'i blo gros khyed kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang
234a3(dkon brtsegs): chub la nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can tshad med pa'i don byed pa de ltar shes par bya'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas tshangs pa gtsug
234a4(dkon brtsegs): bud can zhes bya ba tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
234a5(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir/ sems can chos
234a6(dkon brtsegs): snod du gyur pa dag mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa 'tshal bar 'gyur gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas chos
234a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan du gsol/ zhes gsol ba btab bo// de ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis gyur pa ste/ gang gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi bur khas blangs nas/ bdag gis bskal pa bzang
234b1(dkon brtsegs): po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub brnyes pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskal lo zhes smon lam btab pa yin no/ / zhi ba'i blo gros tshangs pa gtsug pud can nyid kyis
234b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab kyi/ gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar tshangs
234b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gtsug bud can gyis gsol ba btab pa de bzhin du/ tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab par gyur to// brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang / byang
234b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab par gyur to/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor le bskor bar gnang
234b5(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i tshe/ tshangs pa gtsug bud can gyis grong khyer wA ra NA sir drang srong ltung ba ri dgas kyi nags su bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong
234b6(dkon brtsegs): yod pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa sa'i steng na 'dug pa bshams par gyur to// ji ltar tshangs pa gtsug pud can gyis de bzhin
234b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams par gyur pa de bzhin du/ tshangs pa bye ba phrag bcu dang / brgya byin bye ba phrag bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba phrag
235a1(dkon brtsegs): bcus kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par bshams par gyur to//
235a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po wA ra NA si ga la ba dang / drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi gnas ga la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas seng ge'i khri de dag thams
235a3(dkon brtsegs): cad la bdag nyid bzhugs par kun tu bstan to/ / de na re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas chos kyi
235a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur bar shes te/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom
235a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur
235a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis yul mtha' yas pa'i ting nge
235a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskam par gyur par gnas te/ lag mthil ltar gyur to// stong
235b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba pa 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa 'am/ mi 'am/ lha 'am/ sems
235b2(dkon brtsegs): can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de'i tshe bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la'ang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med cing / zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug
235b3(dkon brtsegs): gis ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gnod pa med cing gcig la gcig pa ma tsam du 'du shes te byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te// bcom ldan 'das kyis yul
235b4(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med
235b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag lhags par gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
235b6(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das las
235b7(dkon brtsegs): chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan
236a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la chos nyan pa dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa dag gis sa phyogs gang khyab par ma gyur pa de ni tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha bzhag pa tsam yang
236a2(dkon brtsegs): med do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po de 'dus par mkhyen nas dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin
236a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i spyan thugs rje chen pos bskyod pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ gang yang rung bas chos dang
236a4(dkon brtsegs): mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ / zhi ba'i bla gros de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo de ni ci nas kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i sems can rnams
236a5(dkon brtsegs): rang rang gi rnam par rig pa bzhin du kun tu shes te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir bskor te/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
236a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par gyur to/ / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs
236a7(dkon brtsegs): na spyod pa'i lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang 'dus par gyur to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de la gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di skad du/ ko'u di n+ya mig mi
236b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag go zhes bka' stsal pa de la sdug bsngal gyi sgras 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sdug bsngal lo zhes thos so/ / bdag med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig bdag med pa'o zhes
236b2(dkon brtsegs): thos so/ / stong pa nyid kyis 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong ngo zhes thos so// zhi bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig zhi ba'o zhes thos so// dben pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni
236b3(dkon brtsegs): mig dben pa'o zhes thos so/ / mi rtag pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mi rtag pa'o zhes thos so// gnas med pas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig gnas med pa'o zhes thos so//
236b4(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes thos so// rmi lam lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig rmi lam lta bu'o zhes thos so// chu zla lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis
236b5(dkon brtsegs): ni mig chu zla lta bu'o zhes thos so/ / mig yor lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig mig yor lta bu'o zhes thos so// brag cha lta bus 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig brag cha lta bu'o zhes
236b6(dkon brtsegs): thos so/ / de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / skye ba med pas
236b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar
237a1(dkon brtsegs): zos so/ / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas 'dul ba rnams kyis ni mig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes thos so// mig ji lta ba bzhin du yid kyi bar
237a2(dkon brtsegs): du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ngo zhes thos so/ / de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos
237a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams stong ngo zhes thos so/ / kha cig gis ni phung po mi rtag pa dang / kha cig gis ni khams mi rtag par thos so// kha cig gis ni skye mched bdag med pa'o zhes thos so//
237a4(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni phung po mi rtag pa nyid du thos la/ khams la mi rtag pa nyid du ma yin no// kha cig gis ni khams la mi rtag pa nyid du thos la/ phung por mi rtag pa nyid du ma
237a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / kha cig gis ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni kun 'byung ba'i sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni 'gog pa'i sgras rnam par grol lo//
237a6(dkon brtsegs): kha cig gis ni lam gyi sgras rnam par grol lo// kha cig gis ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni yang dag par spong ba'i gtam du thos so// kha cig/
237a7(dkon brtsegs): gis ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni dbang po'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni stobs kyi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi yan
237b1(dkon brtsegs): lag gi gtam du thos so/ / kha cig gis ni lam gyi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni zhi gnas kyi gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni lhag mthong gi gtam du thos so// kha cig
237b2(dkon brtsegs): gI ni brten pa'i gtam du thos so/ / kha cig gis ni nyan thos dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam du thos so// kha
237b3(dkon brtsegs): cig gis ni theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i gtam du thos to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi
237b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo bskor to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang yin pa de/ dge slong shA ri'i bus kyang sems can de
237b5(dkon brtsegs): dag bgrang ba'i rtog pas lo brgyar yang rtogs par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' ba spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi
237b6(dkon brtsegs): snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / bkod pa dang / seng ge'i sgra dang / rnam par rol pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bstan pa 'od bshad pa na/ srog chags
237b7(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / sems can tshad med pa dag ni theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas so// chos kyi
238a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
238a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de skad bstan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'am/ gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/ 'on te de bzhin gshegs pa
238a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa dang rjes su mthun pa 'am/ cig tu lta'ang lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
238a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gsang ba ni zab ste/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs nges par dgongs pa ni zab lags te/ bcom ldan
238a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gis gang bstan pa de ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bdag gi lus la gnas pa lags kyi 'di bdag gi rtsal gyis ni ma lags par 'tshal to// bcom

238b1(dkon brtsegs): gang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis ma rlabs par sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba smra ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dang mthun pa de ni gnas ma yin/

238b3(dkon brtsegs): par nus pa su zhig yod/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni mchog tu yang dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni de kho na'o// de bzhin gsheg
238b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bzhugs pa ni yang dag pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid yang dag par smra bas smra ba'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'das pa
238b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang yin pa de ni//

239a1(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par ram/ dad par ram/ yid ches par yang mi nus na
239a2(dkon brtsegs): blang bar ram/ kun chub par bya bar ram/ gzung bar ram/ sbyor bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni gnas ma yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag chos

239a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ bzhi la ma yin/ lnga la ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la
239a7(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba sa bon btab pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
239b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba la/ nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gang lags
239b2(dkon brtsegs): gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so//
239b3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kun tu rtogs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// kun tu rtog pa dang // rnam

239b5(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so/ / phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma
239b6(dkon brtsegs): rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so/ / ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so//
239b7(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'ang ni chad pa dang rtag par lta ba
240a1(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so/ / chad pa dang rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas so// zhi ba'i rgyu

240a5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros de bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su mi shes na nye bar len pa dang

240a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su 'tshal ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

240b2(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros lta ba de ni nang na'ang mi gnas phyi rol na'ang mi gnas so// lta ba gnas pa med pa de la mi gnas par shes pa

240b4(dkon brtsegs): tshig bla dgas te/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pas lta ba de mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di'ang / zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o//

240b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'byung ba ma yin pa ste/ de ni gzod ma nyid nas byung ba ma yin pa kun btags pa'o// byung ba ma yin zhing kun btags pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su brtog pa ma yin/

241a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pas sems 'bar bar byed de/ gang phyis dmigs par mi byed pa de mi 'bar ro// mi 'bar na nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes byazhi ba

241a6(dkon brtsegs): / bam po bdun pa// zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi rang
241a7(dkon brtsegs): ba zhi ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'ang zhi bar mi byed do// nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa'ang mi skyed la/ ral tu d
241b1(dkon brtsegs): o/ / bdud dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa'ang spong la/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos la dmigs pa'ang mi spang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dang /
241b2(dkon brtsegs): ba la dmigs pa'ang mi len la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la dmigs pa'ang mi 'dor ro// stong pa nyid du dmigs pa la'ang rab tu rtog la/ sems can thams
241b3(dkon brtsegs): cad snying rje chen po'i dmigs par yang lta'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa la dab
241b4(dkon brtsegs): thob ste/ ma skyes pa'i dmigs pa la'ang nges par sems la/ bsams bzhin du skye ba'i dmigs pa'ang mi spong ngo // mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dmigs pa la'ang
241b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i dmigs pa'ang nyams 'og tu chud par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i dmigs pa la'ang dpyod la/ byang chub kyi sems kyi dmi
241b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang chud mi gson to/ / smon pa med pa'i dmigs pa'ang rnam par mthong la/ khams gsum pa'i dmigs pa la'ang mi smod do// shes rab dang thabs las nges par byung ba/
241b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni dmigs pa thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur te/ de mi sdug pa la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ska sdug pa la sems gnas so// mi reg pa la dmigs
242a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'khor ba la sems yongs su mi skyo ba nyid du sems gnas so// sdug bsngal la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das
242a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bde ba la bgod par sems gnas so/ / bdag med pa la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems gnas so// 'dod chags la dmigs
242a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams la mi sdug pa'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// zhe sdang la dmigs nas/ sems can zhe sdang
242a4(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa rnam la byam pa chen po'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/ / gti mug la dmigs nas/ sems can gti mug la spyod pa rnams la rten cing 'brel par
242a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so/ / cha mnyal dmigs nas/ sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyi sman chen//
242a6(dkon brtsegs): po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so// 'dod chags dang bral ba la dmigs nas/ nyan thos su 'dul bar sems gnas so// zhe sdang dang bral ba la dmigs nas
242a7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas su 'dul bar sems gnas so/ / gti mug dang bral ba la dmigs nas/ byang chub sems dpar 'dul bar sems gnas so// gzugs la dmigs nas/
242b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs thob par bya bar sems gnas so// sgra la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dbyangs thob par bya bar sems gnas so// dri la
242b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri bsrung thob par bya bar sems gnas so// ro la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i
242b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ / reg bya la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa thob par bya bar sems
242b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / chos la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems nges par sems pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so// sbyin pa la dmigs nas/ mtshan dang
242b5(dkon brtsegs): dpe byad bzang po thob par bya bar sems gnas so/ / tshul khrims la dmigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sems gnas so// bzod pa la dmigs nas// /
242b6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i pags pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so// brtson 'grus la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad bsgral bar
242b7(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas so/ / bsam gtan la dmigs nas/ mngon par shes pa bskyed par sems gnas so// shes rab la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad
243a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyun bcad par sems gnas so// byams pa la dmigs nas/ sems can thams cad
243a2(dkon brtsegs): la khong khro ba'i sems med par bya bar sems gnas so/ / snying rje la dmigs nas/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar sems gnas so// dga' ba la dmigs
243a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ chos bstan pa la mchog tu dga' bar bya bar sems gnas so// btang snyoms la dmigs nas/ sems can rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba la sbyar
243a4(dkon brtsegs): bar sems gnas so/ / bsdu ba'i dngos po la dmigs nas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sems gnas so// ser sna'i skyon la dmigs nas/ bdog
243a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yongs su btang bar sems gnas so/ / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi skyon la dmigs nas/ tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya bar sems gnas so// gnod
243a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi skyon la dmigs nas bzod pa'i stobs dang nges pa la sems gnas so/ / le lo'i skyon la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub par sems
243a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / g.yeng ba'i skyon la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan thob par bya bar sems gnas so// 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi skyon la dmigs
243b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byas nas/ theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub/
243b2(dkon brtsegs): par sems gnas so// yid 'byung ba yid la byas nas/ sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar sems gnas so// ngan 'gro ngan song yid la byas nas/ ngan 'gro ngan
243b3(dkon brtsegs): song dang mi khom par skyes pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par sems gnas so/ / lha yid la byas nas/ 'byor pa thams cad mthar rgud par 'gyur bar
243b4(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas so/ / mi yid la byas nas/ snying po blang bar sems gnas so// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang phrad par bya bar
243b5(dkon brtsegs): sems gnas so/ / chos rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ slob dpon gyi chos la dpe mkhyud med par bya bar sems gnas so// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yid la
243b6(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thob par bya bar sems gnas so// gtong ba rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtong bar sems
243b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ smon pa dang / bsam gtan dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems
244a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / lha rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas/ lha thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la gnas par bya bar sems/
244a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// lus yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya bar sems gnas so// ngag yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung zab par bya bar sems
244a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ / sems yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i sems thob par bya bar sems gnas so// 'dus byas la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
244a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so/ / 'dus ma byas la dmigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas te/
244a5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir yid la mi byed pa'i dmigs pa de gang yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' de'i dmigs
244a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'o/ / chos thams cad byang chub kyi rjes su song bar mthong ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste'i blo gra
244a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sa la skye ba ni/ skye ba ji lta bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi yongs su spang bar mi 'gyur ba
244b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub kyi phyir yongs su spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir phan 'dogs par mi mthong
244b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dmigs pa gang yang med do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs gang ci'ang rung ste/ de thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'o// zhi ba'i blo
244b3(dkon brtsegs): gros de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa gang ci'ang rung ste/ de thams cad ni byang chub kyi rnam pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o// zhi
244b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag 'jungs pa dang / byas pa mi gzo ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
244b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag khro ba la spyod pa dang / lo lo can de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
244b6(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag glen pa dang / rmongs pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
244b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag pan mi 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba'i semaso su
245a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag phan 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa'i sems su mi 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag
245a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa rjod pa de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' khengs par mi 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag bsngags pa mi rjod pa de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' rtso bar mi
245a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye'o// sems can gang dag bde ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dga'//
245a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang mchog tu dga' ba skye'o// sems can gang dag gdul dka' ba dang / dmu rgod de dag la byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas kyi sems skye'o// sems can gang
245a5(dkon brtsegs): dag cang shes pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba'i blo skya'o/ / sems can gang dag rkyen gyi stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su bsrung ba'i bla
245a6(dkon brtsegs): skye'o/ / sems can gang dag rgyu'i stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chad pas bcad pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gdams pa'i blo skye'o// sem
245a7(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag zur tsam gyis go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas zab mo'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / sems can gang dag rnam par spros pas go ba de dag la byang chub sems
245b1(dkon brtsegs): dpas gtam rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ / sems can gang dag kri dgos pa de dag la byang chub sems dpas gtam go rims su phab ste brjod par bya'o// sems can
245b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag tshig lhur len pa de dag la tshig dang yi ge bsnyungs te gtam brjod par bya'o/ / gang dag zhi gnas sngon du 'gro ba de dag lhag mthong gi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag
245b3(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong sngon du 'gro ba de dag la ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / gang dag tshul khrims la chags pa de dag la mthar phyin pa ma yin pas yang sems can
245b4(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / sems can gang dag thos pa la chags pa de dag la 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag ting nge 'dzin la chags pa
245b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag la shes rab la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / sems can gang dag dgon pa'i gnas la chags pa de dag la sems dben par bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o//
245b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la chags pa de dag la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag gti mug che ba de dag la thos
245b7(dkon brtsegs): pas snang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / gang dag 'dod chags kyis non pa de dag la mi sdug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag zhe sdang gis nan pa de dag la byams pa'i//
246a1(dkon brtsegs): gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag gti mug gis non pa de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag cha mnya
246a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la spyod pa de dag la skabs skabs su gtam rgyas par brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i gtam dang / byams pa'i gtam dang / rten cing 'brel
246a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / sems can gang dag rjes su mthun pa'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod par bya/ lhag pa'i sems
246a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gtam brjod par bya/ lhag pa'i shes rab kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la bden pa'i gtam gyi rjes su mthun par byang chub kyi phyogs
246a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/ / sems can gang dag sma dbab pas 'dul ba de dag la gdong bsgyur te phyis chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// gang dag rgyun mi 'chad pa bstan
246a6(dkon brtsegs): pas 'dul ba de dag la rtag par rgyun du bstan pa bstan par bya'o/ / dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams la ni chos kyi gtam brjod par mi bya'o// gang dag sna tshogs kyi gtam gyis
246a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba de dag la rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa dang / dpe dgod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag zab mo'i gtam gyis 'dul ba
246b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam dang / sems can med pa'i gtam dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// lta bar bying ba rnams la stong pa nyid
246b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi gtam brjod par bya'o/ / rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa rnams la mtshan ma med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can smon lam spyod pa rnams la smon pa med pa'i gtam brjod
246b3(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ / phung po la gnas pa rnams la sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyi gtam brjod par bya'o// khams la gnas pa rnams la rab tu dben pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// skye mched la
246b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa rnams la rmi lam lta bu'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / 'dod pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la kun tu 'bar ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// gzugs kyi khams la gnas pa
246b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o//
246b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyis 'dul ba rnams la 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// bde bas 'dul ba rnams la bsam gtan dang tshad med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o//
246b7(dkon brtsegs): lhas 'dul ba rnams la gcig tu bde ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o// mtshan mas 'dul ba rnams la nga'i ba med pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// nyan thos
247a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dul ba rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang de bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams la don nyung ba dang bya ba nyung ba'i gtam
247a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya'o/ / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang snying rje chen po'i gtam brjod par bya'o// spong ba la zhugs pa'i byang chub
247a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa'i gtam
247a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod par bya'o/ / skye ba gcig gis thogs po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis
247a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas ma tshang ba med pa dang 'bras bu yod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab
247a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag cing dmigs pa la dbang thob pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa yin/ legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa yin no//
247a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
247b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes so/ / dmigs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma gsang
247b2(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ki ming de tsa
247b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de byang chub thob pa'i ming ni tsa zhes bya bar 'gyur/ de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom
247b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
247b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs byung bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma dang ldan
247b6(dkon brtsegs): pa kha dog tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / bcod kha dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas/
247b7(dkon brtsegs): zod nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med byab par byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas slar logs/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bsgo
248a1(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis tshig
248a2(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ 'od bzang dri ma mi mnga' gser dang 'dra// zla ba'i zhal 'dra zhi gnas legs par
248a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs/ / nyi ma lta bu mun pa 'joms mdzad pa// mi mchog ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan// mos pas zhi gnas rdzing du rab tu bzhugs// thugs rje chu bo brtson 'grus
248a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi 'khrungs/ / dran pas kha bye yan tan dri zhim ldan// bde gshegs pad+ma tsa slad mdzum pa mdzad// dran pa snang bzang zhi gnas mar lags te// snang ba thugs rje
248a5(dkon brtsegs): dri ma gsum sel mdzad/ / shes rab mar mes mun pa sel mdzad pa// bde gshegs mar me ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// dkyil 'khor thugs rje lhag mthong 'od ldan pa/
248a6(dkon brtsegs): rab rib sel ba srid pa skam mdzad pa// 'gro ba rgyas mdzad mig ni sbyong mdzad pa// bde gshegs nyi ma ci slad mdzum pa mdzad// khyod ni 'gro ba'i bsam pa rab tu mkhyen//
248a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni lhar bcas 'gro na lhang nge ba// drang srong chen po'i zhal du 'khor rnams lta// mi mchog ci slad 'di ni 'dzum pa mdzad// de skad ces gsol pa dang /
248b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// zhi ba'i blo gros gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni
248b2(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje thogs nas bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yongs
248b3(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang rgyas par byed par 'gyur/ sems can tshad med pa dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir yongs su smin par
248b4(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ro/ / de bskal pa bzang po de 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas
248b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba der skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa des phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad byang chub sems dpa' de
248b6(dkon brtsegs): dag la bstan pa de 'dzin par 'gyur/ don gyi tshul la'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du'ang sgrub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag
248b7(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bsti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ rim gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi gan
249a1(dkon brtsegs): na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang srung bar 'gyur/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag kyang yang dag par rdzogs
249a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ / de de'i 'og tu bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par
249a3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams
249a4(dkon brtsegs): kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
249a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba
249a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa de ni
249a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lha dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpas gang bar 'gyur ro// sangs
249b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / byu ru dang / sdug dang / rdor snying po dang / mu tig
249b2(dkon brtsegs): dmar pos legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de mig mangs ris su byas pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba
249b3(dkon brtsegs): dar gyi lda ldi mang pos bres pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i me tog dang rin po che'i me tog gis khebs par byas
249b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ spos kyi snying po dam pas gdugs pa/ steng gi bar snang la lha'i rol mo'i sgra len pa can du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad dang bral
249b5(dkon brtsegs): pabar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ldan gyi lha'i yongs su spyad pa dang 'dra ba dang / yid la bsams pas zas dang / skom dang / skyed mos tshal dang // gzhal
249b6(dkon brtsegs): med khang dang / gos dang / rgyan grub cing/ legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa la mtshungs par yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro//
249b7(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos
250a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang rung ste/ theg pa gnyis kyi ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems
250a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig gsung bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni 'bum phrag mang por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi
250a3(dkon brtsegs): khams de na sems can gang yang cho ga nyams pa 'am/ 'tsho ba nyams pa 'am/ tshul khrims nyams pa 'am/ lta ba nyams par mi 'gyur ro// zhar ba 'am/ 'theng
250a4(dkon brtsegs): po 'am/ sgur po 'am/ gtum po 'am/ rig pa 'am/ mi bsrun pa 'am/ kla klo can nam/ lkug pa 'am/ grum po 'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro//

250a6(dkon brtsegs): glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i yon tan tshad med pa'i rgyu'i khyad par ni 'di dag dang gzhan yang mang du yod de// /
250a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de nam chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ sku las 'od phyung ba dang / de nas sems can de dag gis 'od de mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/
250b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par 'gyur gyis/ bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du 'dong ngo snyam mo// de na kha cig ni mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'ong bar
250b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// der lha dang mi de dag 'dus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de steng gi bar snang la shing ta la
250b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bum srid du mngon par 'phags te/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyil mo krung du bzhugs nas/ skus khyab par mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi
250b4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
250b5(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / de'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa dang 'gal bar byed pa 'am/ zlog par byed pa'i sems
250b6(dkon brtsegs): can ni gcig kyang med do/ / sems can de dag thams cad ni dbang po rna ba/ mgo smos pas go bar 'gyur ba sha stag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin
250b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan gang yang med par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
251a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag thams cad ni nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de lha'i bu
251a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ mir gyur pa gang la bsod snyoms blang bar bzhed par gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'am/ mir gyur pa de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs lhung bzed thogs pa nye bar gnas pa
251a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / der lha'i bu 'am/ mir gyur pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
251a4(dkon brtsegs): rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa bdag las bshos gsol bar bzhed do snyam nas yid la bsams pas 'khor gyi khyams su stan dang / zas dang / skom dang / ro brgya pa'i
251a5(dkon brtsegs): zas sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la gdugs tshod la bab ces gsol pa dang / der de bzhin gshegs pa de bshos gsol lo// bshos gsol nas slar bzhud par
251a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par 'gyur ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pas gnas par 'gyur
251a7(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de ni yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyad par 'di dag dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de kun nas
251b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par
251b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar shog cig ces smon lam yang btab bo// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

251b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'phangs so/ / rdo rje de 'phangs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// me tog gi char yang bab bo// rol
251b6(dkon brtsegs): mo sil snyan brgya'i sgrarang byung ngo / / 'khor thams cad kyi lag pa g.yas par yang me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dag byung ngo // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
251b7(dkon brtsegs): rdo rjesabacom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bsnyad do/ / chos kyi dbang phyug rgya chen mi pad chos kyi mdzod// chos rnams rab tu 'byeng la mkhas
252a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gro don bzhed/ / chos la thugs ma zhum zhing rtag tu lhug par btang // chos kyi rjes mthun chos sgrub gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can dag pa
252a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi ye shes spyod rnam dag/ yon tan rgyal grags snyan pa 'jig rten gsum du grags// ye shes rgyun ni dus gsum rtag tu bas ma 'tshal// chags 'das zhabs mnyam legs
252a3(dkon brtsegs): pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / zla ba las lhag yongs dag tshul khrims rnam par dag/ nyi ma las lhag 'od mdzes 'od mnga' gzi brjid mchog/ tshangs pa las lhag gsung snyan
252a4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i gsung mnga' ba/ / dkon mchag gsum ldan gser 'gra khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// khyed ni sku yang ston la sku dang ldan ma lags// khyod ni gsung yang rjod la sgra skad
252a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mngara'/ / khyod ni chos kyang gsung la chos kyi 'du shes bral// sems can thar par mdzad la sems can 'du shes bral// gang dag khyod bstan thos nas ji lta bstan pa ltar/
252a6(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa snying por gnas pa dag ni ma gtogs pa// 'gro ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu byung yang ni// khyod kyi bka' drin lan ldon nam yang rngo mi thog de nas gsang ba
252a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi 'phreng ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
252b1(dkon brtsegs): to/ / me tog gi 'phreng ba de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog sna tshogs kyi 'phreng bas/

252b3(dkon brtsegs): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo zas kyis/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pas
252b4(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan mod/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bu'i lung bstan pas bdag lung bstan to// smras pa/ ci zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir khyed lung bstan// smras

252b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus

255a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos bstan to/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems
255a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / gnyis su med pa brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po
255b1(dkon brtsegs): lag na rdo rje brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan pas dbugs phyin pa thob ste/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas
255b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang thabs cig/ nyan thos chen po rnams
255b3(dkon brtsegs): dang thabs cig tu gsang ba pa bdag gi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs shing dgung bdun zhig bzhugs par ci ga nang / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ltung
255b4(dkon brtsegs): lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po mang du mchis te/ sems can gyi rigs
255b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mthong zhing chos kyang thos na yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar
255b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur legs so/ / de nas yang khro ba dang sdang ba'i sems ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g.yog 'khor gang lags pa de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang
255b7(dkon brtsegs): sman pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can
256a1(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i bsam pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
256a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gsang ba pa'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs te/ zhag bdun bzhugs par gnang ngo //
256a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad pa rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga'
256a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song
256a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ / lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba der song ste/ rang gi gnas su phyin to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan
256a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ ci nas 'dod pa spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad ngo mtshar du sems par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs
256a7(dkon brtsegs): nanas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po byas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'khor gyi
256b1(dkon brtsegs): khyams bkod pa bya'o snyam mo/ / de'ang 'di snyam du bsam ste/ bdag gis mngon par te/ dus gcig cig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs
256b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' khri lung bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo mnyal tsam na spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
256b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod
256b4(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya bar gshegs pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag gis lha'i dang / mi'i bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i bkod pa mthong gis/ bcom ldan
256b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod par bya'o snyam
256b6(dkon brtsegs): mo/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ de'i tshe bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po
256b7(dkon brtsegs): l ag na rdo rje bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po ma mtha' yas pa bkang ba de'i bkod pa ci 'dra
257a1(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra ba'i 'khar gyi khyams bkod pa zhig lung lo can gyi ba zang 'bar gyi dbus na gnas par gnang ngo / / 'khar gyi khyams de'ang yangs shang d+ha cha ste/
257a2(dkon brtsegs): nub tu mchung ni dpag tshad drus cu rtsa bani song pa/ wA byang du rgyur ni dpag tshad bani bcu rtsa gnyis yod thA/ sa gag na bai rgyuR+Ya snyan pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa/ phyir ni yan
257a3(dkon brtsegs): dade rnyil las byas pa/ zung gi 'thugs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+mas brgyan pa rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs du mas spras pa/ ras bcas
257a4(dkon brtsegs): bu du ma bting ba/ mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng du ma spangs pa/ dar gyi lnga ldi du mas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi 'phreng ba du mas bkab pa/ pog por du ma nas bdugs pa/
257a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs bkram pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ lus sim par byed pa/ sems la dga' ba skyed pa/
257a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ bsngags pa'i bstan pa tshad med pa ste/ 'khor gyi khyams der seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rtsa bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i kha khyer
257a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa/ mig mangs ris su bres pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu du ma bting ba/ steng du rin po
257b1(dkon brtsegs): che'i dra bas bres pa/ bkod pa sngan ma mthong sa thos pa 'jig rten gyi khams mang ba dag na med pa brgya stong mang po byung ngo // gab zas ri zla ba brgyas bskos pa'ang bshams
257b2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / seng ge'i khri sa la mi brten pa brgya stong yang bzhag ste/ seng ge'i khri re re'i bar snang la'ang rin po che'i gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog dang ldan pa dag bres so//
257b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu byas nas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin
257b4(dkon brtsegs): du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ de'i nub mo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa/ ro bro ba mang
257b5(dkon brtsegs): pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsod pa mang po'ang bshams nas/ nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ kho zos bcom
257b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sem dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gsang ba pa rang gi gnas su spyan drangs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la thugs
257b7(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba'i phyir gnang gis/ de la khyed dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas par mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyiso zhag bdun gyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par de bzhin gshes/
258a1(dkon brtsegs): ba la mchod pa dang rim gro bya bar spro bar gyis shig/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / zin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha ba dang /
258a2(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / grul bum dang / gsang ba pa dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag la'ang grogs po dag
258a3(dkon brtsegs): shes par gyis shig/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor 'dir spyan drangs na gshegs par gnang gis/ de la khyed kyis ngan sems med pa dang
258a4(dkon brtsegs): sdang ba med pa dang / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig/ chos kyang nyan cig ces bsgo'o// /
258a5(dkon brtsegs): / bam po brgyad pa// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu thu bo rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba la smras pa/ bzhin bzang khyod
258a6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la tshangs ris nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo
258a7(dkon brtsegs): can gyi pha brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis/ khyed kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog cig ces sbron cig/ yab de ltar bgyi'o zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gsang
258b1(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bu des byas so/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu gnyis pa lag babangs zhes bya ba la smras pa/ khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song las zla ba'i
258b2(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams nas bzung ste/ bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang
258b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis/ khyed
258b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog cig ces sbron cig/ yab de ltar bgyi'o zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gzhon nu lag bzangs kyis byas so// de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de
258b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong dag gis dpag tshad khri khor yug gi bar snang khyab par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
258b6(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa zo shams te/ nam nangs pa dang pus ma g.yas pa'i lha nga si la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de lags su thal ma sbyar ba
258b7(dkon brtsegs): btud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la gdugs chod bab pa gsol pa/ thub pa chen po dus 'di lags// skyes bunatso bo gshegs su gsol/
259a1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa gshegs su gsol// skyes ba cang mkhyen gshegs su gsol// zab pa chen pa gdugs tshad pag// nang gnyis gsus gshegs
259a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol/ / rkang gnyis dam pa gshegs su gsol// rkang gnyis cang mkhyen gshegs su gsol// tshul khrims pad+ma'i rdzing nas 'khrungs// brtson 'grus chab kyis rnam pa 'phel//
259a3(dkon brtsegs): slob ma bung ba sgra 'byin pa// thub pa pad+ma gshegs su gsol// 'phags pa'i bden par gnas bcas te// byams dang thugs rje'i spyan mnga' zhing // bdag med pa yi sgra
259a4(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs pa/ / rgyal ba seng ge gshegs su gsol// khrims ni rtsa ba chu ba dran// byang chub yan lag me tog rgyan// rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// rgyal ba sdong po
259a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs su gsol/ / shes rab rgya chen zab pa bo// ting 'dzin chab ni grang ldan zhing // rnam 'byor pa yi tshong pas gtams// yon tan rgya mtsho gshegs su gsol// thugs
259a6(dkon brtsegs): rje'i dkyil 'khor dpal ldan pa/ / shes rab 'od zer legs par brgyan// slob ma pad+ma kha 'byed pa// thub pa nyi ma gshegs su gsol// phas kyi rgal bas mi bskyod cing /
259a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam thar la sogs sman chags can// slob dang mi slob ri dgas gtam// thub pa ri bo gshegs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba
259b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gdugs chod bab par mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gdugs tshong bab kyis/ rlom
259b2(dkon brtsegs): gos gyon la lhung bzed thogs shing zhag bdun byin gyis brlabs pa byin gyis rlobs la gtsug lag khang skyong skas shig/ de na nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang
259b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa de dag ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bar snang las dong ngo / / gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khrad du zhugs
259b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems
259b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar/ lha'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod/ lha'i bu mo rnams glu dbyangs len/ 'od zer ni 'gyed
259b6(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi char ni 'bebs/ rol mo sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len/ zhing rnams ni g.yo bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
259b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi
260a1(dkon brtsegs): brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba der nam mkha'
260a2(dkon brtsegs): dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du thogs pa med par gshegs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan
260a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa mi mnga'/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni 'dra/ zla ba nye ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i tshogs kyis
260a4(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba dang ni mtshungs/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin ltar lha'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ tshangs pa chen po ltar tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing gshegs par rgyang ring po nas
260a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i
260a6(dkon brtsegs): me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen pa dang / yongs su 'du dang / yongs su 'du chen po dang / man
260a7(dkon brtsegs): dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / s+tha la dang / sba la chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen
260b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri zhim dang / pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang / 'dab stong dang / skar 'od dang / skar ma dga' dang / kun tu bsrung dang / bsung rtag dang / rtag tu me rto
260b2(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / mig tu sdug pa de dag dang / me tog gzhan dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ro// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
260b3(dkon brtsegs): dan dag kyang bsgreng ngo // rol mo sil snyan brgya stong yang len to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang
260b4(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa dang / sil snyan dang
260b5(dkon brtsegs): glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu len pa dag dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon te/ byang chub
260b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'dun khang du bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sa la bzhugs ma
260b7(dkon brtsegs): thag tu/ de nas de'i chos chen po dal zhing mi drag la sems can thams cad la mi gnod par g.yos par gyur to// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom
261a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon par rig nas/ myur ba myur bar la gar du btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas gnyer gyi 'khor dang bcas te
261a2(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag zas
261a3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/
261a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// btsun mo'i 'khor dang / dpung gi tshogs dang / 'khor 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang /
261a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas bdud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las brtsams te/ 'bar de ltar
261a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa de dag pa/ de ku chu'i gtas kyi sbyang ba mdzad pas/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / drib dang / thul bus dang / zin pa'i 'khar de'i nang na sa thog chags
261a7(dkon brtsegs): tas stong gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / rgyal po chen po de dag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas bud med khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
261b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang yon tan mtha' yas
261b2(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang

261b4(dkon brtsegs): la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i
261b5(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis
261b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te sil snyan dang rol mo byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang
261b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas par lhan cig tu rang gi 'khor gyi khyams su spyan drangs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams der sa la mi rten pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
262a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa nyid kyis seng ge'i gdan ji lta bshams pa la bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'i
262a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor kyang stan ci rigs pa dag la 'khod do/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang
262a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i 'khor chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la bsu bgyis shig/ mchod pa dang rim gro gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang /
262a4(dkon brtsegs): de la gang dag yi rangs dang // zhal tir bya ba byed pa ni// de dag bsod nams skal ba can// de dag yan tan chung ba min// zhes bka' stsal gyis/ de la grogs pa
262a5(dkon brtsegs): dag khyed kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa dang / zhal ta bya ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po long zhig/ de nas lha'i bu de dag gis 'khor gyi khyams
262a6(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa de dang seng ge'i khri bkod pa'ang mthong ngo / / de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'am/ 'on te gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i 'am/
262a7(dkon brtsegs): su'i yin zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang / de dag gis bar snang las 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i byin gyi rlabs yin te/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
262b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po chen po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa zhes bya ba de
262b2(dkon brtsegs): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba chos ston pa der/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bkod pa rnams 'di lta bu mthong nas/ gsang ba
262b3(dkon brtsegs): paba'i bdag pos bkod pa de nyid 'khor gyi khyams 'dir byin gyis brlabs so zhes sgra thos so/ / bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan de la bzhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe
262b4(dkon brtsegs): lung lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag
262b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sta phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phrag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom
262b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'dud do/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/ khyed thams
262b7(dkon brtsegs): cad lhan cig tu 'dus la lhan cig tu tshur shog/ ji ltar bshams pa'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das la gsol cig/ de nas gsang ba po'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes btsun mo'i 'khor
263a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas/ gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ rang gi lag nas gus par bsti stang
263a2(dkon brtsegs): du byas te/ bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa mang po ro bro ba mang po du ma dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
263a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'os pa'i zhal zas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bstabs te tshim par byas so// bstabs
263a4(dkon brtsegs): te tshim par byas nas lhung bzed bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag bcabs par rig nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// lcang lo can gyi pho brang
263a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to//
263a6(dkon brtsegs): lcang lo can du gshegs nas bshos gsol ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po log na rdo rjes chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom
263a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ ci nas byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par 'gyur
263b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor 'di'i yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang
263b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang / khyad par gyi khyad par du mngon par du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / nyams pa'i cha can du mi 'gyur bar de ltar chos kyi
263b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul la 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams
263b4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag
263b5(dkon brtsegs): gang la zhugs na/ khyad par du mngon par 'phags par 'gyur zhing / nyams pa'i cha can du mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul khyed la bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes
263b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag
263b7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / grogs po dag 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bsam pa thag pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
264a1(dkon brtsegs): khaskyed de dad pa yin/ dang ba mang zhing 'phags pa rnams la lta 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par 'dod pa dang / ser sna med par btang
264a2(dkon brtsegs): ba gtong ba dang / lag brkyang ste gtong ba la dga' ba dang / mchod sbyin byed pa'i ngang can dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sbyin pa 'gyed pa la dga' ba
264a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / de las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang / mos pa dang /
264a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang / som nyi med la the tsam mi za zhing / yid gnyis mi za ba yin/ de dkar po dang nag po'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za bar rig nas/ srog
264a5(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir yang mi bya ba mi byed do/ de srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang /
264a6(dkon brtsegs): ngag rtsub po dang / tshig bkyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spangs pa yin te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs
264a7(dkon brtsegs): bas no/ / da dang par gyur nas dge srung ba/ bram pa gang dag yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang
264b1(dkon brtsegs): tan dang ldan pa dang / nges pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / mang du thos pa dang / thos pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa la rab
264b2(dkon brtsegs): tu brtson pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / ngo zlogs phod par smra zhing gtsam bur mi smra ba dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can dang / mi dge ba'i
264b3(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su spong ba dang / mi rgod pa dang / ma khengs pa dang / mu cor smra ba ma yin pa dang / tshig ma 'chal ba dang / dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang / shin
264b4(dkon brtsegs): tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / srid pa'i tshul bcad pa dang / zug rngu phyung ba dang / khur bor ba dang / som nyi las nges par brgal ba dang
264b5(dkon brtsegs): the tshom las brgal ba dang / yang srid pa las brgal ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnam pa de lta
264b6(dkon brtsegs): bu la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas bstan to/ / bsnyen te// bsnyen bkur byed do// mnyes par byed cing / mi mnyes par mi byed la/ dgyes par byed de/ des
264b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mnyes par byas pas/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang
265a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar yang dag par ston/ tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye ba dang / sa
265a2(dkon brtsegs): pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang / sgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur bar yang dag par ston to// 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni
265a3(dkon brtsegs): ser sna'o/ / 'di ni ser sna'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims so// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smon pa'o// de ni bzod pa'o// 'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin
265a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / 'di ni brtson 'grus so// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni bsam gtan no// 'di ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni shes
265a5(dkon brtsegs): rab bo/ / 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab bo// 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi legs par
265a6(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa'o/ / 'di ni lus kyi legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o//
265a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ngag gi legs par spyad pa'o// 'od ni ngag gi legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'od ni ngag gi nyes par spyad pa'o// 'di ni ngag gi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam
265b1(dkon brtsegs): bar smin pa'o/ / 'di ni yid kyi legs par spyad pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'o// 'don yid
265b2(dkon brtsegs): nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o/ / 'di ni dge ba'o// 'di ni mi dge ba'o// 'di ni bya ba'o// 'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o// 'di ni byas na yun ring po'i don dang /
