265b5(dkon brtsegs): gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i gtam dang / ma skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i
265b6(dkon brtsegs): gtam dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i gtam rab tu ston to// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam
265b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di skye/ 'di med pa'i phyir 'di 'gag pa 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen
266a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs

266b1(dkon brtsegs): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di
266b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gag par 'gyur ro/ / de la don dam par na 'byung ba 'am/ 'gag pa'i chos gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/
266b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ tshor ba po med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'o// 'di la 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa 'am/ rjes su 'jug pa'i chos gang
266b4(dkon brtsegs): yang med de/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa/ kun tu gti mug pas khams gsum pa 'dogs par 'gyur te/ nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / las
266b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'dogs pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so// yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu gti mug pa de'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
266b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brtags na chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa por 'gyur ba med de/ gang la byed pa po mi dmigs pa de la 'jug pa med/ ldog pa med do zhes brjod par bya'o// de chos
266b7(dkon brtsegs): zab mo'i gtam de lta bu thos nas som nyi med do/ / the tshom mi za'o// chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi chags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
267a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi chags so// de ming dang gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so// rna ba dang /
267a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / chos thams
267a3(dkon brtsegs): cad rang bzhin gyis dben par yid ches so/ / grogs po dag de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// dam
267a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa
267a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsams
267a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// de brtson 'grus brtsams pas khyim gyi gnas don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro// chung ma dang
267a7(dkon brtsegs): mo dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su 'dzin pas yongs su spyod pa don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ de na tshad
267b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur rnam par rtse ba la mi dga' bas/ na tshod mdzes pa la bab pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur du rab tu 'byung //

267b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i chos rnams nyan to// sgrub pa snying por byed kyi/ tshig lhur len pa'i blo dang ldan pa ma yin no// mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba'i
267b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa'ang yin te/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis thob pa dang / bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi re bar gzhan
267b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston to/ / bdag gi tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar gzhan dag la chos mi ston to// ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan dag la chos

267b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / mgu sla ba dang / gas sla ba dang / dgon pa dang / bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin/ ji ltar thos
268a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams kyi don la yongs su rtog pa yin no/ / don la ston pa yin te/ tshig 'bru la ni ston pa ma yin no// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du
268a2(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par gyur pa yin/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtson pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste/ sa
268a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo/ / bag yod pa lhur len pa'ang yin te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po sdom pa'o// de mig gis gzugs rnams

268a5(dkon brtsegs): du rab tu shes so/ / de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams dang / snas dri rnams dang / lces ro rnams dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis chos rnams shes nas mtshan
268a6(dkon brtsegs): mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'di
268a7(dkon brtsegs): bag yod pa zhes bya'o/ / gzhan yang bag yod pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang / nyon mongs pa la dga' ba sel ba dang / chos la
268b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /
268b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / ngag gi gnyis par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /

268b4(dkon brtsegs): bag yod par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang ldan pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dad pa mang ba dang / rtag

268b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni chos dang ldan par 'gro ba yin te/ sangs rgyas mthong ba rnams mnyes par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam la gnas so// che ba nyid kyang 'thob bo//
269a1(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po che ba nyid thob nas/ che ba nyid 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su
269a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya'o/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thob par 'dod pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis shin tu grub pa dang / bde ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la
269a3(dkon brtsegs): brtson par bya'o/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'ongs pa'i 'khor 'di ji ltar lhang nge ba la ltos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dge ba'i rtsa ba las
269a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shin tu brtson par bya'o/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
269a5(dkon brtsegs): po bag yod par gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni dge ba'i rtse ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ / de la bag yod pa ni sems rjes su srung ba dang / yul 'dor ba dang /
269a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la dga' ba rnam par spong ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba la rten pa dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par
269a7(dkon brtsegs): 'che ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / mi dge ba rnams dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang /
269b1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa nas/ nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba'i chos

269b3(dkon brtsegs): gagis bag yod par byed pa dang / dad pa byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang
269b4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des dran pa dang shes bzhin la brtson par bya'o/ / dran pa dang shes bzhin des byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// gsang
269b5(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o// gsang
269b6(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdag po tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yod pa de'ang rab tu shes so/ / gang med pa de'ang med pa rab tu shes so// de la yod pa ni gang med pa ni
269b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod do// 'di ni yod pa zhes bya'o// de la med pa gang zhe na/ log par sbyar ba dang ldan
270a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lan 'phags pa rnas par thub pa ma dang / ngan meng pa#// gzhan yang las dang nam pa sbyin pan ma da// gang snang dA rnam par /
270a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa ni med do// gzhan yang kun rdzob tu mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni yang ngo // gang mig nas yid kyi bar dang ldan pa
270a3(dkon brtsegs): ni med do/ / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa la ni byang chub yod do// le lo can la ni byang chub med do// phyin ci log las byung ba'i phung po lnga dag
270a4(dkon brtsegs): ni yod do/ / rgyu med pa las chos 'byung ba ni med do// gzhan yang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi gzugs ni yod do// rtag pa dang /
270a5(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa dang / zer zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs de ni med do// de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang / sdug
270a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yod do// rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / thar
270a7(dkon brtsegs): zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni med do// gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis du byed
270b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de dag ni yod do/ / ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba de dag med do// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// 'du byed
270b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams med na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni med do/ / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni yod do// rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs
270b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni med do/ / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni yod do// ming dang gzugs med na skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni med do// skye mched
270b4(dkon brtsegs): drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do/ / skye mched drug med na reg pa zhes bya ba de ni med do// reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do// reg pa med na
270b5(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni med do/ / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// tshor ba med na sred pa zhes bya ba de ni med do// sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba
270b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni yod do/ / sred pa med na len pa zhes bya ba de ni med do// len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// len pa med na srid pa zhes bya ba de ni med do// srid
270b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do/ / srid pa med na skye ba zhes bya ba de ni med do// skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
271a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni yod do// skye ba med na rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
271a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams med do// gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur
271a3(dkon brtsegs): ni med do/ / tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do// tshul khrims kyis ngan song du skye ba ni med do// thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do// rdzas
271a4(dkon brtsegs): pas shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba ni med do/ / bsgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do// bsgoms pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa
271a5(dkon brtsegs): yid la byed pa dang ldan na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni yod do/ / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni med do// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la rna
271a6(dkon brtsegs): kun shes pa brda sprod pa med do/ / mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa la ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod do// gzhan yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do// nang
271a7(dkon brtsegs): gi rjes su song ba'i bdag ni meng ngo / / ye shes dang ldan pa la ni thar pa yod do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa la ni 'byung ba med do// bdag gam/ sems can nam/ @
271b1(dkon brtsegs): gam/ gang zag ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni med do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na bag yod pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas
271b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la yod par grags pa gang yin pa de ni yod par rab tu shes so/ / 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la med par grags pa gang yin pa de ni med par
271b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu shes so/ / de yod do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la'ang mi chags so// med do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la'ang mi chags te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
271b4(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa yang dag pa'i don rjes su rtogs so/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mdor bsdus te/ chos kyi mdo bzhir rnam par
271b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhag go/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang / lha tshe ring po rtag par 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad
271b6(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang / lha dang mi bde bar 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang / mu stegs can bdag tu smra ba rnams kyi
271b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la bdag med do zhes bya ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dpyod pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni nga zhes bya'o//
272a1(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po mi rtag ces bya ba de ni shin tu mi rtag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so// sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de ni smon pa dang bral ba'i tshig bla dgas
272a2(dkon brtsegs): so/ / bdag med ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba de ni mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so//

272a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis
272a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'jig rten bskyong bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag khyed kyis

272b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / gzhan gyi chung ma dag la mi 'phyo ba dang / chos spyod pa rnams la bden pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed
272b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / za ba'i tshig med de zher mi 'debs pa dang / tshig tsam ji lta ba bzhin te gzhan la mi slu ba dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la 'dod pa med pa dang / gnod sems
272b3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi ba dang / lta ba yongs su dag cing yang dag par song ba ste/ grogs po dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan
272b4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / thams cad du mthun par
272b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba

272b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ston pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / sems can thams cad
273a1(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i lus kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /
273a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba dang po'o// de bzhin du ston pa dang /

273a5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba gnyis pa dang gsum pa'o// rnyed pa gang dag chos dang mthun pa/ chos kyis rnyed pa tha na lhung bzed kyi nang du chud pa 'am/ lhung bzed par

273b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'bags pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa/ gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims rnams kyis

274a2(dkon brtsegs): grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jig pa spangs

274a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ grogs po dag 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa'i chos bzhi po 'di dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten

274a6(dkon brtsegs): po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos ni gcig kho na te/ 'di lta ste/ bden pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa/ bka' blo bde ba ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa/ gya
274a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa ste/ grogs po dag chos gcig pu de ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag de lta bu'i chos la brtson na 'jig rten sbyang bar byed de/ grogs
274b1(dkon brtsegs): po dag khyed kyis chos de lta bu la brtson pas 'jig rten skyongs shig/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du
274b2(dkon brtsegs): dgongs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag brjod pas 'khor 'di thams cad dge ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par
274b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag ngas 'khor 'di la brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa
274b4(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas su gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag smras pa de dag dang / byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug nas 'gro ba la phan pa
274b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bde ba'i phyir/ ngas sems kyi dran pas gang dag smras pa de dag khyod kyis dran nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
274b6(dkon brtsegs): / gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag la khyod spobs par gyis shAH/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bam
274b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi spyan sngar tsug cig pur 'dug nas/ lag pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so// 'di lta ste/ A r+yal/

275a4(dkon brtsegs): gardza tu sa mu dra ba ga i ti/ gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos sa// sa thams cad kyang rab tu g.yas so// rgya mtsho chen pa'ang
275a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'khrug go/ de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang 'dar bar pad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis

275a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bsrung du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag la gnod lags so// bdag
275b1(dkon brtsegs): cag la rab tu gnod lags so/ / bdag cag 'dar bad bad lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/
275b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi yul ni/ 'di lta ste/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug pa

275b4(dkon brtsegs): chags brgyad khris byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sems can tshad med pa de dag gis bslab pa'i gnas rnams blangs par gyur pa de ltar chos rgya cher bstan to// /

275b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba
275b7(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches bcu dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
276a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ / bcu gang zhe na/ kha zab med pa byams pa chen po dang / yongs su ma skye ba'i snying chen po dang
276a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam par sbyar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon sum du rtogs pa'i shes rab dang / thams
276a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi rjes su sang ba'i mkhas pa dang / dus gsum yongs su sbyang ba'i ye shes dang / bdon pa mthong ba sbyang bar bya ba'i sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang

276a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na/ mi sdang mi skrag cing skrag par mi
276b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te brgyad gang zhe na/ shes rab kyis brtan pa yin/ ye shes kyis brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin/ rgya chen po la mos pa yin//
276b2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa'i chos las nges par byung ba yin/ chos la mi rtag par mos pa yin/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub
276b3(dkon brtsegs): par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad pa de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na

276b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ legs par bskams shing nyams par ma gyur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgos yongs su bsgos pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan
276b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ tshangs pa'i bla ma 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ thams cad kyi rjes su rnam par rgyu ba'i thabs dang shes rab las nges pa
277a1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na/ bya ba thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gsal pa/
277a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/
277a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa ye shes kyi sgo dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes rab kyi sgo dang / skad thams cad kun tu 'dzin pa la 'jug pa gzung
277a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo dang / chos mi zad pa bstan pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo ste/ gzhon nu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
277a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/
277a6(dkon brtsegs): snying rje bar bya ba'i phyir nges par sems dpa'i stobs dang / phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shes rab chen por bya ba'i phyir thos pa'i stobs dang / rnam
277a7(dkon brtsegs): par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rmo pa'i stobs dang / 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir bsgoms pa'i stobs dang / sems can bsrung ba'i phyir bzod pa'i stobs dang
277b1(dkon brtsegs): bdud tshar gcod pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya/
277b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir mi skye bar bzod pa'i stobs te/ gzhon nu dgu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ gsang ba pa'i
277b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag po'i bu de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dag bzod pa thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
277b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i gnas su yun ring du gnas shing spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin
277b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du na 'dzam bu gling du rgyas par 'gyur zhing / ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas
277b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i
277b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag pa 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas char gcod par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la
278a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snang ba mtshas dam pa la 'dug pa 'byung ba dang / bdud kyi sa 'ongs pa na 'dud char gtsang pa'i phyir byad/
278a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag pasams shing brjod pa dang / kha ton bya ba de dag la khyad spabs par gyis shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
278a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
278a4(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// tad+ya thA/ hu lu/ hu lA/ hu le/ d+hA ra/ d+hA rA te/ a ku sha la
278a5(dkon brtsegs): kA ye/ tsa le/ tsa la ba ti/ sA raM/ kU re/ krAn ti ba le/ krA me/ krAn ti ka/ sha me/ hu lu/ a li khi/ khi ri kha re/ A be sha ni sa ra Ne/ dza ma
278a6(dkon brtsegs): dza ya ba ti/ s+thi re/ a brti/ bi brte/ a brta naM/ mai tra b+hU tA nan sang gra he/ da me/ da ma sam ban ne/ tIr+Ne ta ra ya se/ swa yan/ swa sti de be b+h+yo/ nA ge r+g+ga/
278a7(dkon brtsegs): yawe b+h+yo/ gan d+harma rAk+ka se b+h+yo/ ma nu Sha a ma nu She b+hu swa stir b+ha ba tum dA su kham/ gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas// ri yi rgyal po rnams kyang g.yos// sa yang rab tu
278b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yos par gyur/ / chu yi rgyal po rnams kyang 'khrugs// gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas// bas kyi rgol rnams tshar yang gcod// chos smra ba ni yang dag bsdus/
278b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mdzod ni kun tu bsrungs// gsang sngags gzhi 'di thos nas ni// lha tshogs kun tu dga' gyur nas// dam chos ring du gnas 'gyur zhes// phan tshun du ni smra bar
278b3(dkon brtsegs): byed/ / stong gsum po yang rab tu g.yos// khor yang rab tu 'dar gyur nas/ mi yi dbang po'i zhabs gnyis la// gtugs pa byas te skyabs su dong // de dag mi
278b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs der phyin nas/ / ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal te// mdo 'di byin gyis brlabs pas na// dam chos ring du gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom
278b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas su zhag bdun 'das 'das su sems can tshad med pa dag gi don mdzad nas/ zhag bdun 'das te lcang lo can gyi
278b6(dkon brtsegs): brang 'khor du sems can gyi don mdzad pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas nas gshegs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi
278b7(dkon brtsegs): lam de nyid nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdang / lha'i tshogs kyis ni phyag byas/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis ni mngon
279a1(dkon brtsegs): par bstod/ gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding du mag ni bskrur/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'a
279a2(dkon brtsegs): rten skyong ba rnams kyis ni mngon par bstod/ 'od zer gyi dra ba ni rab tu 'gyed/ rol mo sil snyan ni len/ me tog gi char ni 'bebs/ zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar
279a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po ba
279a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos dang ba'i rgyab
279a5(dkon brtsegs): po ltar thogs pa med par gshegs te/ slar bya rgod kyi rung ba'i ril byon te// gsang ba pa'o bdag pa lag na rdo rje'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to//
279a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhud pa dang byon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs
279a7(dkon brtsegs): cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos ston to// de nas rgyal po'i khab
279b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags drug khri dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs par rig nas/ phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe me
279b2(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs to/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
279b3(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po ma skyes
279b4(dkon brtsegs): dgras/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di na 'dun khang na mchis mchis na/ gzhon nu 'jigs byed sbyin mchis te 'di
279b5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces mchi'o/ / yab bcom ldan 'das ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol nas slar gshegs shes
279b6(dkon brtsegs): gda'o zhes mchis nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsamra te/ gang gi slad du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du bcom
279b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das spyan drangs na yang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs pas/ 'di ltar gang de bzhin
280a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yongs su btang ba'i sems can de ni sems can gyi rigs na gang yang ma mchis te/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
280a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnam par nges pa lung bstan pa lung bstan pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
280a3(dkon brtsegs): po lag na rdo rje dga' bar gyur pa'i bdag nyid chen po ngo mtshar to snyam du bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
280a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na des 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
280a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis ni gnas 'di la mos par dka' ste/ 'on
280a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni mos par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis
280a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' rtogs par nus kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
280b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de dag gi gan nas tshangs par spyad pa spyad pa des na spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/
280b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen pa khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang chos grangs med pa
280b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya che ba'i yang ches rgya che ba/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rgyal ba can
280b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
280b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par zhi spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
280b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par zhi spyod de/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis yus dang srog kyang btang ste/ brtson 'grus brtsams par bya ba zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig yang dag par stan
280b7(dkon brtsegs): to/ / rgyal ba chen po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
281a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus srog kyang btang ste/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o zhes de skad bka' stsal pa la/ bcom ldan
281a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
281a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de ni le lo can du grags pa lags pa snyam du bdag bgyid do/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
281a4(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams ni 'khor ba la yongs su skyo ba'i blo skye bar mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i
281a5(dkon brtsegs): slad du 'khor ba la phan yon du lta ba lags kyis/ mya ngan las 'das pa la ni de lta ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi don la brtson
281a6(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa rnams la 'khor ba ni ches pa de'i/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni de lta ma
281a7(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la brtson pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don bgyid pa de lta de ltar
281b1(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na slad kyis ci zhig bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba'i bde
281b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyis te/ mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang
281b3(dkon brtsegs): babar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyod cing sems can gyi don la brtson pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur/ chos tshad ma mchis pa nyan par
281b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / sems can tshad ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid pa ni sems can gyi spyod yul
281b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi rjes su 'jug go/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du bgyid pa ni btang snyoms su ltung logs so// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
281b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i spyod yul gyis skrag na/ spyod yul ma lags par ltung ste/ slad kyis sems can gyi don mi bgyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul
281b7(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so// de'i spyod yul ma lags pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang
282a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyis 'tshal zhing / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la g.yel ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams
282a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni 'khor bas
282a3(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa'i spyod yul ba lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor ba dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' rang gi
282a4(dkon brtsegs): sprad yul la gnas par bgyi'o/ / rgyal po chen pos de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs la 'di skad
282a5(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpas rang gi spyod yul gyi bya ba dag la gus par byas te/
282a6(dkon brtsegs): rang gi spyod yul la spyad par bya'i/ gzhan gyi spyad yul la spyad par mi bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul gang lags
282a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsol pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems do pa'i rang gi spyod yul ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pas mi skrag pa dang / byang chub sems
282b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa'i phan yon dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'dod pa med pa dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba med par yang shes la/ khams gsum du'ang mtshams sbyor ba
282b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / sel ba dang / sdud pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams spel ba dang / tshul la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba shes pa dang / dge ba thams cad sogs pa la mkhas po dang /
282b3(dkon brtsegs): zad pa'ang shes la/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / skye ba med par yang rab tu rtogs la/ bsams bzhin du skye ba la'ang mkhas pa dang / sems
282b4(dkon brtsegs): can yang med la/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad la dben par shes la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la'ang mkhas pa
282b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du'ang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la'ang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi
282b6(dkon brtsegs): sku yin par yang shes la/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan rnam par bsgrub pa yongs su tshol ba la'ang mkhas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang shes la
282b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par du bya ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos kyang yongs su sbyang la/ don nyung zhing bya ba nyung ba dang / sems can
283a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi tsi d+ya'o cog la'ang mkhas la/ lus dang sems dben par dga' ba'ang shes pa dang / chos bstan pa'ang mi 'dor la/ smra ba la smra
283a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la'ang mkhas pa dang / bsam gtan yang skyed la/ bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar yang mi byed pa dang / chos zab mo rtogs pa'ang shes la/ sems can gyi spyad pa sna tshogs
283a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes su'ang 'jug cing / gtam yang dag par ston pa la mkhas pa dang / 'byung ba med par yang shes la/ bsams bzhin du sring ba'ang yongs su 'dzin pa 'o kA
283a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong yang shes la/ 'bras bu thob par mi byed pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba 'a dang
283a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyan mi gcod pa la'ang mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'dor ba'ang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la lta ba la'ang mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni bar
283a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul lo/ / rgyal po chen po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod pas/
283a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ byang chub sems
283b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang
283b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag sems pa ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags pa snyam bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na gnas
283b3(dkon brtsegs): gang lags pa dang / gzugs snang ba thams cad la mi sgrib pa dang / nam mkha'i spyod yul sgrib pa mchis pas gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyad yul lags so// bcom
283b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' thobs la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper
283b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi na gnod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyod yul lags te/ dug go shing ljon pa 'am/ sman gyi shing ljon pa 'am/ tsher ma can gyi zhing ljon pa 'am/ me tog gi
283b6(dkon brtsegs): shing ljon pa 'am/ 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa 'am/ spos kyi shing ljon pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad ni nam mkha' las rnam par 'phel yang / nam mkha' ni de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par
283b7(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par dag par yang mi 'gyur/ rjes su 'chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems
284a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thams la mkhas pa/ shes rab las nges par byung ba'i rang gi spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags te/ so so'i skye ba'i chos gang dag lags pa dang / slob
284a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos dang / mi slob pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang dag lags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang dag lags pa
284a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag thams cad ni nges mngon par rdzogs par rdzogs par bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyin zhugs ni rtswa 'am/
284a4(dkon brtsegs): nags tshal gang yang rung ste/ de las mi 'bros kyi/ de dag thams cad ni me sgron gsal bar 'bar bar bgyid pas phan par gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes
284a5(dkon brtsegs): rab kyis me sgron 'bar bar bgyid pas/ chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi ma chen po che'i lus ni zhugs kyis
284a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshig/ mtshon gyis mi khums/ dug gis mi 'gum ste/ de pha rol gyi gnod pas mi tshugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyang
284a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang 'dris par bgyid pas zhi bar bgyid mi nus te/ de ji lta ji ltar 'dris par bgyid ba de
284b1(dkon brtsegs): lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la brtson pa shes rab gsal bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na nor bu rin po che chab dang bar bgyid pa ni rnyog pa thams
284b2(dkon brtsegs): cad dang bar bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rin po che'ang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bar bgyid do// bcom ldan
284b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na sman gyi rigs 'bral byed ces bgyi ba de ni dug dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas la/ dug thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
284b4(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa'ang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa 'am/ rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu mi gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi nyon
284b5(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na/ chos thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lags so// rgyal po chen po byang chub
284b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dpa' stobs kyis de skad bstan pa na/ srog chags brgyad stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni
284b7(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/ / rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par zhi spyod kyi gsung rab la
285a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di nyid
285a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi go cha brtan po 'di lta bu bgos so// de ltar sangs rgyas mang po
285a3(dkon brtsegs): la bsnyen bkur byas so/ / dpa' stobs kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di snyam du sems te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
285a4(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje lag pa g.yas pa na rdo rje thogs pa de ci lci ba zhig gam/ 'on te yang ba zhig/ gang gi phyir na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di stobs kyi shugs chen po bdog pa zhes byasnyam mo//
285a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i sems kyis rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ rgyal po chen po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal ba
285a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po rdo rje 'di ni lci ba'ang yin la/ yang ba'ang yin no// smras pa/ ci'i phyir ni lci ba yin la/ ji ltar na yang ba'ang yin/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can nga rgyal
285a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas snyems pa rnams yongs su gdul ba'i phyir lci ba yin no// sems can nga rgyal med pa dang / drang ba rnams la ni yang ba yin no// de nas
285b1(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sa phyogs de rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje de sa'i steng du bzhag pa dang / de bzhag ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
285b2(dkon brtsegs): khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ / de nas gsang ba bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa steng 'di
285b3(dkon brtsegs): nas theg cig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan pas rdo rje de stobs kyi shugs thams cad kyi 'deg par bskyod na/ skra'i rtse mo cha tsam
285b4(dkon brtsegs): yang bskyod pa 'am/ bsgral bar ma nus na/ de ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chen po che chen po'i
285b5(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi shugs dang ldan te/ go cha dang ya lang bskon pa'i glang po che'ang lag pa la gcig gis gdeg pa'i rngo thog na/ bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'ang bskyod pa 'am/ bskul
285b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rdo'ang ma thog na/ gdeg par lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di ni ltos/ 'di la khyed yi
285b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'chad cigade nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ka'u shi ka khyod rdo rje 'chang ba zhes bya na/ rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'din
286a1(dkon brtsegs): theg / / de nas la'i dbang pa rgya rkyen gyis rangag skabs kyi thugs dang / rdu yul gyi stobs dang / bas kyi grags sems cad bstan /
286a2(dkon brtsegs): de bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar ma nus so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi
286a3(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang g.yul 'gyed pa de'i tshe lag pa g.yas pas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyi shing rta dpag tshad bdun brgya pa drag tu mchi ba'ang 'dzin pa'i rngo thog na/ bdag gis rdo rje chung ngu
286a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di bskyod pa 'am/ bskul ba'i rngo ma thog pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka
286a5(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje 'di ni lci ste/ 'di la nga'i byin rlabs ma yin par rig par bya'o// koru shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab lci ba yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
286a6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i rgyal po ri rab ji tsam du lci ba ni dper bgyi bar yang sla ba ma lags ma/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'u shi ka rdo rje 'di ni lci ste/ ko'u shi ka gal te gsang ba ba'i
286a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi khor yug gi ri la bsnun na/ de'ang dper na phub ma spar gang gtor ba bzhin du rnam par 'thor te/ ko'u shi ka rdo rje 'di'i stobs kyi shugs ni de tsam mo//
286b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan
286b2(dkon brtsegs): thos rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di snyam du bsams
286b3(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di'i mdun du/ rdo rje 'di gdeg ma nus na ni bdag la dbang za bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des de 'dra ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis rdo rje de la bzung ba
286b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos te/ chu'ang gnam du brgal cing / rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrugs kyang rdo rje de bskyod pa
286b5(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ bskul bar ma nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo zos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol
286b6(dkon brtsegs): to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / de ltar
286b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang che bar grags la/ de ltar mthu che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi tshe 'tshal na/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chab kyi phung po lag mthil gcig tu 'jog go// bcom ldan
287a1(dkon brtsegs): ' das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang dper bgyi na mi la la zhig gis kar sha pa Na gcig mjug mo'i rtsems bsgo bzlog pa de bzhin du bdag
287a2(dkon brtsegs): gis bsgra bzlog go/ / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mchi ba'ang bdag gis thogs par bgyid do// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang lag pa ya gcig gis blangs
287a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo de gnyis kyang btul lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi

287a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rdo'ang ma thog pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa 'am/ gcig tu ma gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

287a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na ri'i rgyal ba
287b1(dkon brtsegs): rab yod pa rnams ni bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar nus kyi/ rdo rje 'di na sa phyogs 'di nas bskyod pa 'am/ bskul bar mi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen
287b2(dkon brtsegs): pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni stobs che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u
287b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ri gcig tu gyur kyang de ni gdeg par nus kyi/ rdo rje 'di ni gdeg par mi nus
287b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ / de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba
287b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan pa lags te ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i stobs de pha ma
287b6(dkon brtsegs): las gyur pa lags sam/ 'on te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu pha ma las gyur pa'i stobs de ni gang ci'ang rung ste/
287b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa tsam du ming bstan par zad do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de ma lus par bstan na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rgya rgya bor 'gyur
288a1(dkon brtsegs): ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lha stangs kyis phyogs thams cad du kun tu gzigs te/ gsang ba ba'i bdag pa lag

288a3(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par byas nas/ sa'i steng de nas rdo rje de lag pa g.yon pas blangs te stang gi bar snang du 'phangs nas/ des de bar lda @
288a4(dkon brtsegs): bdun bskor te lag pa g.yas par bzhag go/ / de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ra rdo rje la phag
288a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ji tsam du stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sems

288b1(dkon brtsegs): bu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog ni yongs su gtong gi/ dam pa'i chos ni yongs su mi gtang ba dang / sems can tha/

288b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang / sems can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / sems can nad pa rnams la yang dag pa'i gso ba bya bar spro ba dang / sems can dbul po rnam

288b6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa la gnas shing cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
288b7(dkon brtsegs): phul pa/ rgyal po chen pa byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na cang shes par 'gyur zhing / cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bka' /

290a1(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen pa chos nyan pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni the tshom spong ba'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu mthun pa
