290b7(dkon brtsegs): chen pa byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po snying rje chen po bskyed
291a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba su'i lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su dad pa skyed pa'i'o// gsol
291a2(dkon brtsegs): pab/ bcom ldan 'das dad pa skyed pa su lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed
291a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de su lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das su lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par mi 'khrug
291a4(dkon brtsegs): pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po su snying rje chen po bskyed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po skyed pa ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal
291a5(dkon brtsegs): po chen po ji ltar sems can rnams la yongs su mi gtong ba skyed pa lta bu'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ba lags/ bka'
291a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bdag gi bde ba yongs su gtang ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bde ba gtong ba ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal
291a7(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po su dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkan mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba su lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal
291b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po su nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de dkon mchog gsum yongs su mi gtong ba yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras
291b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba bstan pa legs par gsungs pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa legs par
291b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa rjes su mthun pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu chab mi 'tshal ba dang / rtag pa dang chad pa ma mchis pa dang /
291b4(dkon brtsegs): las dang bya ba la 'jug pa bstan pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba chab mi 'tshal ba dang / mi slu ba'i mtshan nyid legs par gsungs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so//
291b5(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dag ma gtogs par/ 'di ltar rgya che zhing
291b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar gya nom pa'i bstan pa 'di la brtson pa rnams la su zhig zlog par bgyid/ gnod par bgyid/ spang bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la
291b7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyi'o/ / gang gi mthus bdag nyid nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad las rnam par log pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ bdag gis sha dang zag
292a1(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang bka' drin lan blan pa'i rnga ma thogs lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gi mthus bdag gi bzang po ma lags pa'i 'gyod pa chen po bsal ba dang
292a2(dkon brtsegs): chos snang ba chen po thob par bgyis pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang bdag gis drin lan blan pa'i rngo ma thog lags so/ / tshangs pa'i spyod
292a3(dkon brtsegs): bapa 'di mtha' dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ngo zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'o// ma skyes dgras zhus pa lung bstan pa'i
292a4(dkon brtsegs): le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / // bam po bcu pa ste tha ma'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis
292a5(dkon brtsegs): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa sprul pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyang sprul pa sprul lam/ lag
292a6(dkon brtsegs): na rdo rjes spras pa/ bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa 'di kha za'i dbang yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig
292a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul na/ kho ba sprul pa gzugs tha dad pa rnam par rtsen pa tha dad pa'ang de snyed de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o//
292b1(dkon brtsegs): denas byang chub sems dpa' chen bzhi pa'i blo gras kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi phyir phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la/
292b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa skyes bu dam pa de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar de bzhin gshegs pa
292b3(dkon brtsegs): la gsol ba thob cig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs zin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yi ge gang
292b4(dkon brtsegs): dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsnyad pa'i yi ge de dag ni ma skyes pa/ zad par mi 'gyur ba/ nub par mi 'gyur ba'o// yi ge gang gis don gang brjod pa'i don de'ang nub par bya bar mi nus
292b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ / zhi ba'i zla gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos ni nub par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la skye ba ci'ang med do// gang skye ba med pa de ni 'gag go// bcom
292b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis 'di la dgongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa
292b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / chos ji lta ba bzhin 'di ni 'dug pa nyid do zhes gsungs te/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba yin no// gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal
293a1(dkon brtsegs): ba de dam pa'i chos yin no/ / dam pa'i chos gang yin pa de rtag par mi nub ste/ des na dam pa'i chos zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/ gsang ba
293a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bdag po gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag gang du go cha gyon/ smras pa/ gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir go cha gyon pa de dag ni/
293a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad dang mi 'gal bar bya ba'i phyir go cha gyon no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba de nyid dam pa'i chos so// smras pa/ ji ltar na chos dang
293a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gal ba gang yin/ smras pa/ yi ge dang 'gal na chos dang 'gal ba yin te/ chos dang ni nam yang 'gal bar mi 'gyur ro// de la gang dag mi 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos
293a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ / smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ smras pa/
293a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i zla gros yod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'jig rten ni lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin la/ de ni stong pa nyid du smra ba yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad
293a7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gal lo/ / 'jig rten ni rtog pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / bdag gir smra ba yin la/ de ni mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang
293b1(dkon brtsegs): mi sdug pa dang / bdag dang / bdag gi med par smra ba yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// 'jig rten ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba yin la/ de ni rgyun las
293b2(dkon brtsegs): bzlog ste 'gro ba des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo/ / 'jig rten ni tshe 'di ltar len pa yin la/ da ni tshe rabra 'pho ba lhur len pa yin te/ des na de 'jig rten thams cad dang
293b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gal lo/ / 'jig rten ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin la/ de ni chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to//
293b4(dkon brtsegs): des na 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal lo// zhi ba'i blo gros rnam grangs 'dis ni gang dag 'jig rten thams cad dang 'gal ba de dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin to// smras pa// gsang
293b5(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i bdag po khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin tam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yongs su 'dzin te/ bdag yongs su mi 'dzin sems can yongs su mi 'dzin/ chos yong
293b6(dkon brtsegs): su mi 'dzin to/ / smras pa/ ji ltar yongs su mi 'dzin/ smras pa/ bdag dben pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / chos dben pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang
293b7(dkon brtsegs): chos dben pa ma yin pa dang / 'das pa dben pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dben pa dang / da ltar byung ba dben pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa
294a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dben pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas dben pa dang / sangs rgyas dben pa ma yin pa dang /
294a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing dben pa dang / zhing dben pa ma yin pa dang / chos dben pa dang / chos dben pa ma yin par gang de ltar chos rnams rjes su rtogs pa de ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// /
294a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
294a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni gang thams cad mi 'dzin pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / gang chos thams cad la mtshan ma dang spros par mi
294a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang / kun tu spyod pa med pa dang / gang yongs su rtog pa thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa'o// de'i tshe lha'i bu rgyal po bzang zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du
294a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nye bar zhi ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' lags so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bka' na
294a7(dkon brtsegs): nye bar zhi bar bgyi ba'i ched lags te/ nye bar zhi ba gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi bka' 'o// bcom ldan 'das de la gang dag dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar mthong ba de dag nye bar zhi
294b1(dkon brtsegs): ba lags te/ de dag ni slad kyis 'bar ba ma lags/ mchod pa ma lags/ 'bar bar bgyid pa ma lags so// gang dag zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dag da
294b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing mi 'dor ba lags te/ ji ltar chos thams cad mi 'dzin mi 'dor ba de ltar 'dzin to// lha'i bu des de skad bstan pas/ dge slong sto
294b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sems rnam par grol lo/ / lha'i bu stong ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras
294b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ / lha'i bu spobs pa 'di su'i yin/ smras pa/ spobs pa 'di su bag chags thams cad spangs pa dang / tshig gi lam thams cad med pa dang / don dam par brjod du med pa dang
294b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med pa de dag gi spobs pa yin no/ / smras pa/ lha'i bu spongs pa ji ltar skye/ smras pa/ spobs pa med pa dang / spobs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir
294b6(dkon brtsegs): na/ spobs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i tshig go// spobs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni spob pa med pa'i tshig go/ rigs kyi bu 'di skad du spobs pa 'di su'i yin
294b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes smras pa la/ 'di ni su gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag gi rnam par rig pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su
295a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa la'ang yid kyi rnam par rig pa mi dmigs la/ dmigs pa med pa'i chos nyid la'ang mi gnas pa de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su chos thams cad
295a2(dkon brtsegs): la'ang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de shes pas chos gang yang rab tu ma rtogs pa med pa de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni su gnas med pa dang / len pa med pa dang / 'dor ba med
295a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / chu bo las brgal ba de'i spobs pa'o// 'di ni skye ba med pa las skyes pa dang 'gog pa'ang med la/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i spobs pa'o//
295a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//
295a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
295a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan par 'dod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba nas 'dir 'ongs so// zhi ba'i blo gros lha'i bu rgyal po bzang 'dis
295a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob ste/ de 'dod na bskal pa brgya stong du thogs pa med pa'i spobs pas bstan kyang / 'di'i spobs pa zad par mi 'gyur ro//
295b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bzang gi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
295b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su
295b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ni gang yi ge rnams la yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i
295b4(dkon brtsegs): skra'o/ / a zhes bya ba las byung ba'o// a zhes bya ba'i mtha'a'o// a zhes bya ba ni tshig gi las thams cad kyi las byed do// a zhes bya ba ni mi shes pa'o// rnam par mi
295b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'o/ / chos thams cad ni a zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros rjes su 'jug pa ni
295b6(dkon brtsegs): de la chos phra rab tsam yang zhugs pa med pa dang byung ba med pa'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros yi ge de dag ni ga zhig nas lhags nas khong pa'i nang du 'jug pa med do// yi ge de dag ni khong pa'i
295b7(dkon brtsegs): nang du gnas pa ma yin no/ / yi ge de dag ni byung nas phyogs 'ga' zhig tu 'gro ba ma yin no// yi ge de dag ni phan tshun 'bar bar byed pa ma yin no// yi ge de dag ni smras kyang
296a1(dkon brtsegs): rung ma smras kyang rung ste/ zad par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// yi ge de dag ni chos zhe 'am/ chos ma yin zhes bya bar rnam
296a2(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog go/ / yi ge de dag ni sus kyang bskyed pa 'am/ bkag pa med do// yi ge de dag ni sus kyang byas pa 'am/ chung gsan pa med do// zhi ba'i zla gros yi ge bgrang
296a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta bar sems bgrang ba'ang de bzhin na/ / sems bgrang ba ji lta bar chos thams cad bgrang ba'ang de bzhin no// chos thams cad bgrang ba ji lta bar bgrang ba med pa'ang de bzhin no//
296a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni bgrang bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin te/ bgrang ba med pa ni chos bgrang ba'o// ji ltar chos bgrang bar nye bar mi 'gro ba bzhin du/ a zhes bya ba'i rjes su
296a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'ang de lta bu ste/ gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa la 'jug pa/ skye ba med pa la 'jug pa'o// ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba gang yin pa de la 'jug pa gang yang med do// de ltar na
296a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa med pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros su bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de'i spobs pa rgyun bcad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyun chad pa med pas des chos
296a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid rjes su rtogs so/ / des chos nyid mi zad par rjes su rtags so// de ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de ltar chos de dag rjod cing mngon du 'gyur ro// de chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su
296b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa 'di lta bu 'dis sems can gyi rnam pa la 'jug par 'jug go/ / sems can gyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to// zhi ba'i zla gros gzungs
296b2(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems kyi dri ma med pa yin no/ / bsam pas rnam par dag pa yin no// sbyor bas gtsang ma yin no// lhag pa'i bsam pas mngon du 'phags
296b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / bsgrub pa la legs par gnas pa yin no// shes rab kyis mngon du 'phags pa yin no// dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pas brtan pa yin no// bdud rnams
296b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi shigs pa yin no/ / pha rol mu stegs byed rnams kyis mi 'dus pa yin no// nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi brdzi ba yin no// phyir rgol pa rnams kyis mi thub pa yin na/
296b5(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis stobs dang ldan pa yin no// sems kyis zhum pa med pa yin no// spobs pas mi zad pa yin no// bstan pa rnams la mtha' yas pa yin no// nges pa'i tshig rnams
296b6(dkon brtsegs): la mu med pa yin no/ / ye shes kyis chags pa med pa yin no// blos gting dpag dka' ba yin no// bden pa bstan pa rnams la don zab pa yin no// thos pas rgya mtsho lta bu
296b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / ting nge 'dzin gyis lhun po dang mtshungs pa yin no// 'khor gyi nang na seng ge dang mtshungs pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi chos rnams la pad+ma dang mtshungs pa yin no// sems
297a1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bas sa dang mtshungs pa yin no/ / nyon mongs pa dang sred pa 'khru bas chu dang mtshungs pa yin no// sems can thams cad yangs
297a2(dkon brtsegs): su smin par byed pas me dang mtshungs pa yin no/ / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas zla ba dang mtshungs pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bas nyi ma dang mtshungs
297a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ / nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms pas dpa' bo dang mtshungs pa yin no// sems shin tu dul bas glang po dang mtshungs pa yin no// chos mngon du sgrog pas 'brug dang
297a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa yin no/ / chos kyi char 'bebs pas char dang mtshungs pa yin no// sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar byed pas sman pa dang mtshungs pa yin no// chos kyi
297a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid byed pas rgyal ba dang mtshungs pa yin no/ / 'jig rten gyi chos skyong bas 'jig rten sbyang ba dang mtshungs pa yin no// lha dang mi rnams kyi spyan du gyur pas brgya byin dang mtshung
297a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / dbang thob ste rang gi sems la dbang sgyur bas tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa yin no// gnas med par rgyu bas bya dang mtshungs pa yin no// 'du 'jis 'jigs shing
297a7(dkon brtsegs): skrag pas ri dgas dang spre'u dang mtshungs pa yin no/ / sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa thams cad bzod pas ma dang mtshungs pa yin no// bzo thams cad slob pas
297b1(dkon brtsegs): pha dang mtshungs pa yin no/ / chos rim po che thams cad sbyin pas rnam thos kyi bu dang mtshungs pa yin no// bsod nams dag gis brgyan pa yin no// mtshan rnams kyis klubs
297b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ / dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis smras pa yin no// 'jig rten gyis blta bar bya ba yin no// blta ba'i gzhi yin no// 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang ldan pas mi dbul
297b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no// rig pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no// mkhas pa thams cad kyis skur pa mi gdab pa yin no//
297b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis legs par bsrungs pa yin no// klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis legs par bzung ba yin no// chos bstan pa rnams la dbang phyug tu gyur pa yin no// mngon par shes pa
297b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la dbang sgyur ba yin no/ / sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la rjes su song ba yin no// sems can gyi dbang po rnams la rjes su zhugs pa yin no// chos bstan pa la chog mi
297b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yin no/ / rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du mi gnyer ba yin no// chos bstan pa dag la ser sna med pa yin no// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa nyon mongs pa med pa yin no// bzod
297b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pas gnod pa med pa yin no/ / brtson 'grus yongs su dag pas las kyi mtha'i legs par mthar phyin pa yin no// bsam gtan yongs su dag pas cang shes pa
298a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / shes rab yongs su dag pas blo legs par dkar ba yin no// tshad med pa rnams la tshangs pa'i bla ma yin no// bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin
298a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no// byang chub kyi lam gyis bla na med pa yin no// dbang bskur ba thob pas yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad dang
298a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin no/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa ni yon tan gyi bsngags pa tshad med pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshes
298a4(dkon brtsegs): bas 'phrin las gzhan mi mdzad par lo brgya stong rgyun du byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa'i bsngags pa rjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems
298a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa rjod pa mdzad pa
298a6(dkon brtsegs): ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
298a7(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di la yang dag pa don dam par na gang de ltar bsngags pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ / rigs kyi bu gang la kha dog med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / dbyibs med
298b1(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i yan tan gyi bsngags pa dang / gzugs kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// gang la gzugs dang / kha dag dang / dbyibs 'ba' zhig yod pa de'i bsngags pa ni rdzang
298b2(dkon brtsegs): par nus so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i rgyal po bzang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ma bsgrubs pa/ nga'i ba ma
298b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa gang gis kyang nye bar sprad par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ gang gis kyang bsal ba ma lags pa ste/ 'di la brtson pa dang yang dag par sbyor bar
298b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das brtson pa dang yang dag par sbyar bar 'gyur ba rnams la chos de dag mngon du 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na sa chen po
298b5(dkon brtsegs): chab kyi phung po'i steng na gnas te/ de la mi gang zhig khron pa 'am/ khron pa chen po rko ba de chab dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gang mi rko ba des ni chab mi rnyed lags so// bcom ldan
298b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin du thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i ye shes de la su zhig brtson par bgyid pa de ni ye shes 'tho par 'gyur te/ su brtson par mi bgyid pa des ni ye shes 'thab
298b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub don du gnyer ba rnams kyis rtag tu brtson pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o// de ltar na brtson pa
299a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag la chos de dag mngon du 'gyur lagaso/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na skyes bu dmus long gis de las skyes pa'i gzugs rnams mi
299a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyon mongs pas ldongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang / de las skyes pa'i chos rnams mi mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das
299a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na skyes bu mig dang ldan yang snang ba ma mchis na'ang mi mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang dag lha'i mig dang ldan du lags kyang // de dag
299a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag ma mchis na mos par mi 'gyur/ mthong bar mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na lha'i mig la ni snang bas bgyi ba
299a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa la'ang rjes su bstan mi 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na mngal na mchis pa'i sems can
299a6(dkon brtsegs): ni mi gda' mi mthong yang skye lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub kyang mi mthong mod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
299a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang skye'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na ri'i rgyal po gangs can la shing ldan pa gang skyes de ni bar ma dor chag pa 'am/ skam par mi 'gyur lags so//
299b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'phags pa'i chos la sbyor bar brtson pa gang gi shes pa skyes pa de'ang mi 'jig cing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
299b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper bgyi na gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byung ba de'i tshe rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu
299b3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub
299b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems skye ba de'i tshe/ chos rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab
299b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / thabs 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na gang gi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba de'i tshe/
299b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la de'i byams pa tha dad pa ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par
299b7(dkon brtsegs): smra ba dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pas sems can dag sdud pa de'i tshe/ sems can rnams la de tha dad pa ma mchis lags so// dper bgyi na gang gi tshe 'khor las
300a1(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dun khang na mchis pa de'i tshe 'thab pa dang rtsod pa ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems
300a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam gyi slad du mchis pa de'i tshe 'thab pa 'am/ rtsod pa'i gtam ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na gang gi tshe stong
300a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ thog mar ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang rgya mtsho chen po gnas par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de
300a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' thog mar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang snying rje chen po thog mar gnas lags so// bcom ldan
300a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na gang gi tshe gdugs 'char ba de'i tshe ri gang mtho ba de dag la thog mar 'od ce bab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
300a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi snang ba thog mar 'byung ba de'i tshe/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa de dag gis ye shes kyi snang ba de myong bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
300a7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper bgyi na sa bon thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad ni sas bzod de/ thams cad las bcud mnyam du gtong ngo //
300b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad la chos kyi bsam pa'i gtong bas sems chags pa ma mchis par gtong ngo //
300b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpe dgod pa bstan pa 'di
300b3(dkon brtsegs): legs par smras pa legs so legs so/ / lha'i bu rtswa dang nags tshal ji snyed pa dang / ming gi brda dang / chos kyi brda dang / sgra'i brda dag ji snyed pa dang / gzugs
300b4(dkon brtsegs): dang kha dog gi brda dag ji snyed pa dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa dang / ming dang gzugs rab tu brjod pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi
300b5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi yongs su spyad pa zas skom ji snyed par/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa'i dpe dgod pa bstan pa'ang de snyed do//
300b6(dkon brtsegs): lho'i bu gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gang ci'ang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa med do// gzugs su snang ba 'am/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ra 'am/
300b7(dkon brtsegs): reg bya 'am/ chos su snang ba gang ci'ang rung ste/ de la gang snang bar mi 'gyur ba med do// de la gzhan las thos pa la rag las pa'i spobs pa med do// gzhan gyi
301a1(dkon brtsegs): blta ba la rag las pa'i bstan pa med do/ / de mi zad pa dang / mtha' yas pa dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / thams cad la 'jug pa'i rjes
301a2(dkon brtsegs): su song ba yin no/ / de la rgyun chad pa med do// chags pa med do// lus lci ba med do// sems zhum pa med do// de sangs rgyas brgya stong gi spyan sngar ston kyang zhum
301a3(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gzungs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / spobs pa
301a4(dkon brtsegs): thob bo/ / de ston kyang zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / zlog par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de chags pa med pa gsum gyi rjes su song
301a5(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ / gsum gang zhe na/ bdag la chags pa med pa dang / sems can la chags pa med pa dang / chos la chags pa med pa'o// yongs su dag pa gsum gyi rjes su
301a6(dkon brtsegs): song ba yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa dang / de bzhin nyid yongs su dag pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su dag pa'o// ma zad pa
301a7(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi rjes su song ba yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ chos mi zad pa dang / yi ge mi zad pa dang / bstan pa mi zad pa'o// byin gyi rlabs gsum thob pa yin te/ gsum
301b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ spobs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi don gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / chos la 'jug pa'i byin gyi rlabs so// dga' ba gsum thob pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/
301b2(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis dga' ba dang / shes rab kyis dga' ba dang / the tshom chad pas dga' ba'o// myur ba gsum thob pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ dran pa myur ba dang / blo gros myur
301b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtogs pa myur ba'o// gzungs kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i dpe dgod pa mi zad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad brgyas gzungs thob par gyur to//
301b4(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i dpe dgod pa mi zad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
301b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par byin gyis brlab tu gsal/ bcom
301b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zlo ba las chos sba ba dang / bsrung ba'i
301b7(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag thos pa de dag khyod kyis dran nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i
302a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag po de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i chos sba ba dang / bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag khyod kyis 'khor 'di la rjod
302a2(dkon brtsegs): cig/ de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
302a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// tad+ya thA/ dzA ye/ dzA ya ma te/ dzA ya sha tU/ A le a ma laM/ a lu li taM/ ma me/ ma ma ma ti/ nA ma san ti
302a4(dkon brtsegs): ud te me/ ut+ta ma ti/ ut+ta ra NaM/ A re/ A ra ma Ni/ a ri sha ma ni/ a mu 'u li/ a mu 'u li/ a bat+ti te/ mu 'u la a nu ga te/ ad Te/ mang Te/
302a5(dkon brtsegs): mad Ti te/ A di/ mA Di/ mA Di te/ khu ru khu ru san d+hi/ d+har+m+ma a nu ga te/ d+harmA dak+She/ d+har+m+ma pra ze she/ sa re sa ra/ sa re/ a be d+he/ be d+ha san d+hi/ i hi/
302a6(dkon brtsegs): e ha ni/ e ta dA nu ga me/ bdud rnams tshar gcod pa/ mu stegs can rnams 'joms pa/ chos la gnod par sems pa rnams rmugs par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa rnams
302a7(dkon brtsegs): sel ba/ chos kyi tshul rnams 'bar bar byed pa/ chos smra ba rnams kun tu srung ba/ mya ngan las 'das par 'dzud pa/ byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa rnams yongs su
302b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa/ 'khor yang dag par 'jams pa/ chomanyan pa rnams la lus sbyin par byed pa/ yang dag par song ba rnams kyis bsam pa/ yang dag par zhugs pa rnam
302b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis blta ba/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams mngon du gyur pa/ gsang sngags kyi mtshams 'gugs pa/ brjod pa shes pa/ phyad pa mi thul pa/ bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid du
302b3(dkon brtsegs): chud za bar ma gyur cig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag yongs su brjod ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
302b4(dkon brtsegs): khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/
302b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du lhags nas lus btud thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis chos smra ba su'i kha'i sgo nas
302b6(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'byung ba de la rim gro bgyi'o/ / bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi dpal ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
302b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi bzod par rngo ma thogs lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sba bar bgyi'o// glags lta ba gzhan dag kyang tsharabacad par
303a1(dkon brtsegs): @bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bzhi kun tu gzigs te/ de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka'
303a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal to/ / dza ye/ dur dza ye/ dza ya ma ti/ sha me sha tu nire g+ha ta ni/ a mu 'u le/ mu 'u la ba ri ts+tshi na ne/ mA ra se'i n+ya bi tra sa ni/ mug te mug ta ba ti/ shud de/
303a3(dkon brtsegs): a b+he d+hi/ b+ha ya mo tsa ni/ b+hA ro ha ra Ne/ tad de bi d+ya ba bya ba rod ti ma/ pha rol rgol ba tshar gcod pa// chos smra ba dag kun sdud pa// chos kyi mdzod ni kun srung ba// rig
303a4(dkon brtsegs): sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas gsungs/ / a me/ a ma ma me/ ma ma ts+tshe de/ ar+the/ ar+tha ni/ sta ra Ne/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dgug pa'i tshig rnams smras pa'o// d+hI re/
303a5(dkon brtsegs): d+hI ra b+ha ti/ gu ba te/ shu b+he/ shu b+ha ba ti sa maM/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dir dgug par bya'o// mai trI/ so ma ba ti/ k+Shan ti/ kri ba ka ru/ No d+hA hi te/ pra ti/
303a6(dkon brtsegs): u paM k+Sha saM pan ne/ tshangs pa yang 'dir bkug par bya'o// a ra De bi ra De/ kha khe/ a mu'u le/ mu'u la sho d+ha ni/ bdud 'di tshar gcod bya ba'i phyir// gsang sngags
303a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhi ni 'di dag smras/ / mdo sde legs par bshad pa 'di// mi yi dbang pos byin gyis brlabs// gang tshe shes par 'gyur ba na// de yi tshe na spyad par 'gyur// gsang sngag
303b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag rab brjod pas/ / sa ni rab tu g.yos par 'gyur// bdud rnams thams cad lhags gyur te// 'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so// phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde 'di// gang dag lag
303b2(dkon brtsegs): tu mchi 'gyur ba/ / chos smra mkhas pa de dag ni// bdag cag rnams kyis bsrung bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje
303b3(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par gyis shig/ byin gyi rlabs 'di ni sus kyang rnam par
303b4(dkon brtsegs): dkrug par mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i bdag po ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa ma smad pa zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa
303b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/
303b6(dkon brtsegs): da mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gsung rab la/ dge slong chas smra ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/
303b7(dkon brtsegs): dbang che bar grags pa/ mthu che ba/ shes rab 'phags zhes bya ba dang / bden pas byin zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste/ chos smra ba de gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gi shegs pa de laH/
304a1(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bskal pa phyed tshang bar rjes su bskor nas/ stong gsum gyi
304a2(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdud bye ba phrag brgya 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su smin par byas te/ byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/
304a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i zla gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de bzhugs sam/
304a4(dkon brtsegs): 'on te yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de ni/ shar phyogs logs kyi
304a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe tshad ni bskal pa khri thub bo// rigs kyi bu
304a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bdud gang dag 'khod pa de dag khros shing sdang bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis de dag btul/
304a7(dkon brtsegs): legs par yongs su btul te/ de dag thams cad byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so// rigs kyi bu nga dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnyis kyis de bzhin gshe
304b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rin chen zla ba de'i gsung rab la tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ byang chub tu nges par byung ste/ nga ni shes rab 'phags zhes bya bar gyur to// gsang ba pa'i bdag pan bden pas
304b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar dod gnyis lhan cig tu mthun par bag yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa dag la bsti stang du byas so// bla mar byas so//
304b3(dkon brtsegs): rim gro byas so// mchod pa byas so// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bdud tshar gcad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gces spras byed
304b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa yong
304b5(dkon brtsegs): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bskal pa grangs med par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir gzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung bar khyed kyi nang na su spro/
304b6(dkon brtsegs): de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir langs te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
304b7(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// lus dang srog kyang spang bgyis la// rnam par smin la mi re bar// 'jig rten
305a1(dkon brtsegs): mgon pos gsungs pa yi/ / mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi/ rgyal ba bzang la sogs pa lha'i bu lnga stong gis thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
305a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so// sems
305a3(dkon brtsegs): can kun gyi don slad du/ / snying rje brtan par bskyed nas ni// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs zab pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
305a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshangs pa gtsug pud can dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// nad kun las ni thar bgyid pa// sad 'di sman dang 'dra
305a5(dkon brtsegs): bab lags/ / ston pa legs par sems bskyed de/ bdag cag gis kyang gzung bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
305a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di gzung bar
305a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o/ / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so// chos 'di yi ge ma mchis na// mi yi dbang pos thugs rje yis// yi ge rnams kyis rab bshad pa// de ni bdag gis
305b1(dkon brtsegs): / gzung bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa gtsug pud can la bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gsum po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
305b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rim gro byed pa bla na med pa'o// mchod pa'i las bla na med pa'o// bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba'o// gsum gang zhe na/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
305b3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos 'dzin pa dang / gang ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa ste/ tshangs pa gsum po 'di ni
305b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba bla na med pa'o// tshangs pa gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs pas mchod pa'i dngos po gsum po 'di dag gi
305b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa bskal pa'i bar du bstan du zin kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ / tshangs pa de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba bla na med pas
305b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byed 'dod pas mchod pa'i dngos po gsum po 'di dag gis mchod par bya'o/ / tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i chos kyi tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yongs
305b7(dkon brtsegs): su bzung na/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa b
306a1(dkon brtsegs): zhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni chos la nges par byung ba yin pas/ de chos kyis mchod par bya'i/ zang zing gis ni ma yin na// dam pa'i chos
306a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mchod pa ni mchod pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu bshad do/ / dam par bshad do// phul du bshad do// tshangs pa ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus na

306a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis gter chen po zhig rnyed do snyam nas/ ngas gter chen po rnyed do zhes skad cher phyung ba dang / nga'i pha ma gnyis na re/ gzhon nu gter ga la

306a6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyi chos gter ni/ / bskal pa bye ba mang por chud mi za// sems can don brtson byang chub sems dang ni// tshul bzhin nyid kyis dben sems gang yin dang // rtag tu bag yod
306a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chi mang rgyu yin te/ yongs su 'dzin med bde ba kun gyi rgyu// tshangs pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis ngas rmi lam du zos te/ tshangs pa ngas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis sems

306b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa dang / brtson nas yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa la gnas nas kyang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa de dag gis/ gter chen pa zab par de ltar rig par bya'o// tshangs

306b6(dkon brtsegs): nani/ der khyod btang snyoms can du 'gyur ro// tshangs pa 'di ltar nyon mongs pa can gyi dus 'di na/ su zhig nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de ni ches mang gi

307a4(dkon brtsegs): mgo rmongs par 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de tsam du mos par dka' ba/ de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba'o// sems can gang dag cang shes pa/ sbyang bar
307a5(dkon brtsegs): legs par byas pa/ chos 'di dag gi snod du gyur pa ma gtogs te/ de dag ni chos kyi tshul gyi rgyud 'di thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan
307a6(dkon brtsegs): ba kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags te/ mthu ci mchis pas
307a7(dkon brtsegs): rje rtsa thog tu gzung bar bgyi'o/ / bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis sems can chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir langs pa
307b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ kun dga' bo 'di dag thams cad ni khyod chas kyi rnam grangs 'di

307b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i skyes bu gang zag gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sa'i steng nas bzung ste/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du rin po che
307b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis yongs su bkang nas sbyin pa byin te/ de'i rnam par smin pa la re ba bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bton te/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis
307b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bshad na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i
308a1(dkon brtsegs): le'u dang / bsod nams tshad med par byung ba zhes bya'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su btad pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags bye ba rgya
308a2(dkon brtsegs): phrag bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong ni bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong
308a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/ dge slong stong drug brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag ni rab tu g.yos so// lha brgya
308a4(dkon brtsegs): stong dag gis ni rol mo sil snyan blangs shing / me tog gi char yang rab tu phab ste/ 'di skad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du shin tu yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces
308a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros dang / lha'i bu

308b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ / / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis

308b7(dkon brtsegs): po mngon par shes pa/ mngon par shes pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/ 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom

309a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus/ 'khor brgyad
309a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo las
309a6(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dga' ba dang / rab dga' dang / rtogs dga' dang / bzang dga' dang / dpal
