395a2(dkon brtsegs): lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin te/ chos mngon par rtogs pa dang / chos la yongs su spyod pa ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo de la gzhan 'phrul
395a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang byed kyi lha rnams ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams blta bar bya'o/ / kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na/ snga rdo
395a4(dkon brtsegs): dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe/ phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khrugs shing / kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rlung ldang ste/ de dag gis rin po che'i shing ljon pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ kha dog
395a5(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa/ kha dog du ma yod pa/ lha'i spos dri rab tu zhim pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa de dag bskyod/ kun tu bskyod/ bskul/ kun tu bskul nas/ de dag las me
395a6(dkon brtsegs): tog rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong ba'i bsung can/ blta na sdug pa dag rin po che'i sa chen po de la 'phrul te/ me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu mi 'greng bdun srid du
395a7(dkon brtsegs): bkram par 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu se la me tog 'grams mkhas pa zhig gis lag pa gnyis kas bkram ste/ mnyam par bkod na shin tu bkra zhing bltan
395b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug go/ / de bzhin du me tog bsung dang kha dog tha dad pa dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu mi 'greng bdun tsam du khyab par 'gyur ro// me tog gi rnam pa de dag ni
395b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa ste/ dpe tsam du de na gos ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde ba'o// de dag gi rkang pa 'jog pa na sor bzhi tsam gyis dma' bar 'gyur zhing / rkang pa bteg pa na sar bzhi
395b3(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis mtho bar 'gyur ro/ / snga dro'i dus 'das nas ni me tog de dag kyang ma lus par med pa 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dben pa dang / nyams dga'
395b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur zhing / me tog snga ma rnams kyis brnyogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de nas yang phyogs bzhi kun nas rlung langs te/ gang sngon ma byung ba'i
395b5(dkon brtsegs): me tog gsar pa dag mngon par 'thor ro/ / snga dro ji lta bar nyi ma'i gung dang / phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe dang / mtshan mo'ang srod dang / nam gyi gung dang / zo rangs kyang de
395b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no/ / spos dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i rlung de dag langs nas/ sems can de dag la reg na 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta
395b7(dkon brtsegs): bu'i de ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsnyad pa ma gtogs par ma dang dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza
396a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyuskar dang / sa'i gzugs dang / wAnA b+hU srAnA sat+taka seMng du gdags pa yang da// rgyun mo dang sa ldan mar ga gas pa'ang ma
396a2(dkon brtsegs): do/ / khyim yongs su 'dzin po'i 'du shes kyang yong med do// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na dus dus su lha'i spos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo//
396a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i me tog kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa dag dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun dang / lha'i tsan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char mngon
396a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'bab bo/ / lha'i bla re dag kyang 'dzin to// lha'i rin po che'i gdugs rnga ma'i bsil yab dang bcas pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'dzin to// lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag kyang
396a5(dkon brtsegs): sgrogs shing / lha'i bu mo dag kyang gar byed do// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mya
396a6(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lta ste/ mangs pa dang log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po gnyis rnam par gzhag pa
396a7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ gdags pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya ste/ rgyas par ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par
396b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan na ni bskal pa zang zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu rnams yongs su brjod kyang / bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so//
396b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs gyur la// dam pa'i don mkhas ye shes rnam dag
396b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ / de dag bskal pa'am 'on te lhag par ni// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa rab rjod kyang // bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba rab tu brjod pa na// bskal pa bye ba de dag zad 'gyur gyi//
396b4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can gyi bsngags pa mthar mi byin// de dag spobs pa'ang zad par 'gyur ma yin// gang gis phra rab rdul snyed 'jig rten khams// bshig cing btags te rdul du byas gyur
396b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ / de bas mang ba'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa ni// gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'od mtshan dang // bde ba can gyi yon tan khyad 'phags
396b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ thos nas dga' ste thal mo sbyor byed pa// bsod nams 'di yi char yang 'gyur ma yin// de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs de yi// yon tan thos nas mgu dang ngang
396b7(dkon brtsegs): skyed la/ / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog tu// 'gro bar bya phyir mos pa drag po skyed// gang gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi// ming thos pa yi bsod nams de la ni//
397a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing mchog thag gru chen po de dag kun// cha dang dpe yang 'gyur ba ma yin no// gang dag rgyal ba'i bka' dang shes rab can// de dag de bas bsod nams
397a2(dkon brtsegs): mang du 'gyur/ / don dam thob phyir dad pa rtsa ba ste// de lta bas na thos nas yid gnyis sol// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi yon tan dang bsngags pa de ltar
397a3(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med do/ / kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi
397a4(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan yongs su brjod do/ / bsngags pa gsung ngo // grags pa rab tu sgrogs so// yon tan rjod do//
397a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gang dag kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i mtshan thos la/ thos nas kyang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig bsam pa thag pa
397a6(dkon brtsegs): nas dang ba dang ldan pas skyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro/ / kun dga' bo sems can gang dag kha cig/ de
397a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pas yang dang yang yid la byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa skyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems yongs su bsngos te/ 'jig rten
397b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de/
397b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi tshogs du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas bzhugs par 'gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de mthong nas rab tu dang ba'i sems
397b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis shi 'phos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gis tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin
397b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong yang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud kyis sangs
397b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir sems yang dag par btang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya zhing / yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// kun dga' bo gang dag yang de bzhin
397b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de'ang yid la byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa rgyun du skyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems yang dag par gtong ba de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye
397b7(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng dang / zhabs
398a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bring ba dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dag mdun du gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas
398a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dang ba la dmigs pa'i ting te 'dzin de dang / brjod pa med pa'i dran pas shi 'phos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sems can
398a3(dkon brtsegs): g ang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam rjes su dran par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar yang 'dod la chos zab mo dag 'chad pa na
398a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba 'thob cing sgyid lug pa med la/ mi 'gong mi zhum cing / za na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de yid la byed de/ 'dod pa'ang
398a5(dkon brtsegs): skyed na de dag rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de mthong zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
398a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de dag don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
398a7(dkon brtsegs): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan kyang yongs su rjod/ bsngags pa'ang gsung bstod pa'ang sgrags so// kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs
398b1(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs
398b2(dkon brtsegs): su dri ba bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi
398b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing der 'dong ngo / / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das don 'di nyid rgyas par gsung zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyis
398b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la/ / phyag bya'i phyir ni shar gyi sangs rgyas zhing // mtha' yas gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed na// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags// de dag me tog kha
398b5(dkon brtsegs): dog tha dad pa/ / dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te// tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa// mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi
398b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la/ / phyag bya'i phyir ni de bzhin lho nub dang // byang phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams ji snyed nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags// de dag spros
398b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi kha dog tha dad pa/ / dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te// tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa// mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor// byang chub sems dpa' mang
399a1(dkon brtsegs): po de dag gis/ / mchod pa byas te dpag med 'od zhabs la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas zhing ni ngo mtshar mdzes shes
399a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzer/ / dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems ni gzhal yas gyis// de dag gis ni me tog snyim gtor nas// 'dren pa de yi spyan sngar 'di skad du// bdag cag zhing yang 'di 'drar
399a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur ces smras/ / de dag me tog snyim pa gtor ma thag/ de tshe dpag tshad brgya pa'i gdugs gyur te// legs par brgyan cing yu ba bkra bas mdzes// sangs rgyas sku la
399a4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu khebs par nas/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin du// bsnyen bkur byas nas 'ga' ste 'di skad du// gang dag gis ni mi mchog mtshan thos pa// sems
399a5(dkon brtsegs): can de dag rnyed pa legs rnyed 'dzer/ / sangs rgyas zhing 'dir bdag cag lhags pas na// bdag cag gis ni sngon rnyed legs par rnyed// bskal pa stong du ston pas gang bsgrubs
399a6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ / rmi lam lta bu'i zhing ni ci 'dra ltos// 'od ni dpag med gzi brjid dpag bde pa// sku tshe dpag med dge 'dun dpag med pa// byang chub sems dpas bskor cing mdzes
399a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa/ / sangs rgyas bsod nams phung po mchog la ltos// de nas tshe dpag med kyis 'dzum mdzad nas// 'od 'phro bye ba khrag khrig sum cu drug/ de dag zhal gyi dkyil
399b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor nas byung ste/ / zhing stong bye ba dag ni khyab par mdzad// 'od 'gro de dag thams cad slar log ste// 'dren pa'i smig tsug dar ni nub par gyur// ngatsha 'ang 'phro nub par/
399b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas ni// lha dang mi rnams dga' ba rab tu skyed// de nas sangs rgyas sras po grags chen po// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de langs te// gang slad 'jig rten
399b3(dkon brtsegs): mgon po 'dzum mdzad pa/ / bcom ldan de yi rgyu dang rkyen gang lags// sems can yang 'gro la phan pa thugs brtse can// don dam mkhas pa de ni lung bstan sol// gsung
399b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog yid du mchi ba de thos nas/ / sems can dag ni dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur// 'jig rten khams mang byang chub sems dpa' dag/ sangs rgyas blta slad bde can 'dir
399b5(dkon brtsegs): mchi ga/ / de dag thos nas dga' ba cher bskyed de// myur du zhing 'di rnam par lta bar 'gyur// rgya chen zhing 'dir lhags par gyur nas kyang // lha yi mig dang lha yi rna ba dang /
399b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs dran dang blo gros mkhas mchog dang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyis lung bstan pa// ngas ni sngon tshe smon lam 'di skad
399b7(dkon brtsegs): btab/ / sems can dag gis nga yi ming thos na// nga yi zhing du rtag tu 'ong bar shog/ nga yi smon lam bzang ba de rdzogs pas// 'jig rten khams mang dag nas sems
400a1(dkon brtsegs): can 'ong / / de dag nga yi zhing du lhags nas ni// de dag skye ba gcig las phyir mi ldog/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'dir// bdag gi
400a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing yang 'di 'drar 'gyur ba dang / / bdag gis ming dang sgra dang lta bas kyang // sems can mang po sgrol bar bya 'dod pa// de ni myur du rings par la gong du// bde ba can
400a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'jig rten khams song la/ / 'od dpag med kyi gan du son nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba stong la mchod pa gyis// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis zhing mang son nas ni// sangs
400a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bye ba mang la mchod byas te/ / bde bar gshegs la mchod pa byas nas kyang // dro khar bde ba can du slar yang 'ang // / bam po gsum
400a5(dkon brtsegs): pabapa ste tha ma'o/ / kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i byang chub kyi shing ni 'phang du dang ga
400a6(dkon brtsegs): tshad stong drug brgya yod pa yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dpag tshad brgyad rgya tshun chad du 'phyang ba/ rtsa ba'i sboms dang khrun dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ rtag
400a7(dkon brtsegs): tu la mi chags pa/ rtag tu me tog chags pa/ rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa/ kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma yod pa/ lo mtha dad pa/ me tog tha
400b1(dkon brtsegs): dad pa/ 'bras bu tha dad pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba'i nor bu rin po ches yongs su gsal ba/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin
400b2(dkon brtsegs): po ches rnam par spras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches gang ba/ rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che mchog gis shin tu rnam par spras pa/ kha dog lha'i las 'das pa
400b3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi skud pa 'phyang ba/ se mo do mdzes pa dang / rin po che'i chun po dang / rgyan 'phreng dang / do shal tshig rgyan dang / mu tig dmar po'i rgyan 'phreng dang
400b4(dkon brtsegs): mu tig sngon po'i rgyan 'phreng dang / seng ge'i kha nas 'phyang ba'i ska rags kyi tshogs yod pa rin po che'i skud pa dang / rin po che thams cad dang / dung gis
400b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par smras pa/ gser gyi dra ba dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bla rer bres pa/ chu srin dang
400b6(dkon brtsegs): bkra shis pa dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / zla gam lta bus legs par brgyan pa/ nor bu 'khrol ba dang / gser dang / rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
400b7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par brgyan pa'o// kun dga' bo byang chub kyi shing de rlung gis bskyod na/ sgra dbyangs 'byung ba gang yin pa
401a1(dkon brtsegs): des 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa go bar byed do/ / kun dga' bo de la byang chub kyi shing gi sgra de sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag byang chub kyi
401a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i bar du rna nad kyis ma btab par shes par bya'o/ / sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med
401a3(dkon brtsegs): tshad med/ brjod du med pa gang dag gi mig lam du byang chub kyi shing de snang ba de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du mig nad kyis ming btab par shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems
401a4(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag byang chub kying shing de'i dri tshor ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sna nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o/ / sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu'i
401a5(dkon brtsegs): ro myang ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lce nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o/ / byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sems can gang dag la khyab par gyur pa de dag kyang byang
401a6(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lus la nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o/ / kun dga' bo sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de chos nyid du nges par sems pa de dag kyang de nas
401a7(dkon brtsegs): bzung ste/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sems mi g.yeng bar shes par bya'o// sems can de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi shing de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang
401b1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogasaba'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ / de bzhin gshegs pa cha dpag med pa nyid kyi sman gyi smad las kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sngon gyi rgyal
401b2(dkon brtsegs): bal lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa dang / shin tu bsgoms pa dang / mi nyung ba dang / ma tshang ba med pas 'di lta ste/ sgra'i
401b3(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'gro ba dang / rjes su mthun pa dang / mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / bzod pa rnam pa gsum 'thob bo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs
401b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs par gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
401b5(dkon brtsegs): bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ smon lam gyi dbang ni ma gtogs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ go cha rgya chen po bgos pa
401b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par brtson pa sha stag go/ / kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od 'dom gang
401b7(dkon brtsegs): pa sha stag go/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'ad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rgyun
402a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'chad par khor rug tu snang bas khyab par byed pa gnyis ni ma gtogs sa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' zas 'ang
402a2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyi ming ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de gnyis las gcig gi mang
402a3(dkon brtsegs): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o// gcig gi ming ni mthu chen thob ces bya ste/ kun dga' bo de gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos
402a4(dkon brtsegs): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes so/ / kun dka' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad ni/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ lus
402a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa/ bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/ dbang ba rna ba/ dbang po bsdams pa/ kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa
402a6(dkon brtsegs): ma zhum pa/ dbang po mi g.yo ba/ bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan mtha' yas mu med pa sha stag go// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad na
402a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du log par mi ltung ba'i chos can sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad 'di nas nye bar bzung nas/ nam yang tshe rabs mi dran par mi 'gyur gyi/ tshe radra
402b1(dkon brtsegs): dran par 'gyur te/ gang dag dper na da ltar gyi nga bzhin du snyigs ma'i dus na/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bskal pas dkrugs pa dag tu
402b2(dkon brtsegs): gan par sngon smon lam btab pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad snga dro gcog bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams
402b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag tu dong nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byed de/ de dag rnam pa 'di lta bu'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
402b4(dkon brtsegs): phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag gis mchod pa bya'o snyam du ji lta ji ltar sems skyed cing / ji snyed 'dod
402b5(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad lag pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis me tog na so rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i
402b6(dkon brtsegs): pabar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod pa byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po tshad med grangs med pa dag kyang skyed cing sogs so// gal te me tog gi skon bu rnam pa 'di lta
402b7(dkon brtsegs): lag pa nas byung bar gyur cig ces 'dod na'ang / de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i me tog kha dog tha dad pa/ dri tha dad pa/ dri du ma yod pa'i skon bu dag lag pa nas byung ste/ de dag gis
403a1(dkon brtsegs): skon bu'i me tog rnam pa de lta bu de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'tha ga// skon bu'i me tog gtor ba
403a2(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad las nang gi chung ngu gang yin pa de'ang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam gyi me tog gi gdugs su 'gyur te/ phyi ma shos ma gtor gyi bar du snga ma sa la mi ltung ngo // de na
403a3(dkon brtsegs): skon bu'i me tog gtor ba gang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad nyi shu'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs su 'gyur ba'ang yod/ dpag tshad sum cu dang bzhi bcu'i tshad tsam yang yod/ steng gi bar snang la me tog
403a4(dkon brtsegs): gi gdugs dpag tshad brgyad stong gi tshad kyi bar tsam du 'gyur ba dag kyang yong ngo do/ / de na gang dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyed cing / sems dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa de dag dge ba'i
403a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/ snga dro gcig la skor lag nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gnas so//
403a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po tshe dpag med de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su zin pa dang / sngon chos mnyan pa byin pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang
403a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam 'byor cing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi nyung ba dang / shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / shin tu bsgoms pas smon lam btab pa grub bo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs
403b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba dag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'ga'
403b2(dkon brtsegs): yang mi skyed do/ / de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu 'chag cing rnam par rgyu ba na dga' ba dang mi dga' ba mi skyed do// 'gro ba na'ang ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gro'i/ ltos pa dang bcas par
403b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gnas kyi sems dang / sems de lta bu dag de dag la yong med de// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams
403b4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can der skyes pa de dag la gzhan gyi 'du shes med/ rang gi 'du shes med/ bdag gi 'du shes med/ 'thab pa med/ rtsod pa med/ mi mthun pa med/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med de/ de dag ni
403b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / mnyan pa'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / rab tu dang ba'i sems
403b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / brtan pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa'i sems dang /
403b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rgyud sgyu ma'i rang bzhin la blo rab tu zhugs pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho chen po dang mnyam pa/ blo ri rab dang mtshungs pa/ yon tan du ma bsags pa/ byang chub kyi yan log yang dag par 'gro
404a1(dkon brtsegs): pas rnam par rtsen pa/ sangs rgyas yang dag par 'gro ba la mngon par brtson pa/ sha'i mig rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa/ shes rab kyi mig
404a2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par khong du chud pa/ chos kyi mig gi pha rol tu son pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgrub cing 'chad de ston la/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing chags pa med pa'i yo shes mngon par bsgrub pa/
404a3(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum mnyam pa nyid du mngon par brtson pa/ sems dul ba/ sems zhi ba/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa/ kun 'byung ba'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa/ chos kyi nges pa'i
404a4(dkon brtsegs): / tshig dang ldan pa/ gsal ba dang mi gsal ba la mkhas pa/ tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam la mi lci bar gnas pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam rnam
404a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis snying po rtogs pa/ chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes pas gnas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i spyod yul ba/ ci'ang med pa/ len pa
404a6(dkon brtsegs): meng ba/ sems pa med pa/ phung po med pa/ len pa med pas shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams la thug pa med par gnas po/ rtsa ba med pa gnas pa/ sems
404a7(dkon brtsegs): chags pa med pa/ zhum pa med pa/ chos zab mo rnams la mngon par brtson pa/ sgyid lug pa med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtogs par dka' ba la 'jug pas 'phags pa/ bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam
404b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su thob pa/ tsom mad pa/ dag pa las rgal ba/ shes pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ lhag pa'i ngargyal med pa/ ye shes kyis mngon par 'phags te ri ba dang brdungs pa/ 'khrugs pa med pa
404b2(dkon brtsegs): blo rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba/ shes rab kyi 'od dang / dkar zhing shin tu dkar la dag cing dge ba'i sems dang / gser btso ma'i kha dog dang 'dra ba snang zhing 'od 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi mchog gis nyi zla'i las shin
404b3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'das pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba bzod pas sa dang mtshungs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khra bar 'bab pas chu dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la rlom sems su byed pa dang nyon
404b4(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa sreg pa'i phyir me'i rgyal po dang mtshungs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi chags pa'i phyir rlung dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad nges par phigs pa dang thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i phyir nam
404b5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos pa'i phyir pad+ma dang 'dra ba/ chos dang chos ma yin pa mngon par sgrogs pas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'brug chen po dang mtshungs pa/ chos
404b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi chu'i char mngon par 'bebs pas char pa chen po dang 'dra ba/ tshogs chen po zil gyis gnon pas khyu mchog dang mtshungs pa/ sems shin tu mchog tu dul bas glang po che chen po dang 'dra ba
404b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dul bas rta cang shes bzang po dang mtshungs pa/ rtsal dang mi 'jigs pas skrag pa med pa'i phyir ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyobs pas shing gi
405a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po n+ya gro d+ha dang mtshungs pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi g.yos pas ri'i rgyal po ra rab dang 'dra ba/ byams pa tshad med pa bsgoms pas nam mkha' dang mtshungs
405a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i sngon du 'gro bas tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba/ gnas su sogs pa med pas bya dang mtshungs pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pas
405a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding dang 'dra ba/ 'byung bar dka' ba'i phyir u dum wa ra'i me tog dang mtshungs pa/ rgya mtsho ltar shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ rnam par g.yeng ba med pa/ dbang po rmugs pa
405a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas pa/ bzod pa dang nges pa mang ba/ pha rol phun sum tshogs par smon pas phrag dog med pa/ chos kyi gtam rnams la 'jigs pa med pa/ chos yong+ga
405a5(dkon brtsegs): su tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba/ tshul khrims kyis bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra ba/ thos pas rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang mtshungs pa/ chos kyi rnga sgra chen pos sgra snyan pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po rdung ba/ chos kyi dung chen po
405a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bud pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chad po bsgreng ba/ chos kyi ba dan chen po 'dzin pa/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/ shes rab kyis rnam par lta ba/ rmongs pa med pa/ zhe sdang med pa/ zab
405a7(dkon brtsegs): / tul ba/ dag pa/ dring ba med pa/ brkam pa med pa/ yang dag par 'gyed pa la dga' ba/ gtong ba btang ba/ sbyin pa la lag brkyang ba/ chos dang zang zing yang dag par 'gyed pa la dga' ba/ sbyin pa la
405b1(dkon brtsegs): ser sna med pa/ 'dres pa med pa/ yid 'jigs pa med pa/ chags pa med pa/ brtan pa/ dpa' ba/ gces par 'dzin pa/ mos pa dang ldan pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa/ zug rngu phyung/ gtan pa med
405b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ nges pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ don byed pa/ 'jig rten gsal bar byed pa/ 'dren pa/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa/ dag pa/
405b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma gsum spangs pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa/ rgyu'i stobs can/ smon lam gyi stobs can/ mi dman pa/ gya gyu med pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
405b4(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ nga rgyal gyi zug rngu bton pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba/ dag pa/ dge ba la mos pa/ rgyal ba dam pas bsngags pa/ 'jig
405b5(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhas pa/ sbyangs pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ rgyal bas bstod pa/ sems dga' ba dang ldan pa/ brtul bod pa/ sran thub pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ rdul med pa/
405b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa/ rgya che ga khyu mchog tu gyur pa/ bden pa smra ga blo dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ blo gros dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi mtshon cha'i lag cha can/ bsod nams dang ldan pa/
405b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od dang ldan pa/ tha bo dang / dri ma dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ chos la rtag tu brtson pa/ chos thams cad la thos pa rgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa sha stag go/ kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
406a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu sha stag go/ / rgyas par bya na gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas pas bstan kyang /
406a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan gyi mtha' bstan par mi nus la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'ang rgyan chad par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
406a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de dag gi yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi spobs pa bla na med pa de gnyis ka'ang bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo longs la nub
406a4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs su phyogs te/ me tog gtor la thal mo sbar te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rdul med cing rnam par
406a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston pa'i phyogs der phyag tshol cig/ de'i mtshan de'ang sgrib pa med par phyogs bcur grags te/ phyogs re re na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
406a6(dkon brtsegs): gsung chags pa mi mnga' zhing gsung thogs pa mi mnga' ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag lan 'ga' lan 'ga' ma yin par bsngags pa brjod cing bstod de snyan pa gsung ngo / / de skad ces bka'
406a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
406b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de dang / tshe dpag med de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag la lta 'tshal
406b2(dkon brtsegs): lo/ / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig 'di smras ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i phyag gi mthil nas 'od gang gis sangs
406b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong snang bas khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od byung ngo / / de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong thams cad na ri nag po 'am/ rin po che'i ri 'am/ lhun po 'am/ lhun po chen po
406b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ btang zung ngam/ btang zung chen po 'am/ khor yug gam/ khor yug chen po 'am/ rtsig pa 'am/ ka ba 'am/ shing ljon pa stug po 'am/ skyed mas tshal lam/ gzhal med khang ngam/ lha dang mi gang
406b5(dkon brtsegs): su dag yod pa de dag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyis thal bar gyur cing / zil gyis non par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar nas mi zhig 'dom gang tsam na 'dug
406b6(dkon brtsegs): ba la mi zhig lta ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang 'od de yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
406b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i
407a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ri'i rgyal por rab ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags te/ phyogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me
407a2(dkon brtsegs): lhan ne/ lhang nger mdzes pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po de la lta'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po 'di chu gcig tu gyur na//
407a3(dkon brtsegs): de la shing ljon pa rnams med/ ri rnams med/ gling rnams med/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams med/ chu klung rnams med cing / ngam grog dang g.yang sa rnams
407a4(dkon brtsegs): mi snang ste/ gzhan du na sa chen po rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa ni ma gtogs so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos rnams kyi lus las mngon par grub pa'i 'od 'dom gang ba dang / byang chub
407a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi 'od dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong yod pa ma gtogs par gzhan rtags sam mtshan ma cung zad kyang med do/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
407a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med des/ nyan thos kyi tshogs de dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de zil gyis mnan nas/ phyogs thams cad du gsal bar kun tu snang ngo // de'i tshe 'jig rten
407a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams bde ba can der/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang mi de dag thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs
407b1(dkon brtsegs): pabashAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pos bskor cing chos ston pa'ang snang ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa la
407b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang / steng gi bar snang la kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dag dang / nags tshal nyams
407b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dag dang / skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang / chu klung dang rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dag dang / rin po che'i me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gang ba dag dang / 'og tu sa'i steng
407b4(dkon brtsegs): nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi nam mkha'i ngos la me tog bkram pa dang / me tog gi 'phreng bas kun tu mdzes par byas pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi ka ba'i 'phreng bas gang ba dang /
407b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'di
407b6(dkon brtsegs): las gzhan pa'i bya'i tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgras go bar byed cing / nges byang chub sems dpa' de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngam/
407b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sems can 'di dag gzhal med khang dpag tshad brgya stong yong
408a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dag tu zhugs te/ bar snang la chags pa med par 'gro ba dag kyang mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
408a2(dkon brtsegs): pabapa/ mi pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes pa'i mi rnams tha dad du bya ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
408a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni tha dad du bgyi ba gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi rnams ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bar bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
408a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na mi kha cig pad+ma chen po dag gi mngal na gnas pa mthong ngam/ gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum
408a5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'thab bral gyi lha rnams gzhal med khang dpag tshad lnga bcu pa 'am/ dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa rnams su zhugs te cadag zhing dga' mgur spyod pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan
408a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi kha cig pad+ma chen po dag gi mngal na gnas par mthong lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de na sems can rdzus te 'byung ba gang dag pad+ma rnams
408a7(dkon brtsegs): la skyil mo krung bcas te 'byung ba dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kha cig pad+ma'i mngal na gnas pa dang / kha cig pad+ma la skyil me krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung ba de'i rgyu ni ci lags/ rkyen
408b1(dkon brtsegs): ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na gnas te/ the tsam du ltung ba'i sems kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
408b2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed pa de dag ni de na mngal na gnas so// gang dag the tsom med cing som nyi chad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/
408b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skyed la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la yid ches shing dang la mos pa de dag ni pad+ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung ngo // mi
408b4(dkon brtsegs): pham pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na gnas pa gang dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med lta
408b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar sems skyed cing / the tsom mi skyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la som nyi med cing rang gi dge ba'i bu ba'ang sogs pa de dag ni snyil
408b6(dkon brtsegs): mo krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas ring po ma lon pa gzhan dag dang 'dra bar yud tsam gyis lus rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro// mi pham pa
408b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi khyad par dang / shes rab kyi rim pa dang / 'di lta ste/ the tsom du lhung ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams shing / byang chub sems dpa'
409a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / chos kyi gtam dang / dge ba'i spyod pa dang / dge ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad las yongs su nyams pa'i shes rab yongs su nyams pa dang shes
409a2(dkon brtsegs): rab chung ba la ltos/ mi pham 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la/ khri mon gser dang bai DUR+Ya thams cad kyis spras pa/ dar dang / 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi'i tshigs dbyangs pa/ tshon sna tshogs kyi
409a3(dkon brtsegs): blabA re bres pa/ ras bcos bu bting ba/ me tog gi sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/ bdug pa rgya chen pos bdugs pa/ khang bzangs dang / bsil khang dang / skar khung dang / kha khyer dang / rta babs dang / ba gam rin po che sna
409a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gser dang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba bres pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhi gtod pa/ them skas bzhi bcas pa zhig yod la/ rgyal po de'i bu nyes pa zhig gi
409a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir khri mon der bcug ste/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gya khong sgril du bcug la/ der de'i khri bshams te/ stan go ni ka bting la/ bar tshangs can dang pa la li ka bting ste/ yul ka ling ka'i ras kyi bting ba bting la/ de'i
409a6(dkon brtsegs): steng du dar bting ste/ g.yas g.yon gnyis su rten ma dmar po bzhag pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa de la 'dug kyang rung / nyal yang rung / de'i zas skom gtsang ma bsod pa rnam pa mang po du ma bshams na/ mi pham pa 'di
409a7(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/ rgyal po'i bu de'i yongs su spyad pa rgya che ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgya che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ des de'i ro myang bar byed
409b1(dkon brtsegs): dam/ mid par byed dam/ des dga' ba 'thob bam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ nongs pa gang gi slad du rgyal pos khri mon der stsal ba de las thar par 'tshal zhing / rigs bzang po
409b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs bzang po'i gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / khams kyi rgyal po 'am/ gang gis khri mon de las yongs su thar par 'gyur
409b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su tshol te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu de btson ra de na dga' ba ma mchis shing / rgyal pos ma gnang gi bar du mi thar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi
409b4(dkon brtsegs): pham pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag the tsom du lhung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes la som nyi za ba de dag sangs
409b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa de dang / sems dang ba tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skye'ang pad+ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas shing rdzas te 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ pad+ma rnams kyi
409b6(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa myong ste/ de dag de la skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du 'du shes shing gnas te/ bshang gci med/ mchil ma dang snabs med/ yid dang mi mthun
409b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mi 'byung mod kyi/ lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / 'bel ba'i chos kyi gta' rnam par nges pa dang
410a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ de dag de na mngon par mi dga' zhing mgu ba mi 'thob kyi sngon gyi nyes pa zad nas de dag pad+ma'i mngal rnams
410a2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung ste/ de dag de nas byung yang steng ngam/ 'og gam/ zad kar byung ba mi shes so// mi pham pa 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur
410a3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag bskyed par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba de thams cad kyang the tsom za ba'i nyes pa
410a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs par ma gyur pa la ltos/ mi pham pa the tsom gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa chen po ji tsam du 'gyur ba la ltos/ mi pham pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dag gis the tsom yongs
410a5(dkon brtsegs): su spangs te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed la myur du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i mthu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
410a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
410a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa dang /
410b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gan nas ji skad cig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa byung
410b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la
410b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par yongs su 'grub na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de bas chung ngu rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
410b4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig phrag bco brgyad 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i gan
410b5(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i 'od kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa
410b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dpag med kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bya ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
410b7(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten sgron ma'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa klu/
411a1(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon pa'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral
411a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad
411a3(dkon brtsegs): stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'jig rten gyi khams
411a4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang po'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
411a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa stobs mngon par shes pa'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyal mtshan gyi gan
411a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus thob pa/ 'jug pa gcig gis yang dag par zhugs pa/ nyi ma brgyad pa gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i 'khor ba bsnyil
411a7(dkon brtsegs): ba bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i bdag po'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams
411b1(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang
411b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang / yongs su dri bar bya ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// mi pham pa rnam grangs de lta bus de bzhin
411b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gang dag gi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur
411b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshang bar brjod kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ / mi pham pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
411b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos pa'i sems can de dag rnyed pa ji snyed cig legs par rnyed pa la ltos/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de
411b6(dkon brtsegs): la tha na sems dad pa gcig tsam rnyed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa mi phyed pa de dag ni dman pa la mos par mi 'gyur ro// mi pham pa de lta bas na khyod mos par bya/ khyod kyi//
411b7(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud par bya ste/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du chos kyi
412a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / bcas pa dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /
412a2(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// mi pham pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin gzhag gcig tsam yang bzung zhing bcangs te/ bklags shing kun chub par byas la/ bsam
412a3(dkon brtsegs): ba zag pa nas gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ / tha na glegs bam la legs par bris te bcang bar bya zhing / de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang bskyed par
412a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ / gang zhig sems can dpag tu med pa dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la dgod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
412a5(dkon brtsegs): med de la blta ba dang / bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs
412a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mas yongs su gang ba las brgal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o// thos nas kyang g.yor ma lhung
412a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyud kyis bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su dga' bar bya'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bcang ba dang / yi ger bri ba dang /
412b1(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rlabs po che chen po brtsam par bya'o// tha na pa gcig 'jos pa de srid du'ang gzhan dag la brjod par bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen por
412b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mas yongs su gang ba des brgal nas kyang / 'gyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi pham pa
412b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma dag chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di mnyan cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
412b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro/ / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i bar du chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po rnam pa 'di lta bu/ sangs rgyas thams
412b5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po
412b6(dkon brtsegs): myur du grub pa 'di gang dag gau rna lam du grag pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed pa shin tu legs par rnyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas
412b7(dkon brtsegs): bi dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa dang / 'dzin
413a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / bsgom
413a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / za na yi ger bris te mchod pa byed pa de dag kyang bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/ de bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no// mi pham pa de
413a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar na ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de byas pa yin te/ khyod kyang de the tsom med par brtson par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la
413a4(dkon brtsegs): som nyi ma za zhig/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i brtson rar chud da re/ mi pham pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// chos bstan pa rnyed
413a5(dkon brtsegs): par dka'o/ / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o// mi pham pa ngas khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsnyad kyis/ da khyod kyis mngon par
413a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyor la sgrubs shig/ mi pham pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad pa chen po bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mi nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyis
413a7(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ma 'khrugs par gyis shig/ yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log
413b1(dkon brtsegs): par ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod nams dag ni ma byas pa// 'di 'dra 'di dag thos
413b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur/ / dpa' bo gang dag don grub pa// de dag gsung 'di thos par 'gyur// gang gis 'od mdzad 'jig rten mgon// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas ni//
413b3(dkon brtsegs): gus dang bcas pas chos thos pa// de dag dga' ba dam pa 'thob// lta ba can dang dman dang zhum rnams kyis// sangs rgyas chos la dad pa rnyed mi nus// gang dag sngon gyi/
413b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mchod byas pa// de dag 'jig rten mgon gyi spyad la slob// dper na skyes bu long ba mun kha na// lam yang mi shes bstan par ga la nus// de ltar nyan thos
413b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi/ / ye shes mi rtogs sems can gzhan ci smos// sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas yon tan mkhyen// lha klu lha min gnod sbyin nyan thos min//
413b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu bshad pa ni// rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang 'di ma yin// gal te sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs// ye shes rnam dag don
413b7(dkon brtsegs): dam mkhas gyur te/ / de dag bskal pa'am 'on te lhag par ni// sangs rgyas gcig gi yon tan rjod byed kyang // de dag bar du mya ngan 'das gyur gyi// bskal pa
414a1(dkon brtsegs): bye ba mang por rab brjod kyang / / sangs rgyas ye shes tshad rnyed mi 'gyur te// de ltar rgyal ba'i ye shes ngo mtshar to// de bas mkhas pa rig pa'i
414a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin mi/ / gang zhig nga yi tshig la yid ches te// rgyal ba'i ye shes phung po dbang byas te// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen ces tshig tu brjod// brgya lam na ni mi yi lus
414a3(dkon brtsegs): rnyed la/ / brgya lam na ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur// dang dang shes rab yun ring rnyed par 'gyur// de bas don thob bya phyir brtson 'grus skyed// gang zhig chos
414a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog 'di 'dra thos nas ni/ / bde gshegs dran pa dga' ba thob par 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub mos skyed pa// de dag 'das pa'i dus na nged dang bshes//
414a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can bye ba phrag bcu gnyis chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go/ bye ba
414a6(dkon brtsegs): brag nyi shu rtsa bzhis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ / dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
414a7(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu rtsa lnga ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ / lha dang mi'i skye dgu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu ni sngon sems skyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
414b1(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bde ba can du skye bar
414b2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su sngo bar byed do/ / de dag thams cad der skyes nas kyang mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ sangs rgyas
414b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshes
414b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mar me mdzad las bzod pa thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
414b5(dkon brtsegs): med kyi sngon byang chub sems dpa'i sprad pa spyod pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes te/ gyi smon lam dang sprod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/
414b6(dkon brtsegs): / de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs
414b7(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang kun tu snang ngo / / me tog man nga ra ba dag kyang sa la pus mo nub tsam bkram par gyur to// lha dang mi'i sil snyan rnams kyang rab tu grag par gyur te// 'og
415a1(dkon brtsegs): min gyi gnas kyi bar du'ang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra grags par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
415a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang
415a3(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
415a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dpag med kyi bkod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//
415a5(dkon brtsegs): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/
